GK16visah_cu:0: prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ granthārambhe nirvinghena prāripsitaparisamāptikāmo vāṅmayādhikṛtatayā vāgdevatāyāḥ sāṃmukhyamādhatte--
GK16visah_cu:5: dṛṣṭvā bhūritadhvaniprabhṛtikālaṅkāraśāstraṃ muhu- stanmūlañca visṛṣṭamarthamakhilaṃ kāvyaprakāśasya ca /
GK16visah_cu:6: sāhityottaradarpaṇaṃ viśadayannāndayan sajjanān bhaṭṭācāryyamaheśvaro vitanute vijñāpriyāṃ ṭippaṇīm // 2 //
GK16visah_cu:11: ārambhakālasya sthūlatvād yogyatāvaśāt tatpūrvakāle eva sāmmukhyādhānaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:12: na ca śloke sāmmukhyādhānabodhakābhāvāt kathamidamābhāṣitamiti vācyam, śaradindvityādi tatsaundaryyakathanarūpastutyā svacetasi
GK16visah_cu:13: tamonāśār'tha prakāśanaprārthanayā ca tallābhāt, stutasyānukūlatvaniyamāt tadānukūlyaṃ pratyevābhīṣṭhaprārthanācca cetasyarthaprakāśe satyapi vighnād granthasya samāptirna bhavatītyate /
GK16visah_cu:16: samāptimātrasya laukikāraṇādhīnatve 'pi tadvighnavighāto devatānukūlyādeveti vighnābhāvaviśiṣṭhasamāpti kāmanayāpi vighnābhāvarūpaviśeṣaṇāṃśo viṣayīkriyate ahaṃ sukhī syāmiti kāmanayā sukhaṃśā iva prāripsitagranthaparisamāptirūpe phale 'nyadevatāpekṣayā tasyāḥ śīghnakāritvapratipādanāya tadviśeṣaṇamāha--vāṅmayeti--svārthe mayaṭ /
GK16visah_cu:19: tathā ca vāgātmakasya granthasya nirvighnaparisamāptirūpaṃ phalaṃ vāgadhikāriṇyā śīghraṃ dātuṃ śakyameveti darśitam /
GK16visah_cu:28: pāraṃ sāhityavidyābdhergantuṃ vāñchanti ye kṣitau kṛtireṣā taristeṣāṃ viśvanāthamahākaveḥ śravyābhineyālaṅkāratattvaṃ satkavisammatam /
GK16visah_cu:29: yadihāsti tadanyatra yannehāsti na tat kvacit // 6 //
GK16visah_cu:32: iha khalu sūtrāṇāmevārthaṃ vṛttyā viśadīkurvan granthādau vighnavighātāya avigītasadācāraparamparāprāptatayā svābhīṣṭadevatārādhanena sammukhīkaraṇasūcikāṃ kārikāmavatārayati-grantheti /
GK16visah_cu:37: vāṅmayetyanena svaśāstravidheyavagvaibhavadātṛtayā hmādidevārādhyatvena bhagavatyāḥ prakṛtārthanirvāhakatvaṃ sūcitam /
GK16visah_cu:44: śaradinduvat sundararuciḥ, sā prasiddhāgirāṃ devī sarasvatī, me mama cetasi santataṃ vistṛtaṃ, tamaḥ tamastulyamajñānam, apahṛtya, akhilān mayā vakṣyamāṇān arthān prakāśayatvityarthaḥ atrādye pāde luptopamāmahimnā śaradindorapi sundararucitvaṃ santataṃ tamaḥ padārthāndhakāranāśakatvaṃ ghaṭapaṭādyakhilārthaprakāśakatvaṃ ca siddhyati /
GK16visah_cu:45: tathā ca ebhiḥ sādharmyaiḥ śaradindugīrdevyorupamānopameyabhāva iti bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:51: asya granthasya kāvyāṅgatayā kāvyaphalaireva phalavattvamiti kāvyaphalānyāha--
GK16visah_cu:61: pravṛttinivṛttyupadeśadvāreṇeti--pravṛttyupadeśena pravṛttasya dharmotpattiḥ sākṣādeva, nivṛttyupadeśena nivṛttasya dharmotpattiḥ
GK16visah_cu:74: nanu kathaṃ kavinoptāditetivṛttānāṃ mālatīmādhavaratnāvalīmṛcchakaṭikādīnāṃ svābhidheyeṣu prāmāṇyam ?
GK16visah_cu:79: natu prakārabhedāḥ prahelikā vyahgyārthaviśiṣṭhā nīrasā vākyaviśeṣāḥ
GK16visah_cu:80: yathā- ke dārapoṣaṇaratāḥ kā śītalāmbuvāhinī gaṅgā /
GK16visah_cu:81: kaṃ saṃjaghāna kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃ balavantaṃ na bādhate śītam "iti /
GK16visah_cu:82: atra hi praśnarūpor'tho vācyaḥ, uttararūpaśca vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:89: iha ca nyāyo 'yamanvācayaḥ, prakaraṇādi pramāṇaṃ rasāsvādajanakatvāt
GK16visah_cu:90: kāvyatvādvā, yadevaṃ tadevaṃ, yathā rāmāyaṇādi, tathā cedaṃ, tasmāttatheti
GK16visah_cu:91: na yadevaṃ na tadevaṃ yathā praheliketi /
GK16visah_cu:92: nanu rasarūpapramāṇatvepi prakaraṇādeḥ ratyāsvādānantaramasadbhūtatvenārthānarthopadarśanābhāvāddhitāhitapravṛtt inivṛttikāritvaprayojitaṃ kathaṃ hi śāstratvamiti na vācyam /
GK16visah_cu:109: śabdaḥ suprayuktaḥ samyagjñātaḥ svarge loke kāmadhugbhavati"
GK16visah_cu:116: (vi, gha) kalā vaidagdhī, vaicakṣaṇyaṃ pravarttakaṃ jñānaṃ
GK16visah_cu:121: tathā ca samastakāvyaprayojanam--"kāvyaṃ yaśaser'thakṛteṭha iti yat kāvyaprakāśakāreṇoktaṃ tacca "karoti kīrttiṃ prītiṃ ca" ityatraivoktam,
GK16visah_cu:128: caturvargaprāptirhi vedaśāstrebhyo nīrasatayā duḥkhādeva pariṇatabuddhīnāmeva jāyate /
GK16visah_cu:132: (vi, ṅa) nanu caturvargaphalasādhake vedaśāstre sati kimarthaṃ lokaḥ
GK16visah_cu:140: nanu tahi pariṇatabuddhibhiḥ satsu vedaśāstreṣu kimiti kāvye yatnaḥ karaṇīya ityapi na vaktavyam
GK16visah_cu:141: kaṭukauṣadhopaśamanīyasya rogasya sitaśarkaropaśamanīyatve kasya vā rogiṇaḥ sitaśarkarāpravṛttiḥ sādhīyasī na syāt ? kiñca kāvyasyopādeyatvamagnipurāṇe 'pyuktam--
GK16visah_cu:150: tena hetunā tasya kāvyasya svarūpaṃ nirūpyate /
GK16visah_cu:157: (lo, ū) śaktiḥ kavitvabījarūpaḥ saṃskāraviśeṣaḥ yāṃ vinā kāvyaṃ na
GK16visah_cu:161: darśayannāha--tat kiṃ svarūpamityāha--"tadadoṣāviti" taditi kāvyam, doṣāḥ
GK16visah_cu:162: śrutikaṭvādayaḥ, guṇā mādhuryyādayaḥ, kvāpyanalaṅkṛtītyanena sarvatra sālaṅkārau śabdārthau kāvyam, kvacittu sphuṭālaṅkāravirahe 'pi na kāvyatvahāniriti /
GK16visah_cu:173: "nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayastatrāpyasau tāpasaḥ so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:174: dhigdhikchakrajitaṃ prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā svargagrāmaṭikāviluṇṭhanavṛthocchūnaiḥ kimebhirbhujaiḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:181: āstāṃ so 'pi sindhorudīcītīre kharadūṣaṇādihantā, so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ natu dvitrirākṣasān /
GK16visah_cu:183: bhavatu vā mama daivasya prātikūlyādevaṃ, śakrasya jetāram arthāt
GK16visah_cu:184: meghanādaṃ mama putraṃ dhik dhik, tathā prabodhitavatā prabodhitaṃ
GK16visah_cu:185: prabodhaḥ tadvatā bhāvaktantatvena prabodhavatā kumbhakarṇena vā kiṃ phalamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:186: natvatra ktavatuḥ, tasya karmaṇyanabhidhānāt, tathā mama bhujairvāpi
GK16visah_cu:187: kim ? kīdṛśaiḥ, mama viluṇṭhane svargo 'pi grāmaṭikā svalpagrāmaḥ,
GK16visah_cu:194: asya śalokasya vidheyāvimarśadoṣaduṣṭatayā kāvyatvaṃ na syāt /
GK16visah_cu:199: (vi, jha) vidheyāvimarśeti--vidheyasya nyakkārasyoddeśyādarimattvāt pūrvanipātāt "anuvādyamanuktvaina vidheyamudīrayet" iti niyamāt /
GK16visah_cu:204: kāvyaprakāśakṛtā kāvyaprakāśe, "idamuttamamatiśayini vyaṅgye vācyād dhvanirbudhaiḥ kathitaḥ" ityanena lakṣaṇena dhvaniyuktatvādasya
GK16visah_cu:205: uttamakāvyatvasvīkārāt, tasmādavyāptidoṣa iti---atra doṣasāmānyābhāvo lakṣaṇaghaṭaka iti tadabhiprāyamunnīya idamuktam, tasya tu śābdabodhavighaṭakadoṣasāmānyābhāva evābhiprayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:206: anyathā "tathābhūtāṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpasadasi pāñcālatanayām" ityādiślekaḥ kākusahakṛtadhvanyudāharaṇatayoktvā kathaṃ tenaiva nyūnapadatvadoṣe udāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:207: kathaṃ vā "kṛtamanumataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vā yairidaṃ gurupātakam" ityādiślekaḥ raudrarasodāharaṇatvenoktvāpi punaruktadoṣatve udāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:211: vṛthocchūnairityatra bhujāmucchūnatayā bṛthāttvasya tatkālamātrajātatvābhiprayeṇa vidheyatāṃ netumucitasya tatpuruṣasamāsena kavinā guṇībhāvaṃ nītatayā pūrvasiddhatvāt anuvādyatva-pratītiriti
GK16visah_cu:215: tathā hi, ayamevetyanyayogavyavacchedasūcakasya evakārasya, me iti kākupadasya, araya iti bahuvacanasya, atraiveti sarvanāmnaḥ, nihanti jīvatīti tiṅaḥ, aho ityavyayasya, rāvaṇa iti tat tat
GK16visah_cu:218: viṭhṭhuṇaṭhaneti vyupasargasya, bhujairiti bahuvacanasya tadvyañjakaviśeṣatvāt asaṃlakṣyakamo
GK16visah_cu:223: nanu kaścidevāṃśo 'tra duṣṭo na punaḥ sarvo 'pīti cet, tarhi yatrāṃśe doṣaḥ so 'kāvyatvaprayojakaḥ, yatra dhvaniḥ sa uttamakāvyatvaprayojaka ityaṃśābhyāmubhayata ākṛṣyamāṇamidaṃ kāvyamakāvyaṃ vā kimapi na syāt /
GK16visah_cu:224: na ca kaṃcidevāṃśaṃ kāvyasya dūṣayantaḥ śratiduṣṭādayo doṣāḥ, kiṃ tarhi sarvameva kāvyam
GK16visah_cu:233: nanvaṃśaviśeṣasthitena doṣeṇa aparāṃśādūṣaṇāttadaṃśe kāvyatvaṃ doṣavadaṃśe cākāvyatvaṃ syādata āha--naceti /
GK16visah_cu:234: kiṃ tarhi samastameveti, samastasyaiva dūṣaṇe yuktimāha--tathā
GK16visah_cu:238: cyutasaṃskārādayaḥ samastarasāpakarṣakatvānnityāḥ, śrutiduṣṭatvaṃ tu katipayaśṛṅgarādirasāpakarṣatvādanityamityabhiyuktakṛtāṃ vyavasthāpi na
GK16visah_cu:242: idaṃ padyam, nanu padaikasyaiva viṣayasya viruddhadharmayogaḥ syāt /
GK16visah_cu:243: iha tu doṣasya yadaṅgasya dūṣakatvaṃ tasyākāvyatvam, dhvaneśca yasyotkarṣakatvaṃ tasyottamakāvyatvamiti dvayorna virodhaḥ ityāśaṅkyāha-na
GK16visah_cu:249: hiraudrādirase prarūḍhaśrutikaṭutvasya guṇatvam, yathā mama tātapādānāṃ
GK16visah_cu:252: arddhepārīndramarddhenaramahaha mahālokamālokya lokāḥ stokāstokāviśeṣāḥ śaraṇamupayayurvāridhiṃ vāridhiṃ vā" //
GK16visah_cu:258: kiñca evaṃ kāvyaṃ praviralaviṣayaṃ nirviṣayaṃ vā syāt, sarvathā nirdeṣasyaikāntamasaṃbhavāt
GK16visah_cu:265: doṣatāprayojakaṃ tu na rasāpakarṣakatvaṃ, kintvabhyuktoktittatsvarūpameva tatprayojakamityata āha--kiṃceti /
GK16visah_cu:272: nanvīṣadarthe nañaḥ prayoga iti cettarhi "īṣaddoṣau śabdārthau kāvyam"
GK16visah_cu:276: (vi, ṭha) īṣadarthe naña iti---adoṣāviti naña ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:284: nirdeṣayoḥ kvacit kadācit kavinādoṣabhāvena nirmitayoḥ kāvyatvaṃ na
GK16visah_cu:287: sati saṃbhave "īṣaddoṣau" iti cet , etadapi kāvyalakṣaṇo na vācyam ,
GK16visah_cu:289: nahī kīṭānuvedhādayo ratnasya ratnatvaṃ vyāhantumīśāḥ kintūpādeyatāratamyameva kartum /
GK16visah_cu:297: (vi, ḍa) sati sambhava iti---sphuṭadāṣarahite kadācidīṣaddoṣasya sambhave satītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:298: uktañceti---yatra rasādīnāmasaṃlakṣyakramāṇām anugamaḥ sphuṭaḥ tatra duṣṭeṣvapi kīṭānuviddharatnādisādhāraṇyena kāvyatā matā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:305: guṇānāṃ rasaikadharmatvasya "ye rasasyāṅgino dharmāḥ śauryādaya ivātmanaḥ"
GK16visah_cu:310: (vi, ḍha) evamadoṣāviti viśeṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā saguṇāviti viśeṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitumāha--kiñceti
GK16visah_cu:314: (lo, au) evamadoṣatvasya kāvyalakṣaṇatvaṃ dūṣayitvā saguṇatvasyāpi dūṣayati /
GK16visah_cu:320: rasābhivyañjakau bhavato 'pyanumatau; tena rasādirūpavyaṅgyarūpāṇāmapi mādhuryyārdānāṃ vyañjakarūpaśabdārthadharmatvenopacāraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:321: yadāha sa eva "guṇavṛttyā punasteṣāṃ sthitiḥ śabdārthayormatā"iti /
GK16visah_cu:323: upacārataḥ saguṇau śabdārthau kāvyamiti yaducyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:326: tayoḥ kāvyasvarūpeṇābhimatayoḥ śabdārthayo raso 'sti, na vā ? nāsti cet,
GK16visah_cu:328: asti cet ? kathaṃ noktaṃ rasavantāviti viśeṣaṇam /
GK16visah_cu:333: saguṇayo raso 'sti naveti, ayamarthaḥ--rasasya sadbhāve eva kāvyatvaṃ
GK16visah_cu:338: kathamiti--ayamāśayaḥ, yadi guṇābhivyañjakayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ satoreva kāvyalakṣaṇatvamābhimataṃ tadā lakṣaṇasya nyūnapadatvam /
GK16visah_cu:340: guṇavattvānyathānupapattyaitallabhyata iti cet ? tarhi sarasāvityeva vaktuṃ yuktam , na saguṇāviti /
GK16visah_cu:346: śauryyadyāśrayaprāṇyāśraye deśe 'nayā śauryyādimanto deśā iti kenāpi nocyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:347: idaṃ ca granthakṛtā'ropabījānavadhānādekoktam; tathā hi paramparāghaṭakya madhyabhūtasambandhino bahirindriyapratyakṣatve satyeva naikamāropaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:348: yatra tu paramparāghaṭakamadhyabhūtasambandhī na bahīrindriyaprataykṣastatratvevamārepo dṛśyata eva /
GK16visah_cu:349: yathā śīto vāyuruṣṇaṃ jalaṃ sugandhirvāyurittra paramparāsambandhaghaṭakānāṃ madhyabhūtajalāgnipuṣpāvayavānāṃ sūkṣyamatvenāpratyakṣatvāt tādṛśa āropaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:350: prakṛte 'pi bahirindriyāprataykṣasya rasādeśca paramparāsambandhaghaṭakatvāt sambhavatyeva guṇavattāropaḥ śabdārthayoriti
GK16visah_cu:355: yadi ca tādṛśaropo nāsti tadā kāraṇāntarābhāvasyaiva tatra kalpanīyatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:356: ata enodayanācāryyairuktam, "ārope sati nimittānusaraṇaṃ na tu nimittamasti ityāropaḥ" iti
GK16visah_cu:357: yastu javākusumasya vahirindriyapratyakṣatve 'pi lohitaḥ sphaṭika ityāropaḥ tatra javākusumaṃ nedṛśaparamparāghaṭakaṃ javākusumasya sphaṭikāvṛttitvāt /
GK16visah_cu:358: kintu javākusumasya svacchadravyasānnidhyameva tadrahitaṃ pṛthagevāropanimittamiti sudhībhiravadheyam
GK16visah_cu:360: (lo, ā) guṇavattveti--saguṇāviti padenaiva śabdārthayoḥ sarasatvamuktamityarthaḥ, tarheti--yadi sarasatvapratipādanāya saguṇāvityuktamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:361: tena alaṅkārāḥ kaṭakakuṇḍalādivaditi vacanena alaṅkārasyotkarṣamātrādhāyakatvāt lakṣaṇaṃ parāstamityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:363: tathā hi, kāvyatvasāmānyasya kiṃ śabdārthayoḥ saṃyogādivad vyāsajyavṛttitvam ? uta gotvādivat pratyekaparisamāptivṛttitvam ? nādyaḥ sāmānyatvādeva /
GK16visah_cu:365: etacca etadgranthakṛtā svakṛtāyāṃ kāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ likhitamapi prācīnagauravaniyantritenātropekṣitam
GK16visah_cu:366: adoṣatvādīnāṃ tu kāvyalakṣaṇatve prameyārthavirodhaprasaṅga iti tannirākṛtam //
GK16visah_cu:369: prayojyāvityabhiprāya iti cet ? na, guṇābhivyañjakaśabdārthavattvasya kāvye utkaṣamātrādhāyakatvam , na tu svarūpādhāyakatvam /
GK16visah_cu:372: (vi, ta) idānīṃ saguṇatvaviśeṣaṇasya na lakṣaṇaghaṭakatvaṃ kintu kavyupadeśaparatvamityāśaṅkate, nanu śabdārthāviti dūṣayati---cenneti /
GK16visah_cu:377: na tu svarūpādhāyakatvāmityasya svarūpe lakṣaṇe na
GK16visah_cu:382: "kāvyasya śabdārthau śarīram , rasādiścātmā, guṇāḥ śauryādivat, doṣāḥ
GK16visah_cu:385: etena "analaṅkṛtī punaḥ kvāpi" iti yaduktam, tadapi parāstam /
GK16visah_cu:386: asyārthaḥ- sarvatra sālaṅkārau kvacittvasphuṭālaṅkārāvapi śabdārthau kāvyamiti /
GK16visah_cu:404: yaḥ kaumāraharaḥ sa eva hi varastā eva caitrakṣapā- ste conmīlitamālatīsurabhayaḥ prauḍhāḥ kadambānilāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:405: sā caivāsmi tathāpi tatra suratavyāpāralīlāvidhau revārodhasi vetasītarutale cetaḥ samutkaṇṭhate
GK16visah_cu:410: (vi, da) "yaḥ kaumārahara'; ityādiślokam asphuṭālaṅkārodāharaṇatayā kāvyaprakāśakāra udāhṛtavān, tatra sphuṭālaṅkāra evāstītyāha---yacceti /
GK16visah_cu:412: revātīre kṛtasaṅketāyāḥ kulaṭāyāḥ svagṛhe iyaṃ bhāvanā /
GK16visah_cu:413: utkaṇṭhākaraṇaṃ mama yadyapi nāsti tathāpi tatra kṛtasaṅkete revārodhasi revātīre vetasīnāmatarutale suratavyāpārarūpalīlāvidhinimittaṃ cetaḥ samutkaṇṭhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:416: sa eva varaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ, yatheṣṭaratisamartha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:417: caitrakṣapā api saṅketasthala ivātrāpyaviśiṣṭā ityāha--"tā eva'; iti
GK16visah_cu:420: ata eva te prauḍhāḥ api mandatvaparyyavasannāḥ vanānilasya prauḍhatve 'pi mandatvaṃ vahabahirbhāvena
GK16visah_cu:422: caitre kadambapuṣpasyābhāva eva, kecittu dhūlīkadambapuṣpaparatayā vyācakṣate /
GK16visah_cu:423: tanmate vāyoḥ prauḍhatvaviśeṣaṇānaucityāpatteḥ anye tūnmīlitamālatīnāṃ te ca prauḍhasurabhayo ghrāṇatarpaṇagandhāḥ, iti vāyacakṣate /
GK16visah_cu:425: tadā kadambānilā ityatra te ca ityasyābhāvāt, pratyatrijñānupapatteḥ
GK16visah_cu:427: sā ceti ahamapi tadavasthaiva, ubhayatra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:430: (lo, ī) evaṃ kāvyalakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā kāvyaprakāśakṛtaḥ sphuṭālaṅkāravirahodāharaṇe sphuṭālaṅkāraṃ
GK16visah_cu:432: "yaḥ kaumāreti'; kaumāraṃ navayauvanam, tadakṛtakapremāsakṛttayā yo 'tivāhitavān sa kaumāraharaḥ varaḥ svayaṃvṛtaḥ, natu pitrādibhirgrāhitaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:433: caitro vasanta;, tatra jātikadambābhāvāt, mālatī vāsantikā /

GK16visah_cu:444: "sati hetau phalābhāve viśeṣoktiḥ" iti ca lakṣaṇasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt;
GK16visah_cu:449: tathā hi kāraṇābhāve phalāt kāraṇasadbhāve phalābhāvācca vismayasya utthāpitattvāttat sthāyibhāvako 'dbhutarasaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:452: kiṃ vā sa eva rasābhāsādbhutarasasyāṅgamiti prayo 'laṅkāracha,
GK16visah_cu:455: sphuṭatvamati---idaṃ ca na ruciraṃ dūṣaṇaṃ, tathā hi sphuṭatvāsphuṭatve tāvat śīghrapratīyamānatvāpratīyamānatvābhyāmeva, tathā cātra kāraṇabhāvaphalābhāvayorvācakasya naño 'bhāvena tat kalpanāyā vilambenāsphuṭatvāt evaṃ tayorasphuṭatvācca sutarāṃ tanmūladarśitālaṅkārayorasphuṭatvam /
GK16visah_cu:457: (lo, u) atra hīti kāraṇābhāve kāryyotpattirvibhāvanā sā cātrāsphuṭā /
GK16visah_cu:458: ye khalu utkaṇṭhāyāḥ kāraṇāni priyasaṅgamābhāvādayaḥ, tadabhāve
GK16visah_cu:460: yadi khalu priyasaṅgamābhāvādīnāṃ kāraṇānāmasadbhāvamukhena varṇanaṃ tadeva tasyāḥ sphuṭatvam
GK16visah_cu:463: atra ca teṣu satkhapi dhṛtirnotpannetyutkaṇṭhotpattimukhena varṇitam,
GK16visah_cu:467: evamatra dvayorvibhāvanāviśeṣoktyorasphuṭārthatvāt sphuṭālaṅkāraviraha iti kāvyaprakāśakṛto matam /
GK16visah_cu:469: tathāpi tadubhayārabdhasandehe saṅkarālaṅkārasya sphuṭatvāt kathaṃ sphuṭālaṅkāraviraha iti
GK16visah_cu:474: rasānvitaṃ kaviḥ kurvan kīrtiṃ prītiṃ ca vindati" //
GK16visah_cu:482: viśeṣaścātra sarasāviti vacane śrutyarthatvena saguṇāviti vacanaṃ samanantaroktarītyānarthakam
GK16visah_cu:495: na ca tadapi kāvyameveti vācyaṃ vyaṅgyasyāsvādyatvavaśādeva kāvyātmatvakathanāt /
GK16visah_cu:497: abodhyatvādeva tasya vaicitryam, natvāsvādyavyaṅgyatvam, tathā hi--
GK16visah_cu:500: '; ityatra yaḥ pūrṇakalaśo vyaṅgyastasyābodhyatāyāmeva kavestātparyyādatraiva vaicitryeṇa alaṅkāra eva prahelikā /
GK16visah_cu:501: yattu asphuṭākhye guṇībhūte vyaṅgye kṛcchragamyatvaṃ tatra kṛcchragamyatāyāṃ na kavestātparyyamatastasya
GK16visah_cu:505: mayāpi "vākyaṃ rasātmakaṃ kāvyam'; iti vakṣyamāṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:515: kaṃ saṃjaghāna kṛṣṇaḥ kaṃ balavantaṃ na bādhate śītam" //
GK16visah_cu:517: tathā hi--dārāṇāṃ bhāryyāṇāṃ poṣaṇe ratāḥ ke ? śītambuvāhinī gaṃgā kā
GK16visah_cu:518: ? kaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ saṃjaghāna ? balavantaṃ kaṃ na bādhate śītam ? iti praśnaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:524: (vi, pha) nanu yadi vyaṅgyo rasa eva kāvyasyātmā tadā vastuno vyaṅgyatve kathaṃ kāvyatvamityāśaṅkate "nanu rasādimātreti" /
GK16visah_cu:527: attā ettha ṇimajjai ettha ahaṃ diasaaṃ paloehi /
GK16visah_cu:528: mā pahia rattiandhia sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi //
GK16visah_cu:531: (vi, ba) attā ettheti--- "śvaśrūratra nimajjati atrāhaṃ divasakaṃ
GK16visah_cu:534: " rātryandhatvena kathitātmānaṃ svagṛhe kṛtāvāsaṃ pathikaṃ prati
GK16visah_cu:539: (lo, ṝ) atteti--divasakamiti kāle karma, atra puṃścalīvacanena mat
GK16visah_cu:547: ityādau vastumātrasya vyaṅgyatve kathaṃ kāvyavyavahāra iti cet ?
GK16visah_cu:558: anyathā "devadatto grāmaṃ yāti" iti vākye tadbhṛtyasya
GK16visah_cu:560: astviti cet ? na, rasavata eva kāvyatvāṅgīkārāt /
GK16visah_cu:561: kāvyasya prayojanaṃ hi rasāsvādasukhapiṇḍadānadvārā vedaśāstravimukhānāṃ sukumāramatīnāṃ rājaputrādīnāṃ vineyānāṃ "rāmādivatpravartitavyaṃ na
GK16visah_cu:569: tathā ca---"śūnyaṃ vāsagṛhamityādi'; "yaḥ kaumārahara'; ityādiślekeṣu tādṛśopadeśābhāve 'pi kāvyatvamakṣuṇṇam /
GK16visah_cu:571: (lo, ḷ) kāvyasyeti--ayamarthaḥ, rasāsvāda eva mukhaṃ piṇḍasya dvāreṇa taduktam--- "svādukāvyarasonmiśraṃ vākyārthamupayuñjate /
GK16visah_cu:592: nanu tarhi prabandhāntarvartināṃ keṣāṃcinnīrasānāṃ padyānāṃ kāvyatvaṃ na syāditi cet ? na, rasavatpadyāntargatanīrasapadānāmiva padyarasena,
GK16visah_cu:594: yattu nīraseṣvapi guṇābhivyañjakavarṇasadbhāvaddoṣābhāvādalaṅkārasadbhāvācca kāvyavyavahāraḥ sa rasādimatkāvyabandhasāmāyādrauṇa eva /
GK16visah_cu:604: yadyapi varṇo guṇasyaiva vyañjako na kriyāyāstathāpi atra varṇapadaṃ varṇādiparaṃ bodhyam
GK16visah_cu:614: atra vācyapadaṃ pratīyamānapadārthavyaṅgyabhinnaparam, tena lakṣaṇārthasyāpi parigrahaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:624: "rasyate iti rasaḥ" iti vyutpattiyogādbhāvatadābhāsādayo 'pi gṛhyante tatra raso yathā--
GK16visah_cu:631: (lo, ai) evaṃ prāktanalakṣaṇānāṃ prameyavirodhaṃ darśayitvā svalakṣaṇāmavatārayati /
GK16visah_cu:635: rasyate āsvādyate, svādaḥ kāvyārthasambhedādātmānandasamudbhava ityuktaprakāraḥ, karmatvaṃ rasādīnāmupacārāt /
GK16visah_cu:637: tadābhāsāḥ rasābhāsā bhāvābhāsāśca ādiśabdāt bhāvasya śāntirudayaḥ sandhiḥ śabalatā ca /
GK16visah_cu:639: śūnyaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ vilokya śayanādutthāya kiñcicchanairnidrāvyājamupāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyurmukham /
GK16visah_cu:640: vistrabdhaṃ paricumbya jātapulakāmālokya gaṇḍasthalīṃ lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa isatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā //
GK16visah_cu:645: atra vilokyetyādikrameṇaiva sakalakriyāṇāṃ pūrvāparabhāvaḥ ktvānirddiṣṭo bodhyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:649: viśrabdhaṃ nidrāniścayena jātāśvāsaṃ, yathā syāt tathā
GK16visah_cu:650: cumbanakriyāviśeṣaṇamidam, ālokya lajjānamramukhī jātā iti śeṣaḥ mukhena
GK16visah_cu:653: etat paryyantākriyāsu bālā karttre, hāsapriyacumbanasya tu karma /
GK16visah_cu:658: tā eva nāyakarateruddīpanavibhāvācha, priyeṇa cumbanaṃ tadīyahāsaśca
GK16visah_cu:659: tadīyarateranubhāvau, tāveva nāyikārateruddīpanavibhāvau, ubhayābhijñe sāmājike rasotpattiḥ
GK16visah_cu:661: (lo, o) śūnyamiti-śūnyaṃ viviktaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ kelibhavanaṃ vilokya,
GK16visah_cu:662: śayanāt, śayyāyāḥ kiñcidutthāya utthitā bhūtvā śanairmandaṃ niḥ
GK16visah_cu:664: bālā nidrāvyājamuphagatasya priyasya mukhaṃ suciraṃ nirvarṇya dīrghakālaṃ vilokya samyak parīkṣya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:665: viśrabdhaṃ niḥ śaṅkaṃ yathā syāttathā paricumbya āsvādya jātapulakā utphullaromāñcāṅkitāṃ gaṇḍasthalīṃ vilokya lajjānamramukhī vrīḍāvanatavadanā satī hasatā priyeṇa ciraṃ cumbiteti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:674: utthānasya śanaistvena trāsaḥ, ciraṃ nirvarṇanena supto na veti sandehaprabhavo vitarkaḥ, viśrabdhamityanena nidrāniścayajñānena harṣaḥ,
GK16visah_cu:675: paricumbanenautsukyam, ālokanena capalatā, viśrabdhamityanena lajjā nirddiṣṭaiva /
GK16visah_cu:676: nāyakagatā ca vyājanidrāśrayeṇa dhṛtiḥ, ciraparicumbanenautsukyaṃ harṣaśca /
GK16visah_cu:684: krodhe kṣaagaṇaḥ, śare daśamukhaḥ, pāṇau pralambāsuro, dhyāne
GK16visah_cu:690: asmai yatpadopasthāpitāya kasmaicit anirvacanīyāya arthāddaśāvatāriṇe nārāyaṇāya namaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:692: uladhito 'pi matsyasya prauḍhoktyā mahattvāt tacchalkasīmni layaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:710: madhu dvirephaḥ kusumaikaṇatre papau priyāṃ svāmanuvartamānaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:714: (vi, ṣa) madhudvirepha iti---maheśatapobhaṅgāyā'kālike vasante jāte tiraścāmapi mānmathakriyāvarṇanamidam
GK16visah_cu:715: atra priyayā sāhityena madhupānaṃ priyākaṇḍūyanaṃ ca dvirephakṛṣṇasārayo rateranubhāvau /
GK16visah_cu:727: (lo, ā) doṣāḥ punariti---yeṣāṃ sadbhāvena kāvyatvaṃ khaṇiḍatamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:728: kiṃ svarūpāḥ kimākāreṇa varttante iti pūrvavad vyākhyānam /
GK16visah_cu:751: ataśca "guṇābhiñjakāḥ śabdā rasasyotkarṣakāḥ" ityuktaṃ bhavatīti prāgevoktam /
GK16visah_cu:756: śabdārthadharmāṇāmeva sambhavati rasamātradharmāṇāmeva guṇānāṃ kathaṃ taddvārakatvaṃ vyākhyātamityata āha---iheti /
GK16visah_cu:758: yadyapi varṇā eva guṇābhivyañjakā iti vakṣyante tathāpi varṇena padaṃtenārthastena ca guṇo vyajyate, ityabhiprāyeṇa arthasya guṇābhivyañjakatvamuktam /
GK16visah_cu:759: tathā ca svāvyākhyātārtha evānenopapāditaḥ svayaṃ, tathā vyākhyāne tu
GK16visah_cu:760: guṇānāṃ sākṣādrasopakārakatvenaiva kārikārthaḥ saṃgacchate iti bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:763: tat kathamidamuktamiti cet, satyam kintūtkarṣahetavaḥ proktā
GK16visah_cu:764: guṇālaṅkārarītaya ityuktau alaṅkārarītyoḥ samabhivāyahāreṇa pāṭhavaśāt tadrītikatvalābhaḥ
GK16visah_cu:769: pātitvādirūpeṇa pratipādayiṣyamāṇāḥ prācīnoktāḥ śleṣaprasādādayaḥ tadyuktaśabdaḥ cārthaśca prācīnoktaśleṣaprasādādiguṇayuktaḥ tayoḥ rasādirūpavyaṅgyānāṃ guṇānāṃ vyañjakatvena upacaryyate, tadāha kāvyaprakāśakāra eva, "guṇavṛttyā punasteṣāṃ sthitiḥ śabdārthayormatā"iti
GK16visah_cu:770: nanu bhavanmate mādhuryyādayastraya eva guṇāste ca rasamātraniṣṭāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:771: prācīnoktāḥ śleṣaprasādādayaḥ śabdārthaniṣṭatvena viṃsātiprakārāste ca bhavadbhirasvīkṛtatvena ca nirddeṣṭavyāḥ; tat kathamidānīṃ tadyuktayoḥ
GK16visah_cu:772: śabdārthayorvyañjakatvam ? ucyate na khalu teṣāmakhīkāraḥ, kintu antarbhāvitvādirūpeṇa śabdārthamātraniṣṭatvāt rasamātraniṣṭaguṇavaijātyāt na pṛthaguktiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:774: na vayaṃ teṣāṃ yathāsambhavaṃ sasadharmatvenoktānāṃ vyañjakatvaṃ na
GK16visah_cu:788: prathamoddiṣṭaṃ vākyaṃ dvitīyaparicchedena saparikaraṃ nirūpayitukāmaḥ tat sāmānyatakṣaṇapratipādikāṃ kārikāmavatārayati--vākyasvarūpamiti /
GK16visah_cu:793: padoccayasyaitadabhāve 'pi vākyatve "vahninā siñciti" ityādyapi vākyaṃ syāt /
