GK16visah_cu:800: vahninā siñcatītyanvayabodhanakasyaiva vākyatvaṃ, sekaṃ prati vanheḥ
GK16visah_cu:810: jijñāsā ca pratītapadārthātiraktapadārthaḥ; sā ca prathamapratītapadārthānvayabādhārthamutthitā bodhyā, tena gauraśva ityādau daivādaśveti jijñāsāsattve 'pi nākāṅkṣā /
GK16visah_cu:811: caitrasya bhrātā gṛhaṃ gacchatītyādau caitrasya na gṛhe ākāṅkṣā udeti bhrātari janitānvayabodhāt
GK16visah_cu:814: api nadyāḥ kacchasya sambandhikatvenopasthiteḥ nadīrūpe sambandhini tātparyyaśāt kacchānvayārthamapi kacche jijñāsa udeti iti na tatrāvyāptiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:815: vahninā siñcatītyatra tu karaṇatāyāḥ kāryaṃ vitā anupapattyā seke tat kāryye udeti eva ākāṅkṣā iti bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:816: evaṃ cākāṅkṣitaparasparasambandhe bādhaviraha eva yogyatā, anyathā anākāṅkṣitasya kālikasambandhasya vahnikaraṇatāsekayorapi sattvād yogyatā
GK16visah_cu:824: etadabhāve yogyatāyā abhāve 'pi gaurityādīnāṃ parasparamākāṅkṣāvirahiṇāṃ padānāṃ pratītiparyyavasānaviraha ityeva viśādayatiśroturjijñāsā iti /
GK16visah_cu:827: etadabhāvāt gauraśvaḥ puruṣo hastītyatra ca nānvayabodhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:830: ato "ghaṭamānaya'; iti vākyam ekadā anvayabodhejanite na anvayabodhāntarajanakam (kā-pra-ṭīdṛviśvanātha)
GK16visah_cu:832: kevalaṃ kriyāśravaṇe bodhābhāvocca kārakasya (prathamaṃ karttuḥ tataḥ karmaprabhṛtīnāṃ) jijñāsā svata evodeti /
GK16visah_cu:834: nirākāṅkṣasya vākyatve "gauraśvaḥ puruṣo istī" ityādīnāmapa vākyatvaṃ syāt
GK16visah_cu:838: atra cākāṅkṣābhāvādeva ākāṅkṣitasambandhe bādhaviraharūpā yogyataiva nāsti; ityākāṅkṣāyā evābhāvānna vākyatvam /
GK16visah_cu:839: ākāṅkṣābhāvaśca prathamāntapadārthasya prathamāntapadārthāntare bhedenānvayārthaṃ jijñāsānudayasyānubhāvikatvādeva; abhedānvayetu, bādha eva
GK16visah_cu:842: buddhivicchede 'pi vākyatve idānīmuccāritasya devadattaśabdasya dinātnaro ccāritena gacchatīti padena saṅgatiḥ syāt /
GK16visah_cu:845: (vi, gha) āsattilakṣaṇamāha--yat padabuvdyavyavadhānena yat padabuddhistenaiva saha tasyāsattirityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:850: gacchati"ityatra vaikārastu nirarthako 'pi prāmāṇikaprayukta eva bodhyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:857: tatrāsattyabhāvaṃ darśayati--buddhivicchede 'pīti--naca tatra pūrvoccāritapadārthasmṛtiryadyasti tadeṣvata eva tatra vākyatvaṃ,
GK16visah_cu:859: śabdabodhajanakatvasyāsattilakṣaṇe 'praveśena tatpadasmṛtyabhāvena śābdabodhājanakatayā vākye tatrātivyāptipradarśanasya aucityādeva /
GK16visah_cu:864: (vi, ṅa) nanu bādhajñānābhāvarūpāyā yogyatāyā jijñāsārūpāyā ākāṅkṣāyāścātmārthavṛttitvāt kathaṃ padoccayasya tadyuktatvam ityata
GK16visah_cu:866: sā ca bādhavirahasya pratiyogino bāghajñānasya viṣaye padoccaye tad viṣayatā sākṣādeva /
GK16visah_cu:881: saṃhatya sametya vākyamahāvākyayorityādiṣu pratyekaṃ vyavaccheda ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:882: sākāṅkṣāni anekapadāni, yathā devadatto daṇḍena gām /
GK16visah_cu:883: anekavākyāni ca saṃhatya samuditārthabodhānārtham itaravākyasāpekṣāṇi prabandheṣu prasiddhani
GK16visah_cu:884: tathābhūtānāṃ hi padānāṃ vākyānāṃ ca viśakalitānekārthabodhana eva bhaṭṭamate sāmarthyaṃ natvekārthabodhane
GK16visah_cu:890: kvacit vākyamātrasya kvacicca mahāvākyasya vākyatvena, dvayorapi lakṣaṇakathane ākāṅkṣāsattvāt mahāvākyalakṣaṇe 'pi yogyatādikaṃ
GK16visah_cu:892: tatrārdrakāṣṭhe vahnirjvalati tena siñcitītyatra mahāvākyatvāpattyā tadvāraṇāya yogyatāyāḥ, caitraḥ pacati, maitrau gacchati, ityetad
GK16visah_cu:894: sūnyaṃ vāsagṛhamityādi---atra sarvapadārthānāmeva uttaratra sākāṅkṣatvena kasyāpi svārthabodhasamāptyabhāvāt na mahāvākyatvam /
GK16visah_cu:907: ekaikārthavattvaṃ hi svasamasaṃkhyārthatvam; arthasya ekaikatvasya vaktumaśakyatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:908: na trividhā surā ityatra ekasurāśabdasya gauḍīpaiṣṭhīmādhvītrayabodhakatvāttatrāvyāptiriti vācyam, tatra gauḍī surā
GK16visah_cu:910: na ca taitra-maitra-devadattāḥ sundarā ityatra ekasundarapadena
GK16visah_cu:913: na ca tathāpi trividhā surā ityatrāvyāptiriti vācyam arthatāvacchedakānekatve āvṛttereva svīkārāt
GK16visah_cu:922: nacānanvitaikārthapade naiva padvāraṇamiti vācyam; abhihitānvayavāde tasyānanvitābhidhāyitvādeva
GK16visah_cu:929: atra ca vākyasyāśvitānekārthabodhakatvādekārthabodhakatvenaiva tadvāraṇasambhave 'pi tad viśeṣaṇadānamanvitābhidhānavādo 'smabhirnādriyate ityabhiprayasūcanāyaiva ityavadheyam /
GK16visah_cu:946: (vi, ṭa) ka-ca-ṭa-ta-petyādīnāmiti---nanu prayogārhetyatra prayogo noccaraṇamātraṃ, tadā pratipadikavāraṇāpatteḥ /
GK16visah_cu:949: tathā ca prayogārhapadādeva nirarthaka-ka-ca-ṭa-ta-pādīnāṃ vāraṇaṃ sāyaditi cet, satyam /
GK16visah_cu:952: tataśca tadanupādāne vākyamahāvākyayorativyāptyāpattyā tadvāraṇāyānanvitetyasya dānāvaśmyabhāve tadanurodhena tadviśeṣasyārthasya bodhakatvamupādeyam /
GK16visah_cu:958: bahuvacanamavivakṣitaṃ tenaikasya varṇāsya dvayorapi ca parigrahaḥ evaṃ ca mayi sānugraho bhavetyatra akārasya ekavarṇasya vāsudevasambandhoktasya na padatvahāniḥ /
GK16visah_cu:961: artho vācyaśva lakṣyaśca vyaṅgyaśceti tridhā mataḥ // VisSd_2.2 //
GK16visah_cu:964: vyaṅgyo vyañjanayā tāḥ syustistraḥ śabdasya śaktayaḥ // VisSd_2.3 //
GK16visah_cu:971: (lo, u) tatrābhihitānvayavādināṃ mate vākyārtho 'pi padabhidheya iti vakṣyeta /
GK16visah_cu:972: ānvatābhidhānavādināṃ mate ca vākyābhidheyaḥ, lakṣyaśca padamātrasyārthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:974: ye cānvitādayo lakṣye vākyārthe iti ūcuḥ tanmate tatparyyavṛttireva vākyārthabodhikā, dvitīyalakṣaṇetyaparaṃ nāma /
GK16visah_cu:975: nanu tatra gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau taṭārthabodhikā vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇā vṛttiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:978: vyañjanāprastāve lakṣaṇāprastāve tu bhaṭṭamate "sā vṛttirvyañjanā nāma śabdasyārthādikasya ca'; iti vakṣyati /
GK16visah_cu:985: abhidheti abhidhīyate bodhyate iti yogārtha eva lakṣaṇam; tatra kasyārthasya bodhanāttādṛśo yogārtha ityatrāha saṃketiteti /
GK16visah_cu:989: evaṃ cāgṛhītavṛttikārthabodhikā vyañjanā kathaṃ vāriteti vācyam /
GK16visah_cu:993: lakṣaṇā tu śaktigrahottaraṃ bādhāvatāre satyeva gṛhyate /
GK16visah_cu:999: uttamavṛddhena madhyamavṛddhamuddiśya "gāmānaya" ityukte taṃ gavānayanapravṛttamupalabhya bālo 'sya vākyasya
GK16visah_cu:1000: "sāsnādimatpiṇḍānayanamarthaḥ" iti prathamaṃ pratipadyate, anantaraṃ ca "gāṃ badhāna" "aśvamānaya" ityādāvāvāpodvāpābhyāṃ gośabdasya "sāsnādimānarthaḥ" ānayanapadasya ca "āharaṇamarthaḥ" iti saṃketamavadhārayati /
GK16visah_cu:1003: (vi, ḍha) tatra vṛddhavyavahāradarśanārthaḥ saṃketagrahaḥ; tat prakāraṃ darśayati--uttameti
GK16visah_cu:1018: vyutpannānāmeva vākyārthapratītiḥ, vyutpattiśca vṛddhaprayogādeva, sa ca vākyarūpa eva, vākyaṃ cānvitabodhaniyatam /
GK16visah_cu:1020: nanu tarhi vākyabhāgarūpeṣu padeṣu padārthabodhavyatirekeṇa bhinnavākyaniṣṭeṣu padeṣu kathamarthāvabodha ityata āha---anantaraṃ ceti /
GK16visah_cu:1022: vṛddhavyavahāraśca vākyenaiva, tathāpi yasya padarūpasya vākyabhāgasya bodhe yasyārthabhāgasyāvāpaḥ, yaduddhāre coddhārastasmen padārthe tasya padasya śaktirāvāpoddharadarśanenaivānugṛhītatayār'thāpattyāvagamyata iti
GK16visah_cu:1023: evaṃ cātra pakṣe pratyayānumānārthāpattibhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ saṃketagraha iti sūcitam /
GK16visah_cu:1033: anumiti śarīraṃ ca-yeyaṃ prayojya vṛddhasya pravṛttiḥ sā etadanuguṇabuddhi pūrvikā; pravṛttitvāt; madīyaivaṃvidhapravṛttivat /
GK16visah_cu:1034: sā ca pravṛttiretatprayogajanyā; etadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāditi dvayamāśrayabhūtasya vākyasya vācakatvaniyamanaṃ, viṣayabhūtasya vācyatvaniyamanam ātmā-svarūpaṃ yasyāḥ tathābhūtāṃ
GK16visah_cu:1035: śaktiṃ vācakavācyatvarūpaṃ sambandham anyathānupapattyā arthāt prayojakavṛddhapravṛtterjānāti
GK16visah_cu:1036: nanvevaṃ bhinnavākyayogāt prativākyaṃ vyutpattirevekṣaṇīyā, sāvācyā durupapādyeti śabdavyavahārecchede ityata āha--arthāpattyā ca iti /
GK16visah_cu:1037: atra cakāreṇa bodhe tu śaktiṃ dūyātmikāmityasyā parāmarśaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1038: avabudhyate iti pāṭhe tvarthata eva tat parāmarśaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1039: evaṃ cāyamarthaḥ; gṛhītasaṃketavākyabhāgarūpasya tadarthadvayātmikāṃ śaktiṃ vācyavācakasambaddhām avāpoddhāradarśanānugṛhītatayā arthāpattyā jānātīti /
GK16visah_cu:1052: yadāhuḥ--"sādṛśyaṃ dharmamātraṃ ca vaisādṛśyaṃ ca bhedataḥ"iti; tatra sādṛśye gosadṛśo gavayaḥ
GK16visah_cu:1056: padaiḥ samabhivyāhārat madhukarapadārtho bhramara iti saṅketamavadhārayati
GK16visah_cu:1057: etacca upalakṣaṇaṃ; tena gosadṛśo gavayaḥ kākavisadṛśaḥ kokila ityanayorupamānapramāṇena saṅketagrahaḥ sūcitaḥ kvacit śabdapramāṇa ityata
GK16visah_cu:1062: taṃ ca saṅketitamarthaṃ bodhayantī śabdasya śaktyantarānantaritā
GK16visah_cu:1067: lakṣaṇā hi abhidhāntaritaiva; vyañjanā yatra lakṣaṇā nāsti tatrābhidhāntaritā /
GK16visah_cu:1068: taddvitīyāntaritā, yad vā, agrimetyanena yannāmā yatra caitrādiḥ tannāmāviṣayatayāpi sa ityuktaprakārādāśrita caitretyādinānnā viṣayoderiva
GK16visah_cu:1075: prabhinneti-- atra madhupadaṃ pibatipadaṃ ca prasiddham /
GK16visah_cu:1081: saṅketo gṛhyate jātau guṇadravyakriyāsu ca // VisSd_2.4 //
GK16visah_cu:1084: śuklādayo hi gavādiraṃ sajātīyebhyaḥ kṛṣṇagavādibhyo vyāvartayanti /
GK16visah_cu:1088: eṣveva hi vyakterupādhiṣu saṃketo gṛhyate, na vyaktauḥ ānantyavyabhicāradoṣāpātāt /
GK16visah_cu:1091: (vi, ta) nanu saṃketitor'thaḥ kiṃ dharmo dharmo vā
GK16visah_cu:1095: vastudharmaḥ sa siddho nitya ityāha--siddho vastudharma iti---etanmeta
GK16visah_cu:1100: tadaṅgīkarttṝṇāṃ mate tu ayamapi jātiśabda eva /
GK16visah_cu:1112: yadi ca ekavyaktāveva saṃketagraha ityucyate tadāha---vyabhicāreti /
GK16visah_cu:1113: yadvyaktau saṃketo gṛhītastatabhinnastatsajātīyavyaktāvapi svarūpodbodhāt kāraṇaṃ śaktigrahaṃ vināpi kāryyabodhād vyabhicārajoṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1115: (lo, ḷ) iha kecidāhuḥ; jātireva padārthaḥ, kecit jātivyaktī, kecid vyaktyākṛtijātaya ityādīni matāntarāṇi parihṛtya sarveṣāṃ vāṅmayānā vyākaraṇamūlatvāt alaṅkāraprantheṣu ca prāyeṇa tadanugatatvenaiva
GK16visah_cu:1123: hetuṃ vināpi ayaṃ ḍitthaḥ ḍavittha ityādirūpeṇaṃ śṛṅgagrāhikayā vaktṛsaṃketena vyaktiṣu sānniveśitaḥ
GK16visah_cu:1124: sajātīyaśūnye ḍitthādyarthopasthāpakaḥ śabdaḥ saṃketasya viṣaya iti /
GK16visah_cu:1127: iha ca dravyasyopādhiviṣayatvāsambhave 'pi tatsaṃjñāyāḥ upādhitvena tattvamupacārāt /
GK16visah_cu:1128: ḍitthādyarthe cānantyavyabhicārābhāvāt upādhiṃ vinaiva sambhavati vācyavācakasambandhasamayagraha iti nopādhirapekṣyate /
GK16visah_cu:1131: ata eva guṇadravyakiyāsu ceti dravyakiyāsu ceti dravyasya
GK16visah_cu:1133: ānantyeti-vyaktīnāmanantatvāt pratyekaṃ ca rekhoparekhādisaṃsthānaviśeṣasya ca bhinnatvāt tatrāśakyaḥ sabhayagraha iti /
GK16visah_cu:1134: nanvevaṃ gavādipadena saṃketitatvāt jātāvantarhitāyāṃ kathaṃ vyaktipratītiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1137: cātrānupalabdhibādhitaṃ; tatrānupayogitayā vyakteḥ śabdabodhitatvaṃ vinā śābde 'nvaye praveśāsambhava iti jātyabhidhāyake śabde tadbonārthaṃ vyañjanaiva vṛttirūpāsitumuciteti rahasyam /
GK16visah_cu:1139: kiṃ ca saṃśayāpagamārtham upāttāni padāni saṃsargasya mukhyāṅgaṃ saṃsṛjyamānaṃ vyaktirūpaṃ sākṣānna bodhayanti, bahiraṅgantu tadupādhibhūtaṃ sāmānyameva bodhayanti, ityasaṅgatam /
GK16visah_cu:1140: ye tvāhuḥ, "vyaktisadhrīcīnāyāmeva jātau saṅketa'; iti tairapi prakṛtasya lakṣaṇasyāsaṅketitatvāt
GK16visah_cu:1142: sāmānyasya sarvaviśeṣatvāṅgīkārāt saṅketena sarvaviśeṣyajñāne tu sarvasyāpi sarvajñatvāpattiḥ
GK16visah_cu:1143: prathamoddeśakāle tu sarvavyaktīnāṃ sāmmukhyāṅgīkāratayā sāmānyaliṅgitayā pratyaṅgīkāre punarādhunikasyāpi svalakṣaṇasya prathamopadeśakālavat sammukhīkāreṇaiva pratītiḥ syāt /
GK16visah_cu:1144: tataścānvayopapādikāyāḥ sākṣāt pratīteḥ padasya śaktyantaraṃ vinā kiṃ bījabhityalaṃ bahunā
GK16visah_cu:1154: gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau mukhyārthasya gaṅgāyā abādhāt; kintu aparapadārthasya ghoṣānvayasyaiva bādhāt /
GK16visah_cu:1157: na kevalaṃ mukhyārthabādhajñānādhīnaṃ tajjñānaṃ, api tu rūḍheḥ
GK16visah_cu:1160: tathā ca etattritayajñāpitayā yā vṛttyā mukhyārthādanyo
GK16visah_cu:1162: sā cārpitā vaktṛpuruṣeṇa lakṣyārthaviṣayatayā-janitetyarthaḥ, tathā ca vaktṛtātparyyatmikaiva sā bodhyā /
GK16visah_cu:1164: yā tu vyaṅgyārthe tātparyyakhyā vṛttirdhvanikenoktā yā ca padārthadvayasaṃsarge tātparyyākhyā vṛttiḥ prācīvanaiyāyikairuktā sā
GK16visah_cu:1166: mukhyārthe 'parapadārthānvayabodhe 'pi tātparyyaviṣayasya tādṛśānvayasya mukhyatāvacchedakarūpeṇa bodhānupapattireva; tena chatriṇo gacchanti kuntāḥ praviśantītyatra mukhyārthayoḥ chatrikuntayoḥ gamanapraveśānvayasattve 'pi niruktamukhyārthabādhasattvānnāvyāptiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1168: atra ca tātparyyaviṣayatvānupādāne tu chatrikuntayorgamanapraveśānvayasya mukhyatāvacchedakaccha
GK16visah_cu:1171: tātparyyaviṣayasya chatrisārthavāhino gamanānvayasya kuntinaḥ praveśānvayasya ca lakṣatāvacchedakacchatrisārthavāhitvakuntitvābhyāmupapatteḥ
GK16visah_cu:1173: tena ghaṭapadasya nīlaghaṭe lakṣaṇāyāṃ tasya ghaṭanyatvābhāve 'pi
GK16visah_cu:1177: (lo, e) atheti-athābhidhānantaraṃ lakṣaṇoddeśakramaprāptā lakṣaṇā nirūṇyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1178: mukhyārtheti---mukhyārtho gaṅgādiśabdasya jalamayādiḥ tasya ca ādheyapadārthāntare 'nvayānupapattau, na ca yataḥ kutaścit yadeva tadeva
GK16visah_cu:1180: tena mukhyārthena yena kenacit sambandhena sambaddhaḥ anyor'thaḥ
GK16visah_cu:1181: taṭādiḥ yayā śabdaśaktyā pratīyate bodhyate; na ca sambandhamātrādapi
GK16visah_cu:1182: lakṣyārthapratītiḥ api prasaṅgādeva ityāha--rūḍheḥ prayojanād vā /
GK16visah_cu:1183: kvacid rūḍheḥ anādivṛddhavyavahāraprasiddheḥ kvacit pāvanatvādyatiśayaṃ prayojanamuddiśya
GK16visah_cu:1185: evaṃ cātra lakṣaṇāyāṃ hetutrayaṃ mukhyārthabādaḥ; ca tat sambandhaḥ,
GK16visah_cu:1189: ñasaṃbhavan yayā śabdaśaktyā svasaṃyuktān puruṣādīn pratyāyayati, yayā ca "gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ" ityādau gaṅgādiśabdo jalamayādirūpārthavācakatvātprakṛte
GK16visah_cu:1190: 'saṃbhavan svasya sāmīpyādisaṃbandhasaṃbandhinaṃ taṭādiṃ bodhayati, sā śabdasyārpitā svābhaviketarā īśvarānudbhāvitā vā śaktirlakṣaṇā nāma /
GK16visah_cu:1192: uttaratra "gaṅgātaṭe ghoṣaḥ" iti pratipādanālabhyasya śītatvapāvanatvātiśayasya bodhanarūpaṃ prayojanam /
GK16visah_cu:1193: hetuṃ vināpi yasya kasyacitsaṃbandhino lakṣaṇo 'tiprasaṅgaḥ syāt,
GK16visah_cu:1209: rūḍhiprayojanaśūnyā, lakṣaṇā tu neyārtha iti vakṣyate, sā ca kāvye
GK16visah_cu:1217: ayamarthaḥ--gaṅgadiśabdo yasmāt jalamayādirūpamevārthaṃ samayasmaraṇākātaraḥ san smārayati, tasmād vācyarūpasya jalādyarthasya
GK16visah_cu:1218: ghoṣādyarthena sahānvayānupapattyā prakṛte vācakatvena tasya prayogo na ghaṭata iti /
GK16visah_cu:1221: sambandhasyānvayasya, taddhi taṭaśabdārthaṃ yayā bodhayatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1222: bhaṭṭamate svābhāvikī abhidhā, tadanyā padasya śaktirvyāpāraḥ,
GK16visah_cu:1227: pūrvatra kaliṅgaḥ sāhasika ityatra, uttaratra gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau
GK16visah_cu:1228: gaṅgātaṭa ityādau taṭasya gaṅgāśabdena pratipādanāt gaṅgātādātmyapratīteḥ gaṅgārthaniṣṭānāṃ naṭārthaniṣṭhātiśayitānāṃ śītatvapāvanatvādīnāṃ pratītirlakṣaṇāyāḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1237: vyutpattilabhyasya mukhyārthatve "gauḥ śete" ityatrāpi lakṣaṇā syāt /
GK16visah_cu:1244: dakṣasyaiva mukhyārthatvāditi---bhūriprayogeṇa dakṣatvasya laghutvena ca tadacchinnasyaiva śakyatvena mukhyatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1247: tathā ca tenaiva nimittena śabdasya pravṛttestadavacchinna eva mukhyārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1248: lakṣyārthe kvacit prayogastu tātparyyaviśeṣasatve eva; yathā dakṣe śaktasya kuśalapadasya gṛhaviśeṣe śaktasya maṇḍapapadasya ca daivakarmaṇi kuśala iti rogī maṇḍapa iti ca tayodavakarmarogipadasamabhivyāharasya tātparyyagrāhakatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:1249: gauḥ śete ityatra śete iti suptagoḥ- pradarśanārthameva /
GK16visah_cu:1250: gaurastīti suptagavi prayoge 'pi lakṣaṇā syāditi bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:1254: "uṇādayo bahulam'; iti sūtreṇa vadataḥ pāṇineḥ ayamabhiprāyo yaduṇādipratyayānāṃ prāyikyeva vyutpattiriti, tathā ca na tayā prayogaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1255: tathā ca gotvenaiva rūpeṇa rūḍhiśaktyā gopadaṃ svapadagacchad gosādhāraṇyena prayujyate, na uṇādi-pratyayavyutpattyā iti /
GK16visah_cu:1263: gośabdo yadyapi gamanārtho vyutpattinimittaṃ tathāpi gotvāpattikiyaiva pravṛttinimittam ata eva gacchatyāgacchati gavi gośabdaprayogaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1266: tadbhedāniti;--tayoḥ rūḍhiprayojanābhyāṃ dvidhoktayorlakṣaṇayorbhedān viśeṣān bhidyate 'nena iti bheda iti vyutpattyā /
GK16visah_cu:1279: atra tātparyyaviṣayatvaṃ yadi anvayaviśeṣaṇaṃ na kriyate tadā chatriṇe gacchanti kuntāḥ praviśanti ityādiṣu avyāptiḥ syāt; atra tātparyyāviṣayasya śuddhaśakyārthasyānvayasiddhisambhavena
GK16visah_cu:1290: anayorhi śvetādibhiḥ kuntādibhiścācetanatayā kevalairdhāvanapraveśanakriyayoḥ kartṛtayānvayamalabhamānairetatsiddhaye ātmasambandhino 'śvādayaḥ puruṣāda yaścākṣipyante /
GK16visah_cu:1295: kuntā iti kuntavanta ityarthaḥ anayormukhyārthānvayabādhaṃ darśayati
GK16visah_cu:1297: śvetādibhirityādipadāt nīlādiguṇānāṃ kuntādibhirityādi padāt astrāntarāṇāṃ ca parigrahaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1302: aśvādaya ityādipadacchvetagavādeḥ, puruṣādayaḥ ityādipadāt kuntadhārivat itarasya parigrahaḥ
GK16visah_cu:1318: (lo, au) mukhyārtheti---mukhyābhidheyor'thaḥ tasya itaraḥ prakṛtanirvāhaupāyikaḥ, tasyākṣepaḥ ākṛṣya upanayanam /
GK16visah_cu:1330: atra arpaṇamityatra paratraiveti śeṣaḥ, svasya paramātraviṣayatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1332: upādānalakṣaṇāyāṃ tu mukhyārthasyāpi viṣayatā iti bhedaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1334: tathā ca vākyārthe bodhye parasya amukhyārthasya anvayasiddhaye anvayabodhāya yasyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ svasya arpaṇaṃ paramātraviṣayatā; eṣā lakṣaṇalakṣaṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1346: atra kaliṅgaḥ sāhasika iti na pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1347: kintu kaliṅgaḥ sāhasaṃ karoti ityeva pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1349: ubhayatraiva mukhyārthaṃ kaliṅgarūpaṃ deśaṃ pravāharūpāṃ saṅgā ca vihāya taddeśasthapuruṣatattīrayoḥ
GK16visah_cu:1355: kaliṅgagaṅgāśabdau ityatra kaliṅgagaṅgāśabādapadaṃ tanniṣṭhalakṣaṇādvayaparaṃ yathā vyākhyātārthanusāreṇa bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:1362: "apakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kimucyate sujanatā prathitā bhavatā param /
GK16visah_cu:1363: vidadhadīdṛśameva sadā sakhe ! sukhitamāssva tataḥ śaradāṃ śatam" //
GK16visah_cu:1372: tvayā bahu upakṛtaṃ tatra kimucyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1379: kintu apakāradurjanatvalakṣaṇayoḥ phalaṃ sambodhyasya kauṭilyaṃ duḥ khitalakṣaṇāyāstu kauṭilyaphalatvam
GK16visah_cu:1396: viṣayiṇā anigīrṇasya viṣayasya tenaiva saha tādātmyapratītikṛtsāropā /
GK16visah_cu:1402: tasya anigārṇṇasya anācchāditasya arthāt svavācakanāmapadena uktasya anyatādātmyaṃ śakyārthābhedaḥ
GK16visah_cu:1404: nigīrṇṇasya viśiṣya svāvācaka-nāmapadena anuktasya tu sādhyavasānikā
GK16visah_cu:1407: tatpratītikṛcca yadyapi samānavibhaktikapadadvayameva, na tu lakṣaṇā;
GK16visah_cu:1411: ākhyātena lakṣyārthasyoktau tat pratīteḥ; taccāgre darśayiṣyate /
GK16visah_cu:1413: (lo, i) evaṃ caturvidhāpi lakṣaṇā pratyekaṃ sāropā sādhyavasānā
GK16visah_cu:1417: evaṃ svaśabdārthanāmnā gatārthe 'pi sphuṭīkaraṇāya lakṣaṇena nirddiśati--viṣayasyeti /
GK16visah_cu:1439: svasamaveta ityanena samavāyarūpasya lakṣaṇāhetoḥ svasambandhasya nigaraṇaṃ śvetaguṇa āropyamāṇaḥ
GK16visah_cu:1440: prayojana ityanantaraṃ pūrvoktā upādānalakṣaṇā sāropeti anuṣajyate /
GK16visah_cu:1464: (vi, va) kaliṅgaḥ puruṣa iti---atra puruṣapadena lakṣyārthopādānāt anigīrṇṇatvam /
GK16visah_cu:1470: āyuridamiti sādhyavasānāyamavyabhicāra iti dvayoḥ pṛthak prayojanadvayamuktam /
GK16visah_cu:1471: kāryyakāraṇabhāvarūpasambandhena sāropāṃ lakṣaṇāmuktvā sambandhāntarairapi tāṃ darśayati---rājarkāyetīti
GK16visah_cu:1472: atra asāvitipadena lakṣyārthe puruṣe nirddiṣṭe rājño 'bhedāropāt
GK16visah_cu:1483: (vi, śa) itthaṃ sāropāmuktvā "nigīrṇṇasya matā sādhyavasānikā'; iti kārikāñcalaṃ vyācaṣṭe-nigīrṇṇasya punariti /
GK16visah_cu:1484: asyāścaturṣviti rūḍhiprayojanadvaye upādānalakṣaṇādvayaṃ taddvaye lakṣaṇalakṣaṇādvayaṃ ceti sādhyavasānāyaścatvārobhedāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1485: pūrvodāharaṇānyeveti rūḍhāvupādānalakṣaṇāyāḥ---"śveto dhāvati'; iti prayojane upādānalakṣaṇāyāḥ "kuntāḥ praviśanti'; iti yaddvayamudāhṛtaṃ rūḍhau lakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyāḥ "kaliṅgaḥ sāhasaṃ karoti'; iti prayojane lakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyāṃ tu rājakīye puruṣe gacchati "rājāsau gacchati'; iti yadudāhṛtaṃ tatra idaṃ padatyāgena udāharaṇamityata etāni catvāri sādhyavasānāyā udāharaṇānītyarthaḥ rājā gacchatītyatra rājavat paricārakaveṣṭitatvaṃ prayojanam /
GK16visah_cu:1486: eteṣu caturṣu hi kartryā khyātenaiva kartṛlakṣyārthasya upasthāpanāt nāmapadena tu anupasthānānnigīrṇṇatā
GK16visah_cu:1489: gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa iti tu lakṣaṇalakṣaṇodāharaṇaṃ yaddarśetaṃ tattu na sādhyavasānodāharaṇam /
GK16visah_cu:1491: evaṃ ca rūḍhau lakṣaṇalakṣaṇedāharaṇaṃ kaliṅga ityādikaṃ yaduktaṃ tatra sāhasika iti prāmādikaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1492: nāmapadena sāhasika ityanena lakṣyārthasya puruṣasyopādānāt sāropatvena sādhyavasānatvābhāvāt
GK16visah_cu:1493: kintu kaliṅgaḥ sāhasaṃ karoti ityeva tatra pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1494: itthamupādānalakṣaṇālakṣaṇalakṣaṇayoḥ rūḍhiprayojanahetukatvena caturvidhayoḥ sāropāsādhyavasānikārūpatvena dvaiguṇyāt aṣṭavidhatvam /
GK16visah_cu:1496: (lo, u) evamārope rūḍhiprayojanayorudāharaṇe catuṣṭayaṃ darśayitvā viṣayavyāptyarthaṃ sambandhabhedena
GK16visah_cu:1497: vetyādi---rājāsau ityatra pūrvavat adaḥ śabdena viṣayaprakaṭanam /
GK16visah_cu:1499: atra hastāvayave 'gre 'pi hastaśabdaprayogaḥ, ekadeśadāhe 'pi grāmo dagdha iti vat /
GK16visah_cu:1500: atra idaṃśabdo rājā asau ityatra ca adaḥ śabdavat /
GK16visah_cu:1510: sādṛśyetarasambandhāḥ kāryyakāraṇabhāvādirūpāḥ pūrvadarśitāḥ sakalā aṣṭavidhā api suddhāḥ śuddhaparibhāṣitāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1511: sādṛśyasambandhāttu tā aṣṭavidhā gauṇyaḥ sādṛśyaghaṭakarūpaśakyaguṇayogarūpayogārthena gauṇyo gauṇīparibhāṣitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1514: (lo ū) evamaṣṭavidhāpi lakṣaṇā pratyekaṃ śuddhā gauṇī ceti
GK16visah_cu:1523: (vi, sa) pūrvoktodāharaṇānyeva iti---śveto dhāvatītyādīni, indrārthā sthūṇā ityantāni sakalāni eva /
GK16visah_cu:1528: atra tailaśabdastilabhavasneharūpaṃ mukhyārthamupādāyaiva sārṣapādiṣu sneheṣu vartate /
GK16visah_cu:1531: (lo, ṛ) etānīti---atra tailaśabdasya tilabhavastrehamātravācakatvāt prakṛte tasya kevalasya sukhamayatvādivivakṣaṇat mukhyārthabādaḥ;
GK16visah_cu:1532: prayojanābhāvāt rūḍiḥ upādānalakṣaṇātvaṃ mukhyārthamupādāyaiva iti vṛttyā smāritam /
GK16visah_cu:1533: streheṣu varttata ityanena ubhayoḥ streharūpatvāt sādṛśyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1537: rājakumāreṣu tatsadṛśeṣu ca gacchatsu"ete rājakumārā gacchanti" /
GK16visah_cu:1541: tilasyedamiti yogārthavaśāttasya mukhyārthatvaṃ, tasya cikkaṇatākāritvena sādṛśyāśrayaṃ śakyalakṣyobhayamevātra taila śabdārtha
GK16visah_cu:1545: ubhayatraiva etāni ete iti sarvanāmapadena lakṣyārthopādānāt tatra śakyārthatādātmyāropācca sāropā lakṣaṇā /
GK16visah_cu:1554: atra sarvanāmapadena lakṣyārthānupasthāpanānna sāropā, kintu śakyārthāvyāvarttakena śakyalakṣyasādhāraṇyena sukhapadena lakṣyārthopasthāpanāttasyācchādanarūpā nigīrṇṇatā /
GK16visah_cu:1566: atra duḥ khadāyitvena kaṇṭakasadṛśaḥ gauḍendro lakṣyārthaḥ svaśabdenaivopāttaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1581: takṣyārthasya kenāpi padena anupasthāpanāt, prathamaṃ tatra śakyatādātmyāropānupapatteḥ
GK16visah_cu:1582: kintu rājñā kaṇṭakaṃ śodhyate, ityeva pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1583: tatra karmākhyātenopasthāpite śodhye karmaṇi vaurīṇi prathamāntakaṇṭapadaśakyārthasya tādātmyāropāt
GK16visah_cu:1597: gaurvāhīka ityādietasmin udāharaṇe yathā prayojane lakṣaṇalakṣaṇā sāropā gauṇī /
GK16visah_cu:1599: evaṃ gaurjalpatītyatrāpi prayojane lakṣaṇalakṣaṇā sādhyavasānā gauṇī
GK16visah_cu:1608: (vi, ga) atra keciditi---svārtho gotvaṃ tatsahacāriṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1611: tathā ca jaḍatvena rūpeṇa vāhīkaḥ śaktyaiva, jaḍo vāhīka iti
GK16visah_cu:1614: ayaṃ ca doṣaḥ tat siddhāntānavakalenādeva dharme lakṣaṇayā eva dharmiṇi śaktigrāhakatvasya taiḥ siddhāntitatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:1615: gośabdārtheti---sakṛduccāritasya śabdasya sakṛdarthabodhanena śabdavirityā abhidhāyā api virateriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1618: vṛtterlakṣaṇāyāmantarbhāvaṃ darśayan ekatrāpi udāharaṇe vipratipattinirāsena sarvamapi sāmañjasyaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāha--atreti /
GK16visah_cu:1619: gaurvāhīka ityatra svārtho gauḥ; lakṣyante lakṣaṇayā bodhyante te tatra lakṣitā guṇāḥ; cakāreṇa na khalu teṣāṃ lakṣitatvamātreṇa viśrantiriti, vāhīkārthasyābhidhāne 'bhidhayā bodane nimittībhavanti punarutthānābhāvāt śabdabuddhikarmmaṇāṃ viramya vyāpārābhāva iti nyāyāt, abhidhāntarakalpane kalpanāgauravamityāśayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1621: anye ca punargauśabdena vāhīkārtho nābhidhīyate, kintu svārthasahacāriguṇasājātyena vāhīkārthagatā guṇā eva lakṣyante /
GK16visah_cu:1625: (vi, gha) guṇā eva lakṣyanta iti---vāhīkapratītistvākṣepāditi bhāvaḥ
GK16visah_cu:1630: sājātyena sambandhena vāhīkagatā guṇā jāḍyamāndyādaya eva ;
GK16visah_cu:1632: lakṣyante lakṣaṇayā bodhyante tat samanantaroktaṃ matāntaramapi /
GK16visah_cu:1635: atra gośabdādvāhīkārthaḥ pratīyate, na vā ? ādye gośabdādeva vā ?
GK16visah_cu:1636: lakṣitādvā guṇād ? avinābhāvādvā ? tatra, na prathamaḥ, vāhīkārthe
GK16visah_cu:1650: yadi hi gośabdādvāhīkārtho na pratīyate, tadāsya vāhīkaśabdasya ca
GK16visah_cu:1659: vastutastu jātiśaktivāde jātyavinābhāvalabhyāyā vyakteḥ śābdabodhapraveśavadatrāpi tathātve bādhakābhāvāt /
GK16visah_cu:1669: tasmādatra gośabdo mukhyayāvṛttyā vāhīkaśabdena sahānvayamalabhamāno 'jñatvādisādharmyasaṃbandhādvāhīkārthaṃ lakṣayati /
GK16visah_cu:1673: (vi, ca) tathā hi gośabdasya vāhīkagatajāḍyamāndyādi guṇor'thaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1683: vāhīko 'jña iti svaśabdapratipādanālabhyam, etasyā gauṇyākhyāyā vṛttermukhyārthabādhāditritayahetukatvāt lakṣaṇāyāmantarbhāvaḥ sphuṭa eva ityāśayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1685: gaurvāhīka ityatra govāhīkaśabdayostādātmyapratītyā vāhīke jāḍyādyatiśayaḥ pratīyate iti vyartho 'yamupacāro lakṣaṇāyāsaḥ kāvyaprakāśakārasyeti caṇḍīdāsapaṇḍitānāmavicāritābhidhānam /
GK16visah_cu:1686: tathāhi sādṛśyasambandhinoriva taditarasambandhinorna sambandhaudāsīnyena vṛttiḥ; ata evānyairuktasambandhāntaraṃ lakṣyalakṣyakayoḥ sākṣāt sambandhena, sādṛśyaṃ tu gaurvāhīkāditaddharmasājātyarūpaṃ, na tatheti, ata eva kvacit taṭādau gaṅgadisambandhāt kiñcit śetyādikamastvevaṃ, kintu gaṅgāśabdena pratipādane gaṅgātvapratītau tatśaityādikamādhikaṃ pratīyate /
GK16visah_cu:1687: vāhīke punargoniṣṭānāṃ guṇānāṃ kadācinna sambhavaḥ, kintu tatsajātīyānām /
GK16visah_cu:1688: kiñca gaurvāhīka ityukte 'pi pratipattuḥ sarvathā nābhedapratipattiḥ,
GK16visah_cu:1690: taduktaṃ śārīrikamīmāṃsāvyākhyāne vācaspatimiśraiḥ---"api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena varttata'; iti yatra prayoktṛpratipattroḥ sampratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ, saca bhedapratyayapuraḥ sara iti /
GK16visah_cu:1694: upacāro hi nāmātyantaṃ viśakalitayoḥ śabdayoḥ sādṛśyātiśayamahimnā bhedapratītisthaganamātram
GK16visah_cu:1696: śuklapaṭayostu nātyantaṃ bhedapratītiḥ, tasmādevamādiṣu śuddhaiva lakṣaṇā
GK16visah_cu:1705: śauddhatvaprayojakaṃ, kintu tatraiva sādṛśyasattve eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1708: (lo, a) etadabhipretya uktaprakāreṇa lakṣaṇāviśeṣaṇayorgauṇaśuddhayorbhedaṃ darśayatiiyaṃ ceti /
GK16visah_cu:1710: upacāro nāma atyantaṃ viśakalitayorityanena sambandhasya sākṣāttvaṃ darśitam /
GK16visah_cu:1715: prayojane yā aṣṭabhedā lakṣaṇā daśitāstāḥ prayojanarūpavyaṅgyasya gūḍhāgūḍhatayā pratyekaṃ dvidhā bhūtvā ṣoḍhaśa bhedāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1727: prayojane yā aṣṭabhedā darśitā iti ṣoḍaśasu rūḍhāvaṣṭau prayojane tvaṣṭāviti darśatatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:1729: upakṛtamiti---atra granthakṛnmate 'pakāradyatiśayaḥ, anyamate tvapakāriṇaḥ kauṭilyādikaṃ prayojanaṃ, vyaṅgyavidagdhaikagamam /
GK16visah_cu:1734: kāvyaprakāśe tu śikṣādānameva lakṣyārthastatrānāyāsa eva prayojanamabhidheyavat sarvajanavedyam
GK16visah_cu:1735: taddhi prayonajamupadeśasya vākyārthasya dharmo lakṣyārthe śikṣādāne
GK16visah_cu:1736: pratīyate---upadeśāt śikṣāyāṃ cānāyāsaḥ sarvajanavedya eva iti tadabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1741: ābhyāmeva vyaṅgyasya gūḍhāgūḍhatvābhyāṃ dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyau kāvyaprakāraviśeṣau vakṣyete
GK16visah_cu:1744: etā anantaroktāḥ ṣoḍaśabhedā lakṣaṇāḥ phalasya dharmigatatvena dharmagatatvena ca pratyekaṃ dvidhā bhūtvā dvātriṃśadbhedāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1746: "strigdhaśyāmalakāntiliptaviyato velladvalākā ghanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1747: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava" //
GK16visah_cu:1755: payodasuhṛdāṃmayūrāṇām ete virahoddīpakāḥ kāmaṃ svācchandyena santu tathāpi māṃ mārayituṃ na śaktā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1756: yato rāmo 'smi, duḥ khasahiṣṇurasmi, tathātve hetumāhakaṭhoreti /
GK16visah_cu:1757: ata uktaṃ ghanādikaṃ sarvamahaṃ sahe ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1763: atrātyantaduḥkhasahiṣṇurūpe rāme dharmiṇi lakṣye tasyaivātiśayaḥ phalam /
GK16visah_cu:1769: tasyaivātiśaya iti tasyaiva duḥ khasahiṣṇo rāmasyātiśayaḥ
GK16visah_cu:1770: vipralambharūpaḥ, nacātra duḥ khasahiṣṇutvasyāpyatiśayaḥ pratīyata eva /
GK16visah_cu:1771: tat kathamidaṃ dharmagatasyodāharaṇaṃ na darśitamiti vācyam /
GK16visah_cu:1772: vivakṣitārthāvivekena tasyāpi dharmigatvādeva; tathāhi duḥ khasahiṣṇutvaṃ tāvadduḥ khadveṣābhāvastasya
GK16visah_cu:1778: atra cātiśayitāṃśo nātiprayojanaḥ sampātāyāta eva bodhyaḥ nanvatra dharmigate śītatvapāvanatve eva prayojane kiṃ na syāditicenna /
GK16visah_cu:1780: tataśca lakṣaṇayā taṭapratītau tatsambandhinoḥ tayoḥ smaraṇasyaivaṃ sambhavena vyaṅgyatvaniyamarahitayostayoratiśaya eva prayojanamityabhiprāyāt /
GK16visah_cu:1784: atreti--ayamarthaḥ; rāmo 'haṃ sarvaṃ saha ityatra rāmasya
GK16visah_cu:1786: tena phalāt atyantaduḥ khasahiṣṇū rāmo 'smi iti śabdābhidhānālabhyaṃ tathābhūtarāmaviśeṣasya evātiśayastanniṣṭameva prayojanamiti /
GK16visah_cu:1801: gūḍhāgūḍhatvābhyāṃ draiguṇyena ṣoḍaśavidhasya dharmidharmagatatvena dvaiguṇyād dvātriṃśadityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:1803: gaṅgāyāmiti--nanvidamapi ghoṣanvayavaśāt vākyameva yadi ca vākyasthaikapadasyaiva lākṣaṇikatvāttadvyaṅgyasya padagatatvaṃ tadā upakṛtaṃ bahvityatrāpi na vākyagatatvam /
GK16visah_cu:1804: upakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kimucyate iti vākyasthasyopakṛtapadasya ekasyaiva lakṣaṇikatvāditi cenna
GK16visah_cu:1807: naca kimucyate ityantasya bhinnavākyatvāt kathaṃ tayorekavākyatvamiti
GK16visah_cu:1812: evameva hi dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyadoṣaguṇālaṅkārāṇāṃ vākyaniṣṭatvam prācīnālaṅkāragranthaṣvapi prayaśo dṛśyate /
GK16visah_cu:1821: "śabdabuddhikarmaṇāṃ viramya vyāpārābhāvaḥ" iti nayenābhidhālakṣaṇātātparyākhyāsu tisṛṣu vṛttiṣu svaṃ svamarthaṃ
GK16visah_cu:1822: bodhayitvopakṣīṇāsu yathā aparo 'nyo 'nyor'tho bodhyate sā śabdasyārthasya
GK16visah_cu:1829: etannyāyāt śabdasyeva tanniṣṭhavṛtterapi viratiḥ siddhyati ityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:1836: tatrāpi lakṣaṇāyā abhāve tu prathamamate tu dvayoḥ dvitīyamate tvekasyāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1847: (vi, ḍa) anekārthasyeti---saṃyogādīn vakṣyati, tairanekārthasya śabdasya ekārthe niyantrite arthāntarabodhaṃ pratirudhya bodhite sati anyasya pratiruddhārthasya dhiyo heturyā vṛttiḥ sā vyañjanābhidhāśrayā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1853: anyasya saṃyogādisācivyābhāvāt abhidhāyā aviṣayasya buddhihetuḥ vyañjanā /
GK16visah_cu:1865: sāhacaryyaṃ-samabhivyāhṛtapadārthena saha sarvadā sthitiḥ virodhitā vairitā sāpi tādṛśāparapadārthena saha /
GK16visah_cu:1877: etanmate tu yasya padārthasyānvayabodhastasyaiva viśeṣasya smaraṇamiti /
GK16visah_cu:1879: (lo, ṛ) uktaṃ hi bhartṛhariṇā iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1904: "bhāti rathāṅgam" rathāṅgam" iti napuṃsakavyaktyā rathāṅgaṃ cakram /
GK16visah_cu:1905: svarastu veda eva viśeṣapratītikṛnna kāvya iti tasya viṣayo nodāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:1919: naca kāmadevasyāpi kopa iti vācyam, virahiṇyāṃ kupati ityarthāt /
GK16visah_cu:1922: sāmarthye madhuneti---atra madhurdaityaviśeṣe 'pi, kokilamādane vasantasyaiva sāmarthyam /
GK16visah_cu:1932: tayoḥ śaṅvacakrayorviyoge 'bhāve 'pi tameva harimevābhidhatte ityanuṣajyate, pratiṣedhasya prasaktipūrvakatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:1935: atra vadhyaghātako virodhaḥ, sahānavasthāne tu chāyātapāviti /
GK16visah_cu:1938: kāmo na tu makarākāro dhvajaḥ, tasya koparūpadharmābhāvāt /
GK16visah_cu:1941: sānnidhyaṃ na tu vadanaṃ, tasya kāmakātaratāyogyatvābhāvāt śaśī na tu karpūram /
GK16visah_cu:1944: veda eva viśeṣapratītikṛt iti anekārthavācakaśabdasya ekārthavācakatve niyantraṇarūpaḥ, tatpratyayaṃ ca svaro vede eva karoti /
GK16visah_cu:1945: yathā indraśatrurityādau ṣaṣṭītatpuruṣe samāsāntodāttasūcite indrasya śamīyatā vā daityo 'rirevābhidhīyate
GK16visah_cu:1946: bahuvrīhau tu pūrvapadāntodāttanirṇote indra eva śamayitā śātayitā ceti /
GK16visah_cu:1951: udāttādirūpo 'pi muneḥ pāṭhoktadiśā śṛṅgārādirasaviśeṣapratītikṛdeva" iti etadviṣaye udāharaṇamucitameva iti, tanna; tathāhi--
GK16visah_cu:1952: svarāḥ kākkādayaḥ udāttādayo vā vyaṅgyarūpameva viśeṣaṃ pratyāyanti, na khalu prakṛtoktamanekārthaśabdasyaikārthaniyantraṇarūpaṃ viśeṣam /
GK16visah_cu:1971: anekārthe ityādau arthaśabdo vācyaparaḥ, viśeṣa ityanantaraṃ saṃyogādiprayogāditi śeṣaḥ
GK16visah_cu:1973: kiñca yadi yatra kvacidanekārthaśabdānāṃ prakaraṇādiniyamābhāvādaniyantritayorapyarthayoranurūpasvaravaśenaikatra niyamanaṃ vācyaṃ, tadā tathāvidhasthale śleṣānaṅgīkāraprasaṅgaḥ;
GK16visah_cu:1976: (vi, ta) muneḥ pāṭhoktadiśeti--muninā vedasya svaraviśeṣeṇaiva paṭhanāt /
GK16visah_cu:1982: ekārthaniyamane 'nyārthasya vyaṅgyatvena tasyopamānatvāt upamādhvanitvasyaiva prasakternatu śleṣasya /
GK16visah_cu:1983: yathā vakṣyamāṇe durgālaṅghitavigrahe ityādau prakaraṇādumāmahādevīvallabhabhānudevarājaniyamane pārvatīvallabhasya vyaṅgyatvena rājñaḥ tadupamādhvanireva /
GK16visah_cu:1985: na ca tathā, ata evāhuḥ śleṣanirūpaṇaprastāve--
GK16visah_cu:1986: "kāvyamārge svaro na gaṇyate" itica nayaḥ, ityalamupajīvyānaṃ mānyānāṃ vyākhyāneṣu kaṭākṣanikṣepeṇa
GK16visah_cu:1991: (lo e) evaṃ pracīnoktaṃ dūṣayitvā svayameva pūrvapakṣamutpādya nirācaṣṭe-kiñceti /
GK16visah_cu:1993: "yena dhvastamanobhavena valijitkāyaḥ purā strīkṛto yaścodvṛttabhujaṅgahāravalayogaṃgāṃ ca yo 'dhārayat /
GK16visah_cu:1994: yasyāhuḥ śaśimat śiro hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ pāyāt sa svayamandhakakṣayakarastvāṃ sarvadomādhavaḥ"
GK16visah_cu:1995: ityādau dvayorapyarthayorhariharastutiparayoranurūpaḥ svara udāttādirekatra harau hare vā
GK16visah_cu:2029: nakṣatreśakṛ tekṣaṇo girigurau gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ dhārayan gāmākramya vibhūtibhūṣitatanū rājatyumāvallabhaḥ"
GK16visah_cu:2036: atra umā nāma mahādevī tasyā vallabho bhānudevanṛpatiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2039: tejasā dehakāntyā manasijaṃ sammīlayan sāndairyyagavārta saṅkocayan /
GK16visah_cu:2043: kṣatraiśeṣu kṣatriyeśvareṣu rājasu avajñayā na kṛtekṣaṇo akṛtadṛkpātaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2044: gurau mahatyāṃ giri vāci, gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ prītiṃ dhārayan gāmākramya pṛthivīmadhikṛtya, vibhūtyā aiśvaryyeṇa bhūṣitatanuḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2045: atra durgādipadānyanekārthāni prakaraṇavaśāddarśitārthe niyantrite vācakāni (śabdāḥ) arthāntaraṃ tu vyañjanayā bodhayanti /
GK16visah_cu:2046: tathā hi--umāyāḥ pārvatyā vallabho maheśo rājati /
GK16visah_cu:2053: girīṇāṃ gurau himālaye gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ dhārayan śvaśuratvāt svīyataponilayatvācca /
GK16visah_cu:2056: itthamatrāprākaraṇike maheśe vyañjite prakṛte saṅgamanāya maheśa iva rājetyupamāvyañjanādupamādhvanirayam
GK16visah_cu:2058: (lo, ai) durgālaṅghiteti---durgāṇi vanagirijalamayasthānāni durgā pārvatī ca, alaṅghito laṅghitaśca, vigraho yuddhaṃ dehaśca, sammīlanaṃ tiraskāro dahanaṃ ca, tejaḥ kānti. nayanāgniśca rājā pārthivaścandraśca /
GK16visah_cu:2059: kalā kalanāṃ aṃśaśca, garimā mahimā aiśvaryyaviśeṣaśca /
GK16visah_cu:2064: girīṇāṃ gurau, śreṣṭe ca gāṃ pṛthivīṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ca /
GK16visah_cu:2068: iha ca umāvallabhaśabdena yo 'yamaprakṛto maheśvarārthaḥ pratīyate tasyāsambaddhatvamāsīditi maheśvarabhānudevayorupamānopameyabhāvaḥ kalpyate /
GK16visah_cu:2070: ityatrai vakārasyāyamāśayaḥ-iha khalūmāvallabhaśabde yeyaṃ dvitīyārthapratītiḥ tatrābhidhāyā prakṛtārthamātrabodhane viramāt lakṣaṇāyāśca mukhyārthabodhahetukatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:2074: ataśca prathamamumāvallabhādiśabdena rājārthabodhanād viratāyāṃ prathamābhidhāyāṃ dvitīyaḥ śabdaḥ tanniṣṭābhidhāśaktyā dvitīyārthaṃ bodhayatu kiṃ vṛttyantarakalpanayā iti cenna /
GK16visah_cu:2075: atra hi śabdadvayakalpane kathaṃ prakṛtārthasya prathamaṃ
GK16visah_cu:2077: evaṃ"bhramimaratim"ityādāvapi viṣaśabdasya garalārthatve bhujaṅgādipadasācivyāt na panarabhidhāyā ujjīvanaṃ, kintu vyañjanaiva vyāpāraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2083: durgālaṅghitetyādau ca dvitīyārthasyānubhavasiddhasyābhāvaṃ vadato mahimācāryyasya gajanimīlikaiva durvyākhyātṛdurupadeśaparamparayaiva dvitīyārthapratyākhyāne vyāsavālmīkiprabhṛtimahākavīnāṃ tādṛśakāvyanibandhasya niṣphalatāprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2085: kiñca dvitīyārthabodhane dharmikalpanāto varaṃ dharmakalpaneti bhinnaśabdakalpanāt bhinnā eva vyañjanākhyā vṛttiraṅgīkarttumucitā ;
GK16visah_cu:2086: tasyāstu yatra tatra prasare 'tiprasaṅgabhītyā sambandhatvena saivābhidhāśrīyata iti sarvamavadātam
GK16visah_cu:2090: yayā pratyāyyate sā syādvyañjanā lakṣaṇāśrayā // VisSd_2.15 //
GK16visah_cu:2094: upāsyate ādriyate, yasya kṛte yannimittam yathā śabdaśaktyā /
GK16visah_cu:2096: "gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ" ityādau jalamayādyarthabodhanādabhidhāyāṃ taṭādyarthabodhanācca lakṣaṇāyāṃ viratāyāṃ yayā śītatvapāvanatvādyatiśayādirbodhyate sā lakṣaṇāmūlā vyañjanā /
GK16visah_cu:2107: (lo, au) prakaraṇasaṅgatimāha evamiti--bodhyate yaḥ sa boddhavyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2110: ucyate śabdena pratipādyate yaḥ sa vācyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2112: prastāvaḥ prakaraṇaṃ, kākuḥ dhvanervikāraḥ, vaiśiṣṭyāt vailakṣaṇyāditi vaktrādiṣu pratyekamanvayaḥ
GK16visah_cu:2116: "kālo madhuḥ kupita eṣa ca puṣpadhanvā dhīrā vahanti ratikhedaharāḥ samīrāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2117: kelīvanīyamapi vañjulakuñjamañjur- dūre patiḥ kathaya kiṃ karaṇīyamadya"
GK16visah_cu:2118: atraitaṃ deśaṃ prati śīghraṃ pracchannakāmukastvayā preṣyatāmiti sakhīṃ prati kayācidvyajyate
GK16visah_cu:2124: atra vaktryā madanavihvalatādinā vaiśiṣṭyam, vākyasya tathābhūtānubhūyamānavicchittiyuktatvena
GK16visah_cu:2126: vakulakuñjādinā; kālasya vasantavattvena; evameṣāṃ vaiśiṣṭyena vakroktyā vyaṅgyārthaprakāśanaṃ sphuṭameva /
GK16visah_cu:2127: (vi, na) kālo madhuriti--sakhīṃ prati proṣitabharttṛkāyā uktiriyam /
GK16visah_cu:2130: īdṛśavyaṅgyabodhe kelīvanīrūpasya tatpradarśanena karaṇīyājajñāsārthakavākyasya tat vaktryā uddīpakapradarśanalabdhaśṛṅgāraprakaraṇasya madhurūpakālasya ca vailakṣaṇyaṃ hetuḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2134: "niḥ śeṣacyutacandanaṃ stanataṭaṃ nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dharo netre dūramanañjane pulakitā tanvī taveyaṃ tanuḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2135: mithyāvādini ! dūti ! bāndhavajanasyājñātapīḍāgame vāpīṃ snātumito gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikam"
GK16visah_cu:2138: (vi, pa) niḥ śeṣeti--upanāyakamānetuṃ preṣitāṃ yuvatiṃ tenaiva
GK16visah_cu:2139: upabhuktāmāgatyāsau matprārthanayāpi nāyāta iti pratārayantīṃ dūtīṃ prati nāyikāyāḥ solluṇṭhanoktiriyam
GK16visah_cu:2140: he matprārthanayāpi nāyāta iti mithyāvādini ! dūti ! bāndhavajanasya mama ajñātakāmapīḍāgame itaḥ strātuṃ vāpīṃ gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikaṃ gatāsi /
GK16visah_cu:2145: netre ca dūramatiśayaṃ yathā syāttathānañjane jāte iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2147: tathā iyaṃ tanvī kṛśā tava tanuḥ pulakitā; strānaśaityāt jātapulakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2150: ( lo, ā) niḥ śeṣeti--taṭaṃ samīpaṃ, sa ca samaprayo deśaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2151: tatra candanaṃ niḥ śeṣacyutaṃ; cūcukādiṣu ca śeṣam; adharo
GK16visah_cu:2152: nirmṛṣṭarāgaḥ; dūrabhanañjane nikaṭe tu sāñjane; añjanasya kvacit kvacidavaśeṣaḥ sūcitaḥ
GK16visah_cu:2153: iyaṃ tanuḥ cirakāle 'pi strāne idānīṃ pulakitā; tanvī kṣāmā ca /
GK16visah_cu:2156: atra tadantikameva rantuṃ gatāsīti viparītalakṣaṇayā lakṣyam /
GK16visah_cu:2157: tasya ca rantumiti vyaṅgyaṃ pratipādyaṃ dūtīvaiśiṣṭyādbodhyate /
GK16visah_cu:2163: teṣāṃ ratikāryyatvenaita pratītirhi-candanādhararagayoścyutimārjanābhyāṃ, strāne tvanayoḥ kṣālanamevoktaṃ syāt /
GK16visah_cu:2164: tathā dūraṃ cumbanaspṛṣṭaṃ netraprāntabhāgaṃ prāpya anañjane strāne tu samastanetrasyaivānañjanatvamuktaṃ syāt /
GK16visah_cu:2165: tathā candanacyutimahinmā grīṣmakālaprāptau pulakena ca tadānīṃ snānena pulakābhāvāt /
GK16visah_cu:2168: atra gamanaṃ lakṣaṇayeti yaduktaṃ tat kāvyaprakāśakārasyāsammatam /
GK16visah_cu:2170: tathā hi na gatāsītyasya kāvyatvena tatra lakṣaṇāyā evābhāvāt /
GK16visah_cu:2171: taduktaṃ "vākye na śaktirnavā lakṣaṇeti'; padalakṣaṇā tu na
GK16visah_cu:2174: yadi ca vākye 'pi lakṣaṇā svīkriyate tathāpi na lakṣaṇā /
GK16visah_cu:2176: tathā hi candanacyavanādīnāṃ prathamaṃ snānakāryyatvenaiva pratītyā bādhānavatārāt /
GK16visah_cu:2178: atra ca vyañjanāyāḥ pravṛtternatu lakṣaṇāyā eva /
GK16visah_cu:2184: pūrvatra prathamaṃ bādhyatayā khyātau pratītau abhidhaiva tvityanena tatra lakṣaṇāyā abhāvāt
GK16visah_cu:2188: (lo, i) eṣāṃ ca padārthānāṃ vāpīsnānaviruddhānāmanusandhānādeva vāpīsnānābhāvamātrasya prarohābhāvena tadantikaṃ na gatāsītyatra
GK16visah_cu:2189: viparītalakṣaṇayā gatāsīti lakṣyate ntumityataḥ pūrvaṃ tena saheti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2194: atra balākāyā nispandatvena viśvastatvam, tenāsya deśasya vijanatvam, ataḥ saṃketasthānametaditi kayāpi saṃnihitaṃ pracchannakāmukaṃ pratyucyate /
GK16visah_cu:2198: (vi, ba) saṅketasthānamupanāyake darśayantyā dūtyā uktiriyam--ua iti
GK16visah_cu:2206: tathā ca dyotyata ityatra dyotanaṃ sāmājikairvyañjanayā budhyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2207: nāyakena tu balākāpradarśanarūpāt vaktryā vailakṣaṇyāt saṅketasthalaṃ vyañjanayā budhyate
GK16visah_cu:2224: atra naiṣyati, api tarhi eṣyatyeveti kākkā vyajyate--
GK16visah_cu:2233: naiṣyatīti---api tveṣyatyevetyarthaḥ kākkā vyajyate iti--kākkāḥ paraṃ nañarthopasthāpanānna eṣyati eṣyatyevetyevaṃrūpaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2247: atra saṃdhyā saṃketakāla iti paṅmanimīlanādiceṣṭayā kayāciddyotyate /
GK16visah_cu:2252: hasatā netreṇārpitaṃ sthāpitam ākūtaṃ bhāvo yatra tādṛśaṃ yathā syāttathā līlāpadmaṃ nimīlitamityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:2259: tatra vācyārthasya vyañjanā yathā-"kālo madhuḥ-" ityādi /
GK16visah_cu:2271: śabdārthayorekasya vyañjakatve taditaraḥ sahakārī satu avarjanīyasānnidhimātreṇāvasthitaḥ
GK16visah_cu:2272: kintu yatra yacchaktirutkaṭā tatra tanmūlo vyañjakatvavyapadeśaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2280: (vi, ya) vaktṛboddhavyādidaśavaiśiṣṭyāt yār'tho vyañjanoktā, sā vyañjakārthatrauvidhyāt trividhetyāha--arthānāṃ vyañjakārthānām /
GK16visah_cu:2290: tātparyārthaṃ tadarthaṃ ca vākyaṃ tadvodhakaṃ pare // VisSd_2.20 //
GK16visah_cu:2293: (vi, ra) na kevalaṃ vācyāditrividha eva śabdasyārtho 'pi tu vācyāditrayabhinnaḥ padārthasaṃsargo 'pi śabdārthastadbodhakaṃ ca vākyamityāha--kiṃ cetyādinā /
GK16visah_cu:2296: tadarthaṃ tasyā vṛtterviṣayarūpamarthaṃ tātparyyārthaṃ saṃsargarūpaṃ tadvodhakaṃ ca vākyamityāhuḥ
GK16visah_cu:2298: abhidhāyā ekaikapadārthabodhanavirāmādvākyārtharūpasya padārthānvayasya bodhikā tātpaya nāma vṛttiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2306: abhihitānvayavādināṃ naiyāyikānāṃ padena padārthe 'bhihite smārite tadanvayabodho vākyādeva
GK16visah_cu:2310: ihi sāhityārpaṇo vākyasvarūpanirūpaṇo nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2311: tṛtīyaḥ paricchedaḥ atha ko 'yaṃ rasa ityucyate--
GK16visah_cu:2318: atha--kāvyasvarūpanirūpaṇānantaraṃ koyaṃ raso yadātmakaṃ vākyaṃ kāvyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2327: tasya pṛthagupādānaṃ ca govṛṣanyāyāt prāśastyārtham, praśastyaṃ ca ratyādeḥ śīghrapratipādakatvāt
GK16visah_cu:2328: yadyapi vibhāvāditrayasya militasyaiva rasahetutā vakṣyate, tathāpi yatra śloke militā na santi tatraikenānyavyañjane vyabhicāriṇāmanyāpekṣayā śīghravyañjakatvabhityetaddvārā rasasyāpi śīghrapratipādakatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:2335: tadvyañjanāvaśādeva rasāderasaṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyaparibhāṣā, tataśca bhāvanopanītaḥ sa ratyādirvibhāvādiniṣṭhena svādanākhyavyāpāreṇa sāmājikaratyādyabhedenāropyamāṇaḥ svaprakāśānandatayā tathā pariṇamatīti
GK16visah_cu:2344: yadyapīha milito ratyādiḥ prapānakarasanyāyena carvyamāṇo 'khaṇḍasvarūpo rasaḥ, tathāpi lokaprasiddhimāsādya pratyabhijñānāt
GK16visah_cu:2359: ānīya nītaḥ svādyatvaṃ sthāyibhāvo rasaḥ smṛtaḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:2364: (vi, gha) nanu sāttvikabhāvo 'pi rasādivyañjakaḥ, sa kathaṃ nokta
GK16visah_cu:2371: vyakto dadhyādinyāyena rūpāntarapariṇato vyaktīkṛta eva raso na tu dīpena ghaṭa iva pūrvasiddho vyajyate /
GK16visah_cu:2376: tannyāyena rāmādiratyādireva vibhāvādiniṣṭhakhādanākhyavyāpāreṇa sāmājikaratyādau abhedenāropyamāṇaḥ svaprakāśānandatmakajñānarūpatayā pariṇamatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2377: vyakta ityasyārthaṃ pariṇata ityantena darśayitvā, tādṛgavastha eva rasaḥ, natu atādṛgavastha iti pratipādayan punarāha---vyakto vyaktīkṛta eveti /
GK16visah_cu:2378: idaṃ ca vyaktīkṛtarasāsvādākhyena vyāpāreṇa vibhāvādiniṣṭhena vyañjanābhinnavyāpārāntareṇa rāmādiratyādyāropaviṣayasāmājikaratyādeḥ svaprakāśānandarūpatayā viṣayīkaraṇamityagre vyaktirbhaviṣyati Locanā:
GK16visah_cu:2379: (lo, u) dadhyādīti---yathā dugdhaṃ dadhirūpeṇa pariṇamate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2382: "rasāḥ pratīyanta iti tvodanaṃ pacatītivad vyavahāraḥ" iti /
GK16visah_cu:2391: (lo, ū) odanaṃ pacatītivat--na khalvodanaḥ pūrvasiddho vyajyate,
GK16visah_cu:2392: kintu pakvaḥ san odano bhavatīti tathāyamapi vyaktaḥ san raso bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2394: atra ca ratyādipadopādānādeva prāpte sathāyitve punaḥ sthāyipadopādānaṃ ratyādīnāmapi rasāntaraṣvasthāyitvapratipādanārtham
GK16visah_cu:2400: (vi, cha) rasatāmeti ratyādiḥ sthāyībhāvaḥ sacetasām"iti yaduktaṃ tatra sthāyītyasya upādānaphalamāha--atra ratyādīti /
GK16visah_cu:2405: paraṃ kevalaṃ tādṛśo hāsakrodhādibhāvaḥ sthāyitāṃ pratipadyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2416: (vi, ja) sattvodrekāditi kārikārthaṃ pratipadaṃ svayameva vyākhyāsyati /
GK16visah_cu:2418: svākāravadabhinnatveneti---ayaṃ ratyādijñānarūpo rasaḥ pariṇāmavaśādratyādyabhinnatvena viśiṣṭa āsvādyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2420: āropyamāṇarāmādiratyādyabhedana adhikaraṇībhūtasāmājikaratyādereva yaḥ svaprakāśa āsvādaḥ tasyeva rasatvāt tatra cābhinnatvābhāvāt /
GK16visah_cu:2422: svākāravāde hi viṣayo jñānābhinno jñānasyākāra eveti /
GK16visah_cu:2424: (lo, ṝ) samprati kīdṛgasāvāsādyate yenaitadāsvādanalampaṭaḥ kāvye pravartiṣyate lokaḥ ityāśaṅkyoktāṃ sattvodrekāditi kārikāmavatārayati--asyeti /
GK16visah_cu:2432: "rajastamobhyāmaspṛṣṭaṃ manaḥ satvamihocyate" ityuktaprakāro bāhyameyavimukhatāpādakaḥ kaścanāntaro dharmaḥ sattvam /
GK16visah_cu:2435: akhaṇḍa ityeka evāyaṃ vibhāvādiratyādiprakāśasukhacamatkārātmakaḥ atra hetuṃ vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2443: nanu kathamevaṃvidhaḥ sattvodreko jāyate, tataśca kathamakhaṇḍasvaprakāśānandād bodhaḥ ityāśaṅkyāha--tatra ceti /
GK16visah_cu:2444: ayamāśayaḥ-"sattvaṃ sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata /
GK16visah_cu:2446: ityādi bhagavadvacanāt triguṇātmake manasi sattvāṃśasya prakāśe sukhetpattiḥ sattvāṃśasya prakāśaśca rajastamasorabhibhavād vaiṣayikaṃ sukhaṃ janayati /
GK16visah_cu:2447: tathā hi sattvāṃśaprakāśatāratamyād vaiṣayikasukhasyāpi tāratamyaṃ dṛśyate /
GK16visah_cu:2449: tacca sukhakāraṇaṃ yadi sakalalaukikasukhakāraṇottaraṃ tena rajastamasorabhibhavaḥ sarvathā śakyakriya eveti /
GK16visah_cu:2450: tato nyāyāt lokottarakāvyārthaśravaṇarūpakāraṇāt sarvathā rajastamasyabhibhūya manasaḥ sattvāṃśasyaiva prakāśastadā tanmātrahetuko
GK16visah_cu:2454: sa cātmānandād bodho yadi"anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ nirasya prāṇato yataḥ
GK16visah_cu:2456: śāstrānayanahetukaḥ syāt tadā nirupahitaṃ brahma prakāśate /
GK16visah_cu:2463: ratyādyaṃśaśavalatvādeva cāsya brahmāsvādasya sahodaratvaṃ; natu tattvaṃ sūtreṇoktam /
GK16visah_cu:2464: svarūpārtha ityanena mayaṭaḥ prastutārthasya nirāsaḥ, tena svaprakāśānandacidabhinnatvaṃ rasasyoktaṃ bhavati /
GK16visah_cu:2475: vibhāvādiśca ratyādiśca tadviṣayaṃ yat svaprakāśarūpaṃ sukhaṃ tatsahitaḥ camatkāra ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2477: tādṛśasukhacamatkārayorekadā sthitau tatra hetuṃ vakṣyāmaḥ "vyāpārosti vibhāvādeḥ"ityādinā
GK16visah_cu:2478: vibhāvādeḥ svādanākhyavyāpārasya camatkārahetutāyāḥ sāmājikānāṃ rāmādināyakābhedāropahetutāyāśca vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:2479: cinmaya itīti---svaprakāśānanda eva cid jñānaṃ tat svarūpa ityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:2482: cittasya vistāraḥ ātmasaṃyogaviśeṣeṇa janitaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ jñānam /
GK16visah_cu:2493: (vi, ña) rase sāra iti rasāsvādahetutvāt sāraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2497: tasmin sati śṛṅgārādirasakāvyeṣvapi adbhuto rasaḥ sambhavati /
GK16visah_cu:2500: kāvyaprakāśe tu āsvāda eva camatkāraḥ natu tadbhinno vismayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2516: "na jāyate tadāsvādo vinā ratyādivāsanām'; iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:2524: yathā yoginaḥ śuddhaṃ brahma svaprakāśānandacidrūpatayā sākṣātkurvanti ratyādyaṃśakarburitamapi tathā puṇyavanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2533: ācāryāstu śavalitasyaivānubhavāt sukhamanubhavāmīti pratisandhānasya ca tāvatavopapatteradhikaṃ necchanti /
GK16visah_cu:2545: vastutastu saṃbhedāditi lyab--garbhatvāt pañcamī tena vibhāvādiśavalita iti /
GK16visah_cu:2546: ātmānandeti---ātmani ya ānandastadrūpeṇa samudbhavo yasya tādṛśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2550: tatsambhedāditi lyablope paccamī tena vibhāvādiśavalita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2552: tathāpi "rasaḥ svādyate" iti kālpanikaṃ bhedamurarī kṛtya karmakarttari vā
GK16visah_cu:2557: karmakartari veti--"bhidyate kuśūlaḥ svayameva"ityatra ekasyaiva kuśūlasya karmatvakarttṛtvobhayavivakṣayā bhedāropavadatrāpi āsvādyāsvādanayorabhedepi bhedavivakṣayā karmakartari prayogaḥ ityarthaḥ naca āsvādye āsvādasya viṣayitāeva, tatkathaṃ kartṛtvamiti vācyam,
GK16visah_cu:2560: taduktam-"rasyamānatāmātrasāratvāt prakāśaśarīrādananya eva hi rasaḥ" iti
GK16visah_cu:2593: nanvetāvatā kimaniṣṭamityato vibhāvādervyañjakatvānupapattyā rasasya vyaṅgyatvānupapattiḥ evāniṣṭamitivaktuṃ prathamaṃ vibhāvādervyañjakatvānupapattiṃ ghaṭavyañjakadīpavailakṣaṇyena
GK16visah_cu:2595: ghaṭādervyañjako yathā dīpo vibhāvādestathātvābhāvād ghaṭavyañjakadīpato vibhāvādeḥ pārthakyaṃ pṛthagbhāvo vailakṣaṇyamiti samudāyārthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2596: yathāśrutākṣarārthena tvayamartho na ghaṭate, svaviṣayajñānena svajanyajñānena vā ghaṭadhiyo hetordepasya ghaṭavyañjakabhāvaprasaktyā
GK16visah_cu:2601: tathā ca svajanyajñānābhinnāyā anyasya jñānadanyasya dhiyo heturyaḥ sa eva siddhe jñānaṃ vināpi siddhe arthe vyañjako mato yathā dīpa ityarthaḥ vibhāvādistu svajanyavyañjanādhīnajñānabhinnasyā'svādātmakarasāderjanaka eva na dīpavat
GK16visah_cu:2603: anyathābhāve anyathātve svajanyaṃ pratyapi svasvavyañjakatve ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2604: asya vibhāvādeḥ kārakāt ko viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2605: ghaṭapratīpavat dvau yau vyaṅgyavyañjakau tayoḥ sakāśādanayoḥ rasavibhāvādyoḥ pārthakyaṃ vailakṣaṇyamevetyarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:2606: na tu vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ parasparaṃ pārthakyaṃ bheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2621: siddhe natu sādhye vyañjako mataḥ śabda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2627: ityuktadiśā ghaṭapradīpavadvyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ pārthakyameveti kathaṃ rasasya vyaṅgyateti cet, satyamuktam /
GK16visah_cu:2631: pārthakyamityanena vyañjanāyā vyaṅgyasya ca pārthakyaṃ nyāyasiddhameva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2639: jñāptiḥ jñāpako vyāpāraḥ, abhidhālakṣaṇāvyañjanāḥ; tebhyo vyāpārebhyo bhinna ityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:2641: tathā ca tad viṣaya eva rasaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2642: vyañjanādhīnajñānaṃ tu ratyadiviṣayaḥ tato bhinnameva ityato rasavyañjanādhīnajñānayornaikyamityuktam
GK16visah_cu:2644: tathā ca vyañjanayā ratyādijñānameva, svādanākhyavyāpāreṇa tu rasāsvāda ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2645: nanu kathaṃ tarhi raso vyaṅgya ityucyate ityata āha---abhidhādīti /
GK16visah_cu:2646: vilakṣaṇo vyāpāro vyañjanā raso vyaṅgya iti vyahgyarāmādiratyādyāropādhikaraṇasāmājikaratyādeḥ rasarūpatayā pariṇāmāt paramparayā vyaṅgya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2648: (lo, u) ata eveti--; āhurityasya vyaṅgyatvamuktaṃ bhavatītyatra
GK16visah_cu:2650: ata eva-yato jñānarūpa eva rasa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2658: ata eva hi rasanāsvādanacamatkaraṇādayo vilakṣaṇā eva vyapadeśāḥ" iti /
GK16visah_cu:2664: nanu tarhi karuṇādīnāṃ rasānāṃ duḥ khayatvādrasatvaṃ (tadunmukhatvaṃ ) na
GK16visah_cu:2675: (vi, na) rase iti--karuṇādau rasa grāhye karuṇādirasasvarūpameva yat sukhaṃ jāyata ityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:2678: rasādīnāmeva śokaduḥ khaṃ tajjñātṝṇaāṃ, sāmājikānāṃ tu sukhameva
GK16visah_cu:2691: (vi, pa) asahṛdayānāmapi paraduḥ khajñānādapi duḥ khameva jāyate
GK16visah_cu:2694: kiñca teṣu yadā duḥkhaṃ na ko 'pi syāttadunmukhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2695: nahi kaścat sacetā ātmano duḥkhāya pravarttate /
GK16visah_cu:2709: duḥkhahetutva-prasaṅga iti--tathā ca tat--śravaṇe na kopi pravartate
GK16visah_cu:2717: (vi, bha) duḥ khahetubhya iti---paraśokādayaḥ svaduḥ khahetava eva,
GK16visah_cu:2721: śokaharṣādayo loke jāyantāṃ nāma laukikāḥ // VisSd_3.6 //
GK16visah_cu:2725: svīya--śokaharṣāderhetutvagatebhyaḥ paraśokādikāraṇebhyo laukikāḥ śokaharṣādayo jāyantāṃ nāmeti tuṣyatu durjana iti nyāyena uktvā āha---alaukiketi /
GK16visah_cu:2728: sukhaṃ sañjāyate tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo 'pīti kā kṣatiḥ // VisSd_3.7 //
GK16visah_cu:2731: (lo, e) hetutvamiti--hetutvaṃ gatebhyo rāmavanavāsādibhyo lokasaṃśrayāt; natu kāvyasaṃśrayāt
GK16visah_cu:2735: ye khalu rāmavanavāsādayo loke "duḥkhāraṇāni" ityucyante ta eva hi kāvyanāṭyasamarpitā alaukikavibhāvanavyāpāravattayā kāraṇaśabdavācyatāṃ vihāya alaukikavibhāvaśabdavācyatvaṃ bhajante /
GK16visah_cu:2736: tebhyaśca surate dantadhātādibhya iva sukhameva jāyate /
GK16visah_cu:2742: anena dekhakālādiviśeṣeṇaṣeṇa sukhamayasyāpi duḥ khamayatvaṃ; duḥ khamayasyāpi sukhamayatvam
GK16visah_cu:2745: ataśca "laukikaśokaharṣādikāraṇobhyo laukikaśokaharṣādayo jāyante" iti loka eva pratiniyamaḥ
GK16visah_cu:2751: "sarvebhyo 'pi vibhāvādibhyaḥ sukhameva jāyate" iti niyamānna kaściddoṣaḥ
GK16visah_cu:2752: kathaṃ tarhi hariścandrādicaritasya kāvyanāṭyayorapi darśanaśravaṇābhyāmaśrupātā dayo jāyanta
GK16visah_cu:2761: tarhi kathaṃ kāvyataḥ sarveṣāmīdṛśī rasābhivyaktirna jāyata ityata āha--
GK16visah_cu:2762: na jāyate tadāsvādo vinā ratyādivāsanām // VisSd_3.8 //
GK16visah_cu:2767: vāsanā cedānīntanī prāktanī ca rasāsvādahetuḥ, tatra yadyādyā na syāttadā śrotriyajaranmīmāṃsakādīnāmapi sa syāt /
GK16visah_cu:2773: naca prāktanavāsanābhāvādeva teṣāṃ na kāvyarasāsvāda ityevamucyatām,
GK16visah_cu:2774: kimarthamidānīntana-vāsanāṅgīkāraḥ iti vācyam, teṣāmeva tarkānuśīlanatyāgena kāvyānuśīlanābhyāse rasodvodhena idānīntanyā api
GK16visah_cu:2777: yadi dvitīyā na syāttadā yadragiṇā mapi keṣāñcidrasodvodho na dṛśyate tanna syāt /
GK16visah_cu:2784: natu tatra idānīntanatvādipraveśaḥ jaran mīmāṃsakānāṃ tu atyantatarkānurāga eva pratibandha ityevānvayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2809: yasya hanūmadādeḥ pāthodhiplavanādayaḥ āsan pramātā tadabhedena svātmānaṃ pratipadyata ityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:2812: bhedāgrahe satyena abhedagraha upapadyate ityata āha---tadabhedeneti
GK16visah_cu:2822: bhedena pratipattau tu ātmaniṣṭaroṣādisthāyibhāvodvodho na syāt /
GK16visah_cu:2823: evaṃ ca yo doṣaḥ samanantarameva darśayiṣyate /
GK16visah_cu:2830: (vi, sa) itthaṃ svasmin hanumadādyābhedāropamuktvā tadutsāhajñānādeva svotsāhodvodhamupapādayitumāśaṅkate
GK16visah_cu:2841: (lo, i) sādhāraṇyābhimānataḥ--uktaprakāreṇa vibhāvādīnāṃ sādhāraṇīkaraṇavyāpāraprabhāvenotpannasya svātmani sādhāraṇyābhimānabalāt
GK16visah_cu:2869: parasya na parasyeti mameti na mameti ca /
GK16visah_cu:2870: tadāsvāde vibhāvādeḥ paricchedo na vidyate // VisSd_3.12 //
GK16visah_cu:2876: evaṃ ca vibhāvādayaḥ svayaṃ sādhāraṇyena pratyāyayantītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2880: alaukikatvameteṣāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ na tu dūṣaṇam // VisSd_3.13 //
GK16visah_cu:2891: asya yogārthasyānubhāvādāvapi sattveti paribhāṣāyā yogarūḍhatvānna tatra prayogaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2898: evaṃbhūtasya āsvādāṅkuratāṃ prāpitasya ratyādeḥ svaniṣṭhasvādanākhyavyāpāreṇa rasarūpatayā praveśanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2902: vibhāvādīnāṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kāraṇakāryyasahakāritve kathaṃ trayāṇāmapi rasodbodhe kāraṇatvamityucyate
GK16visah_cu:2908: rasodvodhe vibhāvādyāḥ kāraṇānyeva te matāḥ // VisSd_3.14 //
GK16visah_cu:2909: nanu tarhi kathaṃ rasāsvāde teṣāmekaḥ pratibhāsa ityucyate--
GK16visah_cu:2916: tataḥ sambalitaḥ sarvo vibhāvādiḥ sacetasām // VisSd_3.15 //
GK16visah_cu:2924: nanu yadi vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāribhirmmilitaireva rasastat kathaṃ teṣāmekasya dvayorvā sadbhāve 'pi sa syādityucyate--
GK16visah_cu:2933: "dīrghākṣaṃ śaradindukāntivadanaṃ bāhū natāvaṃsayoḥ saṅkṣiptaṃ nibiḍonnatastanamuraḥ pārśve pramṛṣṭe iva /
GK16visah_cu:2934: madhyaḥ pāṇimito nitambi jaghanaṃ pādāvudagrāṅgulī chando narttayituryathaiva manasaḥ sṛṣṭaṃ tathāsyā vapuḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:2938: uttamanaṭīṃ nartuyiturmanaso yathaivacchanda icchā tathaivāsyā vapuḥ sṛṣṭam (vidhātrā) tadevāha--dīrghākṣamiti--bāhū--aṃsayoḥ svamūlayornatau /
GK16visah_cu:2940: nibiḍau--anyonyasaṃsaktau unnatau ca stanau yatra tādṛśaṃ ca uruḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2943: jaghanottarabhāgaḥ nitambaḥ praśastaḥ tad yuktaṃ jaghanam,
GK16visah_cu:2949: sṛṣṭaṃ vidhātrā iti śeṣaḥ nartayitā nartakīṣu dīrghākṣatvādyabhinayena darśayituṃ śikṣayati, mālavikāyāṃ sahajasaundaryādeva tadastīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:2975: sītādidarśanādijo rāmādiratyādyudbodho hi parimito laukiko nāṭyakāvyadarśanādeḥ sāntarāyaśca, tasmāt kathaṃ rasarūpatāmiyāt /
GK16visah_cu:2986: (vi, ṭha) sa yadā kāvyārthabhāvakaḥ syāttadā sopi sāmājiko
GK16visah_cu:2991: yadi punarnaṭo 'pi kāvyārthabhāvanayā rāmādisvarūpatāmātmano darśayet tadā so 'pi sabhyamadhya eva gaṇyate /
GK16visah_cu:3000: (vi, ḍa) yadyapyuktarītyā rasasya sākṣāt kriyamāṇatvaṃ kāryatvaṃ kādācitkatvena bhaviṣyadvartamānatvaṃ
GK16visah_cu:3001: taj-jñānasya sākṣātkararūpatvaṃ ca tathāpi tasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ sādhayituṃ
GK16visah_cu:3002: sākṣāt kriyamāṇghaṭādito 'pi vailakṣaṇyasādhanena kautukādasākṣāt kriyamāṇatvaṃ kāraṇaviśeṣakāryatvasya kenaciduktasya dūṣaṇena kautukāt sāmānyato 'kāryatvamevamabhaviṣyatvādikamapi kautukād vaktuṃ prathamaṃ
GK16visah_cu:3016: (lo, a) nāyaṃ jñāpya iti--ayaṃ rasaḥ sattāyāṃ sadbhāve
GK16visah_cu:3020: yo hi jñāpyo ghaṭādiḥ sannapi kadācidajñāto bhavati, na hyayaṃ tathā;
GK16visah_cu:3026: (vi, ḍha) hetuviśeṣakāryatvaṃ rasasya ye vadanti tanmataṃ nirasyati---yasmādeṣa ityādi tasmānna kārya ityantena /
GK16visah_cu:3027: ayamarthaḥ ---"prapānakarasanyāyāccarvyamāṇo raso bhavedityuktyā vibhāvādiratyādisamūhālambanātmako rasa ityuktam /
GK16visah_cu:3029: kecittu tatsamakālotpannaṃ vyañjanayāpi tādṛśaṃ samūhālambanānantaraṃ jāyate, tatkārya eva rasa ityāhuḥ, tannirasyati---yasmādeṣa iti /
GK16visah_cu:3030: eṣa raso yasmāt svādanākhyavyāparādhīnasamūhālambanātmakaḥ, ato na kāryaḥ, na samūhālambanakāryaḥ svasya svakāryatvāt svakālotpattikasya vyañjanādhīnasamūhālambanāntarasyābhāvācceti bhāvaḥ tatra svasya svakāryatvāsambhavasya sphuṭatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:3032: (lo, a) rasasyeti--nahi vibhāvādijñānakāraṇakamityanantaraṃ tataścānupalabhyamānakāraṇāntarasya rasasya na kāryatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3034: yadi rasaḥ kāryaḥ syāttadā vibhāvādijñānakāraṇaka eva syāt /
GK16visah_cu:3042: "pratīyamānaḥ prathamaṃ pratyekaṃ heturucyate"ityanena pratyekasya hetutvoktyā tatkāryatve vipratipattyabhāvāt /
GK16visah_cu:3047: (vi, ta) nanu tādṛśsamūhātambanakāraṇatve ko doṣaḥ ityāha--tataśceti
GK16visah_cu:3054: (vi, tha) kāraṇajñānasya sthitiḥ kāryajñānasyotpattiriti tu na sambhavatyeva /
GK16visah_cu:3077: evaṃ rasasya samūhālambanakāryatvameva khaṇḍitaṃ natu kāryatvam /
GK16visah_cu:3083: nanu pūrvasaṃvedanābhāvānnityatvābhāve itaraṣāmapi nityavastūnāmabhāvaprasaṅga ityata āha-asamvetaneti
GK16visah_cu:3087: asaṃvedanakāle hi na bhāvo 'ṣyasya vidyate (ka) // VisSd_3.21 //
GK16visah_cu:3090: (vi, na) nityatvābhāvaḥ spaṣṭa eva, tamāha--no nitya iti /
GK16visah_cu:3096: (lo, i) nāpi bhaviṣyannityāha--sākṣādanubhūyamānasya hi kathaṃ bhaviṣyattm
GK16visah_cu:3097: yasya khalu vastuno bhaviṣyattvaṃ sahajo dharmastat sadā bhaviṣyadeveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3103: (vi, pa) nāpi bhaviṣyanniti yadyapi saṃvedanāt pūrvam asattvenaiva
GK16visah_cu:3105: tathāpi bhaviṣyatpadārthāntarasya sākṣādānandamayaprakāśatvasvarūpābhāvāt tadvailakṣaṇyameva bhaviṣyatvābhāvaḥ kautukāduktaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3113: yadyapi ghaṭādisādhāraṇajñāpyatvasyaiva samūhālambanakāryatvasyaiva cābhāvaḥ prag darśitaḥ, tathāpi tāvataiva kāryatvajñāpyatvābhāvaṃ
GK16visah_cu:3116: svaprakāśarūpasya svameva grāhakaṃ, tattu na nirvikalpakamityāha--vibhāvādīti /
GK16visah_cu:3119: tat pradhānatvāditi kvacit pāṭhe tatparāmarśaḥ pratyekaṃ taj jñānaṃ,
GK16visah_cu:3123: antye tu jñānajanyatvena nirvikalpakatvābhāvāt, jñānajanyajñānasyaiva nirvikalpakatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:3126: tathā ca na nirvikalpakaṃ niṣprakārakajñānasyaiva tathātvāt /
GK16visah_cu:3128: (lo, ī) nirvikalpakaṃ jñānam--asti hmālocanamātraprathamaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ jñānam, amukāsadṛśaṃ jñānaṃ śuddhavastujamityuktaprakāraṃ,
GK16visah_cu:3130: sa eva raso nirvikalpakajñānatvena gṛhyamāṇo na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3132: tatra pakṣe yasya grāhakatvamiṣyate ityatra nopacāraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3139: yadyapi tadgrāhakasya nirvikalpakatvābhāvayuktipradarśanenaiva savikalpakasaṃvedyatvaṃ siddhaṃ tathāpi savikalpakasaṃvedyāntarato vailakṣaṇyena tadavedyatvaṃ kautukāduktam /
GK16visah_cu:3142: tasya vibhāvādyabhidhānadvāreṇaiva tasya jñeyatvam, natu kāvyasthaśabdena /
GK16visah_cu:3143: pratyuta tasya tatkāvyasya śabdavācyatve svaśabdavācyatvaṃ doṣa eva vakṣyate /
GK16visah_cu:3144: atra eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtāpyuktaṃ,"rasādilakṣaṇastvarthaḥ svapreti na vācya'; iti /
GK16visah_cu:3146: savikalpakavedyaṃ padārthāntaraṃ tatkāvyasthaśabdenaiva vācyamiti tato vailakṣaṇyamiti vacanam
GK16visah_cu:3148: savikalpakajñānasaṃvedyānāṃ hi vacanaprayogayogyatā, na tu rasasya tathā /
GK16visah_cu:3159: sākṣātkārānantaravailakṣaṇyapratipādanāya sākṣātkārarūpasyāpi tatprakāśasya sākṣātkāratvābhāvamapi kautukādāha--nāparokṣa iti /
GK16visah_cu:3164: (lo, ṛ) tathābhilāpeti--atrāpi pūrvavat raso na savikalpakarūpa iti /
GK16visah_cu:3170: ataḥ paramityatra idamānupūrvoktanirvikalpakaparāmarśaḥ śabdasaṃbhāvta śābdajñānam parokṣamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3171: tat kathayatitattvaṃ svarūpaṃ, pūrvaṃ na śruto na dṛṣṭaścoktasvarūpo nirūpaṇaprakāro yasya rasasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3177: (vi, ya) itthaṃ kiñcit vastutaḥ kiñcicca kautukād vailakṣaṇyamuktvā
GK16visah_cu:3178: kīdṛśaṃ tādṛśavilakṣaṇaṃ vastu tat iti pṛcchati; tat kathayati /
GK16visah_cu:3193: tatkiṃ punaḥ pramāṇaṃ tasya sadbhāva ityāha--
GK16visah_cu:3194: pramāṇaṃ carvaṇaivātra svābhinne viduṣāṃ matam // VisSd_3.26 //
GK16visah_cu:3202: evaṃ ca sahṛdayānubhava evātra pramāṇamiti paryavasyati /
GK16visah_cu:3211: lakṣyavyaṅgyavastūnāṃ sambhedāt jñānāt ātmano rasasyānandarūpeṇa samudbhavaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3214: nanu yadi raso na kāryastatkathaṃ mahaṣiṇā(ka)
GK16visah_cu:3220: (vi, va) rāmādiratyādeḥ sāmājikaratyādervo uddīpanavibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārijanyatvaṃ nāstyeva, tatastadātmakasya rasasya tatsākṣātkārāṃśamātrajanyatvaṃ siddhāntayituṃ kautukoktamapi tasyākāryatvamuktvā āśaṅkate--nanu yadi raso na kārya iti /
GK16visah_cu:3224: itthaṃ vibhāvāditaścarvaṇāyā niṣpattireva vāstavikaratyādyaṃśasya tato niṣpattirupacaritetyuktyā carvaṇāṃśasyāpi niṣpattirupacaritaiveti vaktumāha---yadyapīti /
GK16visah_cu:3227: tataśca ratyādirūparasābhinna eva carvaṇātmakaḥ sākṣātkārastathā ratyādeḥ vibhāvādyakāryatayaiva carvaṇasyāpi vibhāvādyakāryatvamarthasiddhamiti yadyapi ratyāderarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3229: tathāpi tasya kādācitkatayā upacaritena kāryatvena kāryatvamupacaryate /
GK16visah_cu:3235: kintu vibhāvādijñānettarameva niṣpannetyevaṃ kādācitkatayā upacaritena kāryatvena kāryatvamupacaryate ityartha /
GK16visah_cu:3236: nacaivamanyathāsiddhavibhāvādijñānottarabhāvitvena tatkāryatvaṃ carvaṇāyām avāstavameva tat kathamupacāra iti vācyam /
GK16visah_cu:3239: (lo, e) yadyapītyādi---ayamarthaḥ samanantaroktaprakāreṇa rasābhinne carvaṇe kādācitkatvād vastuni vyabhicāreṇa tasya kāryatvaṃ
GK16visah_cu:3241: tena carvaṇasyāparicitena kāryatvena tadabhinne rasepi kāryatvamupacārāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3254: nanu yadi militā ratyādayo rasāstatkathamasya svaprakāśatvaṃ kathaṃ
GK16visah_cu:3278: tasya pratimānataḥ satsādṛśyāt ityādyaṃśopi svaprakāśa iti /
GK16visah_cu:3279: nanu yadi caitanyasya sajñānatvena jaḍasya svaprakāśatā tadā pramātṛbhāvamāpannasyāntaḥ karaṇasyāpi svaprakāśatvaṃ syāditi cenmaivam /
GK16visah_cu:3280: tatra hi triguṇātmake manasi sattvāṃśasya rajastamobhyāmaspṛṣṭatvam /
GK16visah_cu:3282: naca tayoḥ śavalatvamapi tāttvikaṃ, kuto tādātmyamiti,
GK16visah_cu:3285: yadi ratyādikaṃ prakāśaśarīrādatiriktaṃ syāttadaivāsya svaprakāśatvaṃ na
GK16visah_cu:3288: "yadyapi rasānanyatayā carvaṇāpi na kāryā tathāpi kādācitkatayā
GK16visah_cu:3293: "abhinno 'pi sa pramātrā vāsanopanītaratyāditādātmyena gocarīkṛtaḥ" iti ca /
GK16visah_cu:3300: tayā rasādirūpā pariṇatiryasya tādṛśarūpe ratyādibhāge vibhāvādikāryatvavyavahāraḥ ityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:3301: dvitīya iti ceti paryantaṃ samvādavākyatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:3308: gecarīkṛta iti cidānandamayoyaṃ puruṣa iti vadupacāraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3312: ratyādayo hi prathamamekaikaśaḥ pratīyamānāḥ sarve 'pyekībhūtāḥ sphuranta eva rasatāmāpadyante
GK16visah_cu:3323: vibhāvā ityādi kārikāyāṃ ratyādiprakāśasukhacamatkārā akaṇṭhoktā api prakaraṇadavaseyāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3331: brahmatattvavaditi---khaṇḍākhaṇaaḍanānāpadārthānām advaitabhāvānayā akhaṇḍasvarūpatvāt brahmatattvasya itica ityantaṃ samvādavākyam /
GK16visah_cu:3334: [text of comm. wanting in both printed ed. and Sansknet e-text!]
GK16visah_cu:3336: athaṃ ke te vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṇa ityapekṣāyāṃ vibhāvamāha--
GK16visah_cu:3341: ye hi loke rāmādigataratihāsādīnāmudvodhakāraṇāni sītādayasta eva kāvye nāṭye ca niveśitāḥ santaḥ "vibhāvyante āsvādāṅkuraprādurbhāvayogyāḥ kriyante sāmājikaratyādibhāvā ebhiḥ" iti vibhāvā ucyante /
GK16visah_cu:3346: natu pratītyarthaṃ kathaṃ viśeṣeṇa bhāvyantetatpratipādanasāmarthya eva tathātvaucityādityata āhaāsvādāṅkureti /
GK16visah_cu:3347: yata ebhirvibhāvādibhiḥ sāmājikaratyādibhāvā āsvādāṅkuraprādurbhāvayogyāḥ kriyante, ato viśeṣeṇa bhāvyanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3348: ato vibhāvā ucyante ityarthaḥ sāmājikaratyādibhāvānāṃ tathātvakaraṇaṃ rāmādiratyādīnāṃ ca tatrāropāt bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:3351: asyā paribhāṣāyāyogārūḍhatvādetadyogārthasyānubhāvādau sattvepi na tatra prayoga iti prāgapyuktam
GK16visah_cu:3359: raudrarasasthāyibhāvasthālambanavibhāvān śabdopahitarūpān śabdopasthāpyāt pratyakṣāniva sāmājikā manyante /
GK16visah_cu:3365: (lo, ī) śabdeti---śabdopahitarūpān kāvyarūpaśabdopādhinā śravaṇāt tadvuddhiviṣayatāmāpannānāṃ sādhanatvena sotsāhādyudabodhe manyante sabhyā iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3374: atha yasya rasasya yo vibhāvaḥ sa tatsvarūpavarṇane vakṣyate /
GK16visah_cu:3401: (vi, ja) prathamaṃ caturbheda iti---paścāttu dhīrodāttādīnām api dakṣiṇadhṛṣṭatvādibhedasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:3438: tatra teṣāṃ dhīrodāttādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ dakṣiṇadhṛṣṭānukūlaśaṭhatvena ṣoḍaśaprakārā nāyakaḥ
GK16visah_cu:3439: eṣu tvanekamahilāsu samarāgo dakṣiṇaḥ kathitaḥ // VisSd_3.35 //
GK16visah_cu:3448: snātā tiṣṭhati kuntaleśvarasutā, vāro 'ṅgarājasvasurdyūtai rātririyaṃ jitā kalamayā, devī prasādyādya ca /
GK16visah_cu:3449: ityantaḥ purasundarīḥ prati mayā vijñāyā vijñāpite devenāpratipattimūḍhamanasā dvitrāḥ sthitaṃ nāḍikāḥ //
GK16visah_cu:3453: anekapatnīsambhogārhā iyaṃ rātririti tatkarmaniyuktasya rājñi nivedanam /
GK16visah_cu:3460: sarvāsu anurāgasāmyena kasyāpyupekṣānarhatvāt apratipattyā kartavyanirṇayābhāvena mūḍhamanaskatvena dvitrādidaṇḍasthitiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3470: śoṇaṃ vīkṣya mukhaṃ vicumbitumahaṃ yātaḥ samīpaṃ tataḥ pādena prahṛtaṃ
GK16visah_cu:3471: tayā, sapadi taṃ dhṛtvā sahāse mayi /
GK16visah_cu:3472: kiñcittatra vidhātumakṣamatayā bāṣpaṃ sṛjantyāḥ sakhe ! dhyātaścetasi kautukaṃ vitanute kopo 'pi vāmabhruvaḥ //
GK16visah_cu:3475: (vi, ḍha) śoṇaṃ vīkṣyeti---roṣāruṇamukhīṃ priyāṃ cumbituṃ gatasya
GK16visah_cu:3476: tayā prahartumudyataṃ pādaṃ dhṛtvā kiñcit kartumakṣamīkṛtāṃ rudatīṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā hasitavato nāyakasya sakhyau vṛttāntakathanamidam /
GK16visah_cu:3485: asmākaṃ sakhi ! vāsasī na rucire, graiveyakaṃ nojjvalaṃ, no vakrā gātiruddhataṃ na hasitaṃ, naivāsti, kaścinmadaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3486: kintvanye 'pi janā vadanti subhago 'pyasyāḥ priyo nānyato dṛṣṭaṃ
GK16visah_cu:3490: (vi, ṇa) asmākaṃ sakhīti--paṣyau subhagāyā sakhyā uktiriyam /
GK16visah_cu:3492: kintu na kevalamahamanyepi janā vadanti asyāḥ patiranyato 'nyasyāṃ
GK16visah_cu:3494: viśvam---etad viśvavarti strījanaṃ duḥ sthitaṃ, mayi asūyayā madapekṣayā saubhāgyālpatvena vā duḥ sthitaṃ vayaṃ manyāmahe /
GK16visah_cu:3505: yaḥ punarekasyāmeva nāyikāyāṃ baddhabhāvo dvayorapi nāyikayorbahirdarśitānurāgo 'nyasyāṃ nāyikāyāṃ gūḍhaṃ vipriyamācarita sa śaṭhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3513: (vi, ta) śaṭhānyasyā iti---nāyikāyā vipriyakāriṇaṃ nāyakaṃ bhartsayantyā sakhyā uktiriyam
GK16visah_cu:3514: he śaṭha ! mama sakhīm āśliṣyanneva tvaṃ yadanyasyā nāyikāyāḥ
GK16visah_cu:3517: ato me sakhī ghṛtamadhumayena miśritaghṛtamadhurūpeṇa tvadīyabahucāṭuvacoviṣeṇāghūrṇantī kimapi kartavyaṃ na gaṇayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3532: (vi, da) atha prasaṅgāditi---atra eṣāmityanena nāyakamātrasyaiva parāmarśo natu prakānta śṛṅgārīyāṣṭacatvāriṃśata eva /
GK16visah_cu:3533: ata eva rāmasya sugrīvaḥ sahāyo darśayiṣyate /
GK16visah_cu:3549: (vi, dha) dūrānuvartinīti vyācaṣṭe---tasyeti dūrānuvartini ityasya vyākhyā bahuvyāpinīti bahudeśavyāpyasādhye ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3556: bhaktā narmasu nipuṇāḥ kupitavadhūmānabhañjanāḥ śuddhāḥ // VisSd_3.40 //
GK16visah_cu:3560: veśopacārakuśalo vāggmī madhuro 'tha bahumato goṣṭhyām // VisSd_3.41 //
GK16visah_cu:3576: karmaṇā, vapuṣā, veśena, vāsanadinā bhāṣādyaiḥ sarveṣāṃ hāsyaṃ janayati /
GK16visah_cu:3597: "mantrī svaṃ cobhayaṃ vāpi sakhā tasyārthacintane" iti kenācillakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam, tadapi rājñor'thacintanopāyalakṣaṇaprakaraṇo lakṣayitavyam, na tu sahāyakathanaprakaraṇo /
GK16visah_cu:3598: "nāyakasyārthacintane mantrī sahāyaḥ" ityukte 'pi nāyakasyārthata eva siddhatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:3601: (vi, ma) svaṃ ceti--svaṃ rājā tasya rājñaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3603: atra svasyāpi sahāyatvena kathanāt pūrvasmād bhedaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3608: "mantriṇāṃ lalitaḥ śeṣā mantriṣvāyattasiddhayaḥ" iti, tadapi svalakṣaṇakathanenaika lakṣitasya dhīralalitasya mantrimātrāyattārthacintanopapattergatārtham /
GK16visah_cu:3609: na cārthacintane tasya mantrī sahāyaḥ, kiṃ tu svayameva saṃpādakaḥ;
GK16visah_cu:3613: (vi, ya) mantriṇeti---lalito dhīralalitastādṛśo rājā mantriṇaivārthasādhakaḥ iti śeṣaḥ, svasya śṛṅgāraniratatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:3617: "niścinto mṛduraniśaṃ kalāparo dhīralalitaḥ syāditi dhīralalitalakṣaṇe niścintetvainārthacintanasya
GK16visah_cu:3623: ayaṃ mantrī syādarthānāṃ cintāyāmiti sūtrasya parabhāgaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3627: sahāyakathanaprastāve mantriṇa eva sahāyatvakathanaṃ yuktam; natu ātmana ubhayasya vā /
GK16visah_cu:3629: kintu rājā kenārthacintanaṃ kuryādityapekṣāyāmeva kvacin mantriṇā
GK16visah_cu:3632: kiñca tadapyarthacintanopāyaprakaraṇa eva lakṣitavyam; natu sahāyakathanaprakaraṇe /
GK16visah_cu:3640: so 'yamanūḍhābhrātā rājñaḥ śyālaḥ śakāra ityuktaḥ // VisSd_3.44 //
GK16visah_cu:3644: duṣkulatā aiśvaryaṃ ca tābhyāṃ saṃyuktopi madamūrkhatābhyāmabhimānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3650: naṣṭaṃ varṣavarairmanuṣyagaṇanābhāvādapāsya trapā- mantaḥ kañcukikañcukasya viśati trāsādayaṃ vāmanaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3651: paryantāśrayibhinijasya sadṛśaṃ nāmnaḥ kirātaiḥ kṛtaṃ kubjā nīcatayaiva yānti śanakairātmekṣaṇāśaṅkinaḥ
GK16visah_cu:3654: (vi, la) naṣṭaṃ varṣavarairiti---rājño vājiśālāta āgatamekaṃ mahāvanaraṃ dṛṣṭvā antaḥ purasthanapuṃsakādīnāṃ bhītikriyāvarṇanamidam /
GK16visah_cu:3656: nijasya nāmna iti kṛ vekṣepa iti dhātunā kirātapadasya sādhitatvāt svasya paryantaviśīrṇatvaṃ kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3658: kintu nīcatayaiva vānarakartṛke ātmakarmake īkṣaṇe aśaṅkinaḥ śaṅkārahitāḥ santaḥ śanakairyāntītyarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:3673: daṇḍanīyasya aṭavyāṃ palāyitasya pradarśakatvāddaṇḍanīyavipakṣarājyāṭavyāṃ sthitatvāttadvṛttāntajñātatvācca sāmantaḥ senāpatiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3694: suśliṣṭaṃ kurute kāryaṃ nisṛṣṭārthastu sa smṛtaḥ // VisSd_3.48 //
GK16visah_cu:3705: yāvaditi prerakeṇa yāvada bhāṣitasya sandeśasa hāraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3717: sattvajāḥ tadudbhavāḥ sattvavatāṃ nāyakānā guṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3721: nīye ghṛṇādhike spardhā yataḥ śobheti tāṃ viduḥ // VisSd_3.51 //
GK16visah_cu:3725: (vi, sa) yataḥ śobheti--yato balāt śobhālakṣaṇena anurāgitoktā /
GK16visah_cu:3735: prakṛtiṣu amātyeṣu madhye sarva eva ityacintayat kiṃ tat ityatrāha--ahameveti /
GK16visah_cu:3739: nimnagā nadyaḥ tāsāṃ sarvāsāmevodadhinā jalagrahaṇena kṛtādaratvāt /
GK16visah_cu:3744: (vi, ka) dhīreti---vilāse sāttvike guṇe sati dhīretyādikaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:3748: kaumārake 'pi girivadgurutāṃ dadhāno vīro rasaḥ kimayametyuta darpa eva //
GK16visah_cu:3752: tṛṇīkṛto jagattrayasya sattvānāṃ balānāṃ sāraḥ prakṛṣṭo bhāgo yathā /
