GK16visah_cu:6544: "yatkiñcilloke śuci medhyamujjvalaṃ darśanīyaṃ vā tatsarvaṃ śṛṅgāreṇopamīyate (upayujyate ca)" iti /
GK16visah_cu:6547: (vi, ṭa) vācyaṃ śucimedhyamiti---śuci śuddhaṃ vastrādi, medhyaṃ pavitram anyad vā yat taduddīpanavibhāvarūpatayā vācyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6549: śṛṅgāreṇa hetunā upamīyate taduddīpanatayā upamīyate upasthāpyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6562: kaṣāyite hi vastrādau bhūyān rāgo vivardhate" //
GK16visah_cu:6564: tatra pūrvarāgānantaraṃ saṃbhogo yathā kumārasambhave pārvatīparameśvarayoḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6575: "kṣemaṃ te nanu pakṣmalākṣi !- kisaaṃ khemaṃ mahaṅgaṃ diḍhaṃ, etādṛkkṛśatā kutaḥ tuha puṇo puṭṭhaṃ sarīraṃ jado /
GK16visah_cu:6576: kenāhaṃ pṛthulaḥ praye !- paṇaiṇīdehassa sammelaṇāt, tvattaḥ subhru ! na kapi me, jai idaṃ khemaṃ kudo pucchasi" //
GK16visah_cu:6581: jai iti--- yadi idaṃ kṣemaṃ kutaḥ pṛcchasi /
GK16visah_cu:6582: ayamarthaḥ---yadāhameva praṇayinī kimiti māṃ parihṛtya dūraṃ gato 'si
GK16visah_cu:6585: saṃyogaviyogau ca parasparāyattatārūpau tena dūtipraṣaṇādeḥ saṃbhogaviṣayatvam /
GK16visah_cu:6591: (vi, ḍa) kṣemaṃ te nanu ityādi---ime dampatyoruktipratyuktī /
GK16visah_cu:6592: tatra pravāsādagatasya patyuḥ saṃskṛtoktiḥ; tat patnyāḥ prākṛtoktiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6596: puṭṭhamiti---tava punaḥ śarīraṃ puṣṭaṃ yata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6597: paṇaiṇīti---praṇayinyā mama dehasya saṃbhiśraṇāt saṃkocāt kṛśīkaraṇādityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6598: etāvat kālaṃ tava vaideśyāt, niścitena tavānurāgeṇa yato 'haṃ kṛśā;
GK16visah_cu:6599: ato māṃ kṛśāṃ kṛtvā manmāsena tava śarīraṃ puṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6601: he subhru ! tvattaḥ kāpi na me kāpi puṣṭiḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6602: jai idamiti yadīdaṃ tadā kṣemaṃ kutaḥ pṛcchasi /
GK16visah_cu:6604: matkārśye 'pi tava paṣṭyā ca mayi tavānurāgābhāvenaiva puṣṭiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6605: anurāgasattve tu madvirahāt kārśyaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6607: tatra ca maraṇānantaraṃ jīvane mahāśvetāpuṇḍarīkayoḥ sambhoge /
GK16visah_cu:6625: (lo, ai) hāsya iti---vikṛtād vikiyāyuktāda vāgveśaceṣṭādeḥ kuhakākhyavañcanāprayogācca hāsyaraso bhavediti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6631: kiñcillakṣyadvijaṃ tatra hasitaṃ kathitaṃ budhaiḥ // VisSd_3.218 //
GK16visah_cu:6633: apahasitaṃ sāstrākṣaṃ vikṣiptāṅgaṃ ca bhavatyatihasitam // VisSd_3.219 //
GK16visah_cu:6647: kāyocchvasanadṛṣṭisaṅkocādayo harṣāvahitthādayaśca anubhāvavyabhicāriṇaḥ anuktā api sāmarthyāllabhyāḥ
GK16visah_cu:6651: yasya hāsaḥ sa ceta kvāpi sākṣānnaiva nibadhyate /
GK16visah_cu:6657: (vi, ta) atra cottamādiṣu ya upahāsakastasya smitādikamunneyam /
GK16visah_cu:6660: abhedeneti---sa upahāsakaḥ sāmājikaiḥ vibhāvādisādhāraṇyāt yataḥ abhedena pratīyate tato hāsyaraso 'yamanumīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6665: tataśca svādanākhyena vyāpāreṇa hāsyarasa āsvādyata iti pūrvāparagranthaniṣkarṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6680: "vipine kva jaṭānibandhanaṃ tava cedaṃ kva manoharaṃ vapuḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6681: anayorghaṭanā vidheḥ sphuṭaṃ nanu khaḍgena śirīṣakarttanam" //
GK16visah_cu:6689: tatra bandhuviyoge yathā---"hā mātastvaritāsi kutra kimidaṃ hā devatāḥ kvāśiṣaḥ dhik prāṇān patito 'śanirhutavahaste 'ṅgeṣu dagdhe dṛśau /
GK16visah_cu:6690: itthaṃ ghargharamadhyaruddhakaruṇāpaurāṅganānāṃ giraḥ citrasthānapi rodayanti śatadhā kurvanti bhittīrapi //
GK16visah_cu:6691: "idaṃ madālasāyāṃ mṛtāyāṃ purastrīṇāṃ rodanasya kenāpi kathanam /
GK16visah_cu:6692: vittanāśe yathā-"kiṃ karomi kka gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ kka vrajāmyaham /
GK16visah_cu:6698: vipralambhe ratiḥ sthāyī punaḥ saṃbhogahetukaḥ // VisSd_3.226 //
GK16visah_cu:6719: narakaripuṇā sārdhaṃ teṣāṃ sabhīmakirīṭinā- mayamahamasṛṅmedomāṃsaiḥ karomi diśāṃ balim" //
GK16visah_cu:6724: idaṃ svayaṃ mṛtasya mama pituḥ śiracchedarūpaṃ gurupātakaṃ yairudāyudhairmanujapaśubhirnirmayādairbhavaddhiḥ kṛtamanumataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vā narakāsurasya ripuṇā śrīkṛṣṇena sārddhaṃ sabhīmakirīṭināṃ teṣāṃ medomāṃsaiḥ diśāṃ diksthitabhūtānāṃ balimayamaham etatkṣaṇavartto ahaṃ karomītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6727: narakaripupadopādānāt narakahetupātakahantāraṃ gurupātakakāriṇañca haniṣyāmīti sūcanāt matkrodhe jagadeva naṅkṣyati iti sūcitam /
GK16visah_cu:6746: sa ca dānadarmayuddhairdayayā ca samanvitaścaturdhā syāt // VisSd_3.234 //
GK16visah_cu:6747: sa ca vīro dānavīro dharmavīro yuddhavīro dayāvīraśceti caturvidhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6753: sarvasvatyāgādibhiranubhāvairanubhāvito, harṣadhṛtyādibhaiḥ saṃcāribhiḥ puṣṭiṃ nīto dānavīratāṃ bhajate /
GK16visah_cu:6756: (vi, pa) tyāgaḥ saptasamudreti---saptasamudrāvṛttayā mahyā nirvyājadānaparyyantaḥ tyāga ityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:6761: "rājyaṃ ca vasu dehaśca bhāryā bhrātṛsutāśca ye /
GK16visah_cu:6762: yacca loke mamāyattaṃ tad dharmāya sadodyatam" //
GK16visah_cu:6764: bho laṅkeśvara ! dīyatāṃ janakajā rāmaḥ svayaṃ yācate ko 'yaṃ te mativibhramaḥ smara nayaṃ nādyāpi kiṃcidratam /
GK16visah_cu:6765: naivaṃ cet kharadūṣaṇatriśirasāṃ kaṇṭhāsṛjā paṅkilaḥ pattrī naiṣa sahiṣyate mama dhanurjyābandhabandhūkṛtaḥ"
GK16visah_cu:6769: rāmo rāmanāmnā khyāto vālihantā svayaṃ yācate /
GK16visah_cu:6772: mayā saha sandherupāyaḥ ko 'pi na gata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6773: naivaṃ cet sītā na dīyate cet tadā mama dhanuḥ jyābandhasya bandhūkṛta eṣa patrī vāṇo na sahiṣyate
GK16visah_cu:6777: "śirāmukhaiḥ syandata eva raktamadyāpi dehe mama māṃsamasti /
GK16visah_cu:6778: tṛptiṃ na paśyāmi tavāpi tāvat kiṃ bhakṣaṇāttvaṃ virato garutman ! /
GK16visah_cu:6783: garuḍena bhakṣyamāṇaṃ nāgaṃ paritrātuṃ tadbhakṣaṇāya ātmadehamarpitavatastadbhakṣitabahumāṃsasya jīmūtavāhanasyātṛptaṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visah_cu:6784: he garutman ! adyāpi mama dehe māṃsamasti /
GK16visah_cu:6785: atra hetumāha---mama kīdṛśasya śirāmukheṃ raktaṃ syandata eva /
GK16visah_cu:6786: ato yadyapi bahūni māṃsāni bhakṣitāni tathāpi tṛptimātmani na paśyāmi
GK16visah_cu:6798: (vi, bha) bhayānakānubhāveṣu pulakaḥ kiñcid aṅgeṣu romāñcaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6814: ārttaḥ paryastanetraḥ prakaṭitadaśanaḥ pretaraṅkaḥ karaṅkādaṅkasthādasthiṃsthaṃ sthapuṭagatamapi kravyamadhyagramatti" //
GK16visah_cu:6819: utkṛtyeti---karālārādhanāya gatasya mādhavasya śavaṃ bhuñjānaṃ pretaṃ dṛṣṭvā uktiriyam
GK16visah_cu:6822: aṅkasthāt śavāt asthisaṃsthaṃ sthapuṭagatamapi kravyaṃmāṃsaṃ prakaṭitadaśanaḥ sannavyagraṃ yathā syāttathātti /
GK16visah_cu:6823: kiṃ kṛtvā prathamaṃ kṛttiṃ carmma utkṛtyokṛtya /
GK16visah_cu:6824: athānantaraṃ aṃse bhujamūle sphici nitambe pṛṣṭe ca /
GK16visah_cu:6828: māṃsāni kīdṛśāni pṛthunā ucchothena tatphullatayā bhūyāṃsi bahūni tathā atidurgandhīni /
GK16visah_cu:6839: guṇānāṃ tasya mahimā bhaveduddīpanaṃ punaḥ // VisSd_3.243 //
GK16visah_cu:6851: dordaṇḍeti--rāmeṇa dhanuṣi bhagne tacchabdaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya uktiriyam /
GK16visah_cu:6852: dordaṇḍenāñcitasya utkṣiptasya candraśekharadhanurdaṇḍasyāvabhaṅgena udgato jhaṅkāradhvaniḥ aho 'dyāpi na viśrāmyati /
GK16visah_cu:6854: āryyasya rāmasya bālacaritānāṃ prastāvanāyāḥ prakhyāpanāyāḥ ḍiṇḍimo vādyaviśeṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6855: punaḥ kīdṛśaḥ--drāksahasā paryyastābhyāmutkṣiptābhyāṃ kapālasaṃpuṭābhyāṃ punarmilito brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍasya caṇḍaśabdāt utphulya
GK16visah_cu:6863: evaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭatayā milati jāyamāne brahmaṇḍabhāṇḍodare bhrāmyan piṇḍitaḥ piṇḍībhūtaḥ caṇḍimā caṇḍatvaṃ yasyeti jhaṅkāradhvanorviśeṣaṇam /
GK16visah_cu:6869: yattu nirvedasya sthāyibhāvatāvalambanena śāntarasasvīkāraḥ gṛtastadayuktam , tasya svādyamānarūpatvāt saṃcāribhāvasyaiva nāṭyatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:6875: (vi, ra) anityatvādinā ityatra ādipadāt iṣṭaviyogādinā vairāgyaparigrahaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6883: "rathyāntaścaratastathā dhṛtajarat kanthālavasyādhvagaiḥ satrāsaṃ ca sakautukaṃ ca sadayaṃ dṛṣṭasya tairnāgaraiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6884: nirvyājīkṛtacitsudhārasamudā nidrāyamāṇasya me niḥśaṅkaḥ karaṭaḥ kadā karapuṭībhikṣāṃ viluṇṭhiṣyati"
GK16visah_cu:6889: nirbojīkṛtayā citsudhārasamudā jñānāmṛtaharṣeṇa nidrāyamāṇasya me kadā karapuṭībhikṣāṃ karaṭaḥ kāko viluṇṭhiṣyati /
GK16visah_cu:6891: mama kīdṛśasya, bhikṣāviluṇṭhanādibhayābhāvāt niḥ śaṅkaṃ carataḥ rathyāntaḥ nagararājamārgamadhye carataḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6893: ataḥ taiḥ rathyāsthaiḥ adhvagairnāgaraiḥ kanthādiviparītadarśanāt satrāsañca sakautukañca daridrāvasthādarśanāt sadayañca dṛṣṭasya /
GK16visah_cu:6902: nirbojīkṛto yo 'sau citjñānameva sudhārasaḥ tena prakāśena yā mut
GK16visah_cu:6905: nirbojīkṛtasyāyamarthaḥ-- nirgataṃ bījaṃ saṃsārakāraṇam avidyākhyaṃ yasmāt prakāśādityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:6906: nirgataṃ bījam ātmaprakāśajñānakāraṇaṃ mano yatra sa nirbojaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6912: dayāvīrādau hi nāgānandadau jīmūtavāhanāderantarā malayavatyādyanurāgāderante ca vidyādharacakravatitvādyāpterdarśanādahaṅkāropaśamo na dṛśyate /
GK16visah_cu:6916: "na yatra duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ na cintā na dveṣarāgau na ca kacidicchā /
GK16visah_cu:6917: rasaḥ sa śāntaḥ kathito manīndraiḥ sarveṣu bhāveṣu samapramāṇaḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:6924: atra ca iti---mokṣāvasthīyaśāntaḥ sa evayato rasatāmetīti
GK16visah_cu:6929: sarveṣu loṣṭrāśmakāñcanādiṣu bhāveṣu padārtheṣu gamaṃ tulyaṃ pramāṇaṃ jñānaṃ yatra /
GK16visah_cu:6931: ityevaṃrūpasya śāntasya mokṣāvasthāyāmevātmasvarūpāpattilakṣaṇāyāṃ prādurbhāvāttatra sañcāryādīnāmabhāvāt kathaṃ rasatvamityucyate--
GK16visah_cu:6933: (lo, ū) ātmeti---ātmasvarūpasya āpattiḥ prāptiḥ lakṣaṇaṃ svarūpaṃ yasyāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6935: yuktaviyuktadaśāyāmavasthito yaḥ śamaḥ sa eva yataḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6936: rasatāmeti tadasmin sañcāryādeḥ sthitiśca na viruddhā // VisSd_3.250 //
GK16visah_cu:6943: tena śāntasya vaiṣayikasukhabhinnaṃ tṛṣṇākṣayādhīnaṃ sukhamastyeva ityuktam /
GK16visah_cu:6945: (lo, ṛ) yukteti---tatra viṣayebhyaḥ parāvṛtya sākṣāt kartavye brahmaṇi mano nidhāya varttamānatvacintāsantānavān yuktaḥ, yasya ca yogajadharmasahakṛtena manasā, jijñāsitavastusākṣātkāro jāyate, yaśca bhūtvendriyajayī aṇimādyaḥ kāyasiddhīrdūraśraṇādyā hyatīndriyāṇi sve sve viṣaye sahattvasannikarṣādisahakāranirapekṣāṇi varttante, evaṃ yuktaviyuktāvasthāyāmityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6960: kadā vārāṇasyāmiha suradhunīrodhasi vasan vasānaḥ kaupīnaṃ śirasi nidadhāno 'ñjalipuṭam /
GK16visah_cu:6961: aye gaurīnātha ! tripurahara ! śaṃbho ! trinayana ! prasīdeti krośan nimiṣamiva neṣyāmi divasān" //
GK16visah_cu:6966: kadā vārāṇasyāmiti--iha vārāṇasyāṃ suradhunyā gaṅgāyā rodhasi tīre pulin vā vasan ahaṃ kaupīnadvayañca vasānaḥ śirasyañjalipuṭaṃ dadhānaśca aye gaurīnāthetyādinā'krośan ca kadā divasān nimeṣamiva neṣyāmītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6967: atra kaupīnādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ sukhādirāhityaprāptyā sarvāhaṅkārarāhityalābhād devaviṣayaraterapi śāntarasatvaprāptiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6970: sphuṭaṃ camatkāritayā vatsalaṃ ca rasaṃ viduḥ /
GK16visah_cu:6974: (vi, ha) vatsalatāsneha iti---na caivaṃ dayāvīratvaprasaktiriti vācyam , ātmāpakāreṇāpi paropacikīrṣāprayojakadharmaviśeṣasya dayātvāt
GK16visah_cu:6975: sukhasambandhini anurāgaviśeṣasya ca snehatvāt iti anayorbhedāt /
GK16visah_cu:6988: "yadāha dhātryā prathamoditaṃ vaco yayau tadīyāmavalambya cāṅgalīm /
GK16visah_cu:6989: abhūcca namraḥ praṇipātaśikṣayā piturmudaṃ tena tatāna sor'bhakaḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:6992: (vi, kṣa) yadāha dhātryeti---uditasya uccāritasya prathamaṃ prathamoditamiti"rājadantādisamāsāt"
GK16visah_cu:6993: dātryā uditaśca nārāyaṇetyādiśabdaśca prathamaṃ"nā"ityādi yadvacaḥ raghurāha tadīyāṃ dhātrīyām aṅgulimavalambya yacca yayau praṇipātaśikṣayā yacca namno 'bhūt, tena karmaṇā piturdilīpasya mudaṃ tatāna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:7000: bhayānakena śāntena tathā vīrarasaḥ smṛtaḥ // VisSd_3.256 //
GK16visah_cu:7007: unmādādirna tu sthāyī na pātre syairyameti yat /
GK16visah_cu:7012: (lo, e) nanūnmādānāṃ sthāyitvamavalambya kathamanye 'pi rasā noktāḥ ityāśaṅkyāha--kuto 'pīti /
GK16visah_cu:7022: rasanādrasā iti---rasanam āsvādanaṃ tadrūpasādṛśyāt gauṇyā lakṣaṇayā rasapadārtha ityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:7025: (lo, ai) nanu yadi rasātmakaṃ vākyameva kāvyaṃ tāha
GK16visah_cu:7039: udvuddhamātraḥ jñātamātraḥ; natu viśiṣya niścita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:7040: sthāyī sthāyibhāvavad vācyo natu sthiratāmāpanna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:7041: nanu sañcāriṇastāvadrasanadharmasambandhina eva, tataśca sañcārisattve 'vaśyaṃ rasasattvam
GK16visah_cu:7042: tathā ca dhvanireva rasa ityataḥ kathaṃ tatra bhāvadhvanitvamityata āha---na bhāvo raseti
GK16visah_cu:7044: tatra yathāpradhānatayā rasastiṣṭhati evaṃ rase 'pi apradhānatayā
GK16visah_cu:7047: ityuktadiśā paramālocanayā paramaviśrāntisthānena rasena sahaiva vartamānā api rājānugatavivāhapravṛttabhṛtyavadāpātato yatra pradhānyenābhivyaktā vyabhicāriṇo devamunigurunṛpādivaṣayā ca ratirudbuddhamātrā vibhāvādibhiraparipuṣṭatayā rasarūpatāmanāpadyamānāśca sthāyino bhāvā bhāvaśabdavācyāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:7053: evaṃ pradhānamapi raso nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyasya bhāvasya pradhānasya anuga ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:7054: udvuddhamātrā ityādikaṃ sthāyino bhāvā ityasya viśeṣaṇam /
GK16visah_cu:7055: teṣāṃ rasatānāptau hetuḥ vibhāvādiriti, tairaparipoṣaśca tasya viśiṣyāniścitatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:7070: "divi vā bhuvi vā mamāstu vāso narake vā narakāntaka ! prakāmam /
GK16visah_cu:7074: (vi, ca) divi vā bhuvi veti---he narakāsurāntaka maraṇe jāte mama divi bhuvi vā narake vā vāso 'stu /
GK16visah_cu:7077: tadā ca divi vā ityādikam asambaddhaṃ syāt /
GK16visah_cu:7083: tathāpi śuśraṣurahaṃ garīyasīrgiro 'thavā śreyasi kena tṛpyate" //
GK16visah_cu:7088: he mune tava amunā vilokanenaiva kṛtārthaḥ kato 'smi /
GK16visah_cu:7090: nabarhitaṃ nāśitam aṃhaḥ pāpaṃ yena tādṛśena /
GK16visah_cu:7091: tathāpi tava garīyasīḥ giraḥ śuśrūṣuḥ śrotu micthurammi /
GK16visah_cu:7093: kena janena śreyasi maṅgale tṛpyate; api tu na kenāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:7097: na dhatte śirasā gaṅgāṃ bhūribhārabhiyā haraḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:7101: tava vājirājyā nirdhūtaṃ yad dhūlipaṭalaṃ tena paṅkilām /

GK16visah_cu:7839: atrānena kavinibaddhasya kasyacitkāminaḥ prauḍhoktisiddhena vastunā tavādharaḥ puṇyātiśayalabhya iti vastu pratīyate /
GK16visah_cu:7844: asau śukaśāvakaḥ kka nu śikhariṇi kasmin parvate kiyacciraṃ kimabhidhānaṃ kiṃ nāmakaṃ tapaḥ akarot /

GK16visah_cu:7858: sambodhanāt kāmuka evātra vaktā natu kaviḥ /

GK16visah_cu:7872: ata eva kathaṃmānaṃ na muñcasi iti vyākhyā /

GK16visah_cu:7888: nāyakasya bahunāyikābhāvanāduḥ khena kṛśāyā nāyikāyā avasthāṃ nāyake kathayantyāstatsakhyā uktiriyam /

GK16visah_cu:7899: rūpakādyalaṅkāreṣu hi vācyānāṃ rūpyāṇāṃ mukhādīnāmeva rūpaṇādivyāpārād rūpakādibhyaścandrādibhyaśca prādhānyamityarthaḥ /

GK16visah_cu:7914: ata eva lakṣyavyaṅgyayorapi vyañjakatvamudāhāryyamiti tenoktam nanu rūpaṇameva rūpakālaṅkāraḥ

GK16visah_cu:8143: atra svataḥ saṃbhavinā vastunā kṛtaparapuruṣaparicayā klāntāsīti vastu vyajyate /
GK16visah_cu:8144: taccādhunā klāntāsi, na tu pūrvaṃ kadācidapi tavaivaṃvidhaḥ klamo dṛṣṭa iti bodhayato 'dhunā padasyaivetarapadārthotkarṣādasyaiva padāntarāpekṣayā vaiśiṣṭyam /
GK16visah_cu:8152: (vi, tha) svataḥ sambhavivastuvyaṅgyamalaṅkāraṃ padavyaṅgyamāha--tadaprāptītyādiślokadvayaṃ pūrvavarṇṇitavyavasāyād anyā gopakanyakā nirucchvāsatayā niruddhapraṇavāyutayā muktiṃ gatā muktihetuṃ śrīkṛṣṇacintanamāha--cintayantīti /
GK16visah_cu:8153: jagatsūtiṃ jagajjanakaṃ śrīkṛṣṇaṃ tathāpi samastapāpapuṇyakṣaye eva
GK16visah_cu:8157: na tasya prāṇā utkāmanti tatraiva samavalīyante; iti śruteḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8160: atrāśeṣacayapadaprabhāvādanekajanmasahastrabhogyaduṣkṛtasukṛtaphalarāśitādātmyādhyavasitātayā bhagavadvirahaduḥkhacintāhlādayoḥ pratyāyanamityatiśayoktidvayapratītiraśeṣacayapadadvayadyotyā atra ca vyañjakasya kaviprauḍhoktimantareṇāpi saṃbhavātsvataḥ saṃbhavitā /
GK16visah_cu:8169: yathā kamalamanambhasītyatra anukte upameye mukhe upamānakamalāropaḥ

GK16visah_cu:8172: tavdyayavyañjakau cātrāśeṣacayaśabdau pāpapuṇyayoḥ, aśeṣacayatvābhyāṃ nāśakayorduḥ khasukhayoraśeṣacayatvavyañjanāt
GK16visah_cu:8173: atra aśeṣacayapadayorekavākyasthatve 'pi dvābhyāṃ vyaṅgyadvayavyañjanānnaikavākyatvena vyañjakatvamataḥ padatvenaiva vyañjakatvam
GK16visah_cu:8178: atra paśyantīti kaviprauḍhoktisiddhena kāvyaliṅgālaṅkāreṇa na ke 'pyanye
GK16visah_cu:8183: tvaddānajalavāhinyā nadyā asaṃkhyapathagāmitvadarśanāt pathatrayagāminyā gaṅgāyā lajjayā śivāśirasi ātmagopanam /
GK16visah_cu:8187: tadevaṃ dhvaneḥ pūrvokteṣvaṣṭādaśasu bhedeṣu madhye śabdārthaśaktyuttho vyaṅgyo vākyamātre bhavannekaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8188: anye punaḥ saptadaśa vākye pade ceti catustriṃśaditi pañcatriṃśadbhedāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8194: tadaprāptimahāduḥ khetyādiślokadvayasya mahāvākyatve 'pi tatra vyañjakapadadvayasattvāt tadvyaṅgyasyaivodāharaṇatvena taddarśitam /
GK16visah_cu:8201: priyo vā yadi vā dveṣyaḥ prāṇināṃ gatirīdṛśaī" //
GK16visah_cu:8204: asya ca ślokasya padyāntarasacivasyaiva mahāvākyateti spaṣṭārtham /
GK16visah_cu:8207: iti divā prabhavato gṛdhrasya śmaśāne mṛtaṃ bālamupādāya tiṣṭhatāṃ taṃ parityajya gamanamiṣṭam
GK16visah_cu:8210: (vi, pa) alaṃ sthitvetyati---śmaśāne mṛtabālakam atyajatastadvandhūn prati gṛdhravākyamidaṃ ślokadvayarūpaṃ mahāvākyam /
GK16visah_cu:8213: tathā ca bālakaṃ tyaktvā yūyaṃ gacchadhvamiti vastu svataḥ sambhavivastunaḥ uktaprabandhārthasya vyaṅgyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8219: iti niśi samarthasya gomāyordivase parityāgo 'nabhilaṣita iti vākyasamahena dyotyate /
GK16visah_cu:8231: tathā ca ātrāpi svataḥ sambhavinā etatprabandhārthena vālakaparityāgānabhilāṣarūpaṃ vastu vyajyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8237: ataḥ svataḥ sambhavinā vastunā vasuta vyajyate /
GK16visah_cu:8239: bhūpatiryuvā"ityādinā"ubhayāṃ siddhimubhāvavāpatuḥ"ityante tulyayogitayā kāvyaliṅgena vā raghurāghavayorvyatirekālaṅkāraḥ pratīyate /
GK16visah_cu:8243: yathā māghakāvye śiśupāladūtoktau sandhau kāvye vastumātrarūpo vigrahaḥ upamādhvanirapi tathāvidhaḥ sambhāvyate /

GK16visah_cu:8264: karaṃ vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvamadharaṃ vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara ! hatāstvaṃ khalu kṛtī" //
GK16visah_cu:8265: atra "hatāḥ" iti na punaḥ "duḥkhaṃ prāptavantaḥ" iti hanprakṛteḥ /

GK16visah_cu:8270: kiṃ brāhmaṇasya aurasakanyātvena matpariṇayāyogyā, kiṃ vā tasya
GK16visah_cu:8276: (lo, i) padāṃśe iti--iha yadyapi prakṛtyādeḥ kevalasya na
GK16visah_cu:8280: tathā hyatra hatā ityasya sthāne ktapratyayaṃ sthāpayitvā hanaḥ sthāne prakṛtyantaraniveśane na tathā pratītiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8283: mukhamaṃsavivarti pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kathamapyunnamitaṃ na cumbitaṃ tu" //
GK16visah_cu:8291: atreti---nañā eva cumbanābhāvalābhe tuśabdena cumbasya atyantavyavacchedalābhāt vipralambhānutāpātiśayo vyaṅgyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8293: "nyakkāro hyayameva me yadaraḥ--" ityādau (8 pṛ.) "arayaḥ" iti
GK16visah_cu:8295: "nihanti" iti "jīvati iti ca tiṅaḥ, "aho" ityavyayasya, "grāmaṭikā" iti
GK16visah_cu:8296: karūpataddhitasya, "viluṇṭhana" iti vyupasargasya, "bhujaiḥ" iti bahuvacanasya vyañjakatvam
GK16visah_cu:8306: tiṅa iti---madanavadhāne pūrvaṃ nihantu, varttamānamapi hananamityatra viṣādaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8310: tathā hi--yadi luṇṭhane svargo 'pi svalpagrāmaḥ kapratyayavaśāt cātyantasvalpaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8314: nari nari kirati drāk sāyakān puṣpadhanvā puri puri ca nivṛttā māninīmānacarccā //
GK16visah_cu:8318: (lo, ī) nyakkāra ityādau udāharaṇadvaye padāṃśavyañjakatvasya prakṛtatve 'pi prasaṅgāt padavyañjakatvakathanam
GK16visah_cu:8320: "rāmo 'sau bhuvaneṣu vikamaguṇaiḥ prāptaḥ prasiddhiṃ parāmasmadbhāgyaviparyayādiha paraṃ devo na jānāti tam /
GK16visah_cu:8321: vandī vaiṣa yaśāṃsi gāyati marut yasyaikabāṇāhataśreṇībhūtaviśālaśālavivaroktīrṇaiḥ svaraiḥ saptabhaiḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:8323: bhuvaneṣvityatra bahuvacanena guṇairityatra prakṛtyā bahuvacanena ca
GK16visah_cu:8324: te te viśeṣā asmad bhāgyaviparyayādityatra ca na tava na mama kintvasmākaṃ sarveṣāmapi bhāgyaviparyayādityasmadbhāgyaviparyayādityatra na khalvabhāgyāt kintu bhagyaviparyayāt /
GK16visah_cu:8326: saṃprati tu anavadhānena tasya viparyayo jāta iti pratipādanādātmānā pratipādanena ca te te sahṛdayasaṃvedyā arthāḥ pratīyante /
GK16visah_cu:8327: tathā saktotphulletyādau hareḥ paśyata ityatrānādaraṣaṣṭhyā kiñca na kevalaṃ rasādidhvanereva padāṃśaprakāśatā, kintu vastvalaṅkārayorapi /
GK16visah_cu:8329: "pathi pathi sukacañcūcārurābhāṅkurāṇāṃ diśi diśi pavamāno vīrudhāṃ lāsakaśca /
GK16visah_cu:8331: "āhāre viratiḥ, samastaviṣayagrāme nivṛttiḥ parā, nāsāgre nayanaṃ tadetadaparaṃ yaccaikatānaṃ manaḥ . maunaṃ cedamidaṃ ca śūnyamadhunā yadviśvamābhāti te, tadbrūyāḥ sakhi ! yoginī kimasi, bhoḥ !kiṃ vā
GK16visah_cu:8335: (vi, ra) āhāre iti--dhyāyantīṃ viyoginīṃ yogadharmiṇīṃ dṛṣṭvā
GK16visah_cu:8339: tava sthāne yadā viśvaṃ śūnyamābhāti ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8341: atra tu "āhāre iti viṣayasaptamyāḥ, "samasta" iti "parā" iti ca viśeṣaṇadvayasya, "maunaṃ cedam" iti pratyakṣaparāmarśinaḥ sarvanāmnaḥ,
GK16visah_cu:8342: ābhāti" ityupasargasya "sakhi" iti praṇayasmāraṇasya "asi bhoḥ" iti sotprāsasya "kiṃ vā" ityuttarakṣadārḍhyasūcakasya vāśabdasya, "asi" iti varttamānopadeśasya ca tattadviṣayavyañjakatvaṃ sahṛdayasavedyam /
GK16visah_cu:8349: na tu yat kiñcidviṣaye etad viśeṣaṇasya samāsapadaikadeśaḥ, kintu padasyāpi pade vyañjakatvamastīti darśitam /
GK16visah_cu:8356: āṅupasargeṇa mithyātvarūpaṃ samyak pratibhāti iti bhāvabodhanāt vipralambhavyañjanam /
GK16visah_cu:8357: praṇayasmaraṇasyeti--tena dṛśyamāno vipralambho na tvayā gopanīya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8388: (vi, śa) ekapañcāśaditi---pūrvadarśitāḥ pañcatriṃśat kulakarūpamahāvakyavyaṅgyāḥ dvādaśapadaikadeśādivyaṅgyāḥ catvāra ityekapañcāśat eṣāṃ parasparayojane saṃkhyāṃ darśayati---saṅkareti /
GK16visah_cu:8389: aṅgāṅgitvarūpeṇa ekāśrayānupraveśarūpeṇa saṃdigdharūpeṇa ca trividhena saṃkareṇa yojane tasya trirūpatā /
GK16visah_cu:8390: kimayam--ayaṃ veti saṃśayāspadatvarūpaḥ ekaḥ, tayoḥ parasparānugrāhakānugrāhyabhāvarūpo dvitīyaḥ, tayorekavyañjakena vyañjanarūpastṛtīyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8392: ebiryāḥ saṃkhyā bhavanti tā āhavedeti---"aṅkānāṃ vāmataḥ krama'; iti rītyāvedāścatvāraḥ tadvāme khaṃ śūnyam /
GK16visah_cu:8397: ekasyaiva svajātīyena ekena svasvajātīyaiḥ pañcāśatā ca caturguṇane ekasyaiva caturadhikadviśatarūpatvam
GK16visah_cu:8398: evaṃ taduttarasya pūrveṇa saha cāturvidhyaṃ pūrvagaṇanāyāṃ praviṣṭamityataḥ tasya cāturvidhyasya agaṇyatvāt tasya dviśatarūpatvam /
GK16visah_cu:8399: evaṃ taduttarasya pūrvaddhābhyāṃ catuścaturvidhatvasya agaṇyatvāt caturnyūnadviśatarūpatvam
GK16visah_cu:8400: evaṃ rītyā caramasya caturūpatvamātraṃ guṇyamiti bhavatyuktarūpā saṃkhyā /
GK16visah_cu:8401: kāvyaprakāśe tu darśitakrameṇa kramaśo hrasamāvicāryya sarveṣāmeva caturadhikadviśatarūpatvena ekapañcāśata eva tādṛśasaṃkhyātvena
GK16visah_cu:8403: vastutastu atyantavicāre vedakhāgniśararūpā yā saṃkhyā granthakṛtā darśitā sāpi na sambhavati
GK16visah_cu:8404: tathā hi ekapañcāśata eva uktacāturvidhyaṃ na sambhavati,
GK16visah_cu:8410: (lo, ū) tadevamiti---evaṃ vyaṅgyasya padavākyagatatveṅgavṛttau pañcatriṃśadbhedāḥ saṃkhyātāḥ
GK16visah_cu:8412: rasasya padāṃśavarṇaracanāprabandhagatatvena catvāra iti militvā dhvanikāvyasya ekapañcaśadbhedāḥ śuddhā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8415: śuddhabhedānāmeva pañcāśataḥ sambhūya vedāścatvāraḥ, kha śūnyam,
GK16visah_cu:8418: tathā hi prathamabhedasya sajātīyamiśraṇe catvāro bhedāḥ; vijātīyaiḥ pañcāśatā pratyekaṃ dhvaninā vimaśraṇe catvāro bhedāḥ iti militvā
GK16visah_cu:8420: yadi prathamabhedasya dvitīyabhedena saha miśrayaṇaṃ; dvitīyabhedasya prathamabhedena saha tattadeveti /
GK16visah_cu:8422: evaṃ tṛtīye 'ṣṭau caturthe dvādaśa iti krameṇānyeṣāmapi svakīyādyabhedāpekṣayā sarveṣāṃ bhedacatuṣṭayapātanam
GK16visah_cu:8424: iṣavaḥ pañcabāṇāḥ; pañca agrayaḥ trayaḥ sāyakāḥ pañca evaṃ
GK16visah_cu:8426: jratra agrimāgrimabhedasya yojane ekaikabhedahrāsāt evaṃ prakāreṇa evaṃ yojanaṃ bhavati /
GK16visah_cu:8446: atra stanāveva pūrṇakumbhau, dṛṣṭaya eva navanīrajastraja iti rūpakadhvanirasadhvanyorekāśrayānupraveśaḥ saṅkaraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8454: tathā nistandra unnidraḥ candraḥ tādṛśavadanāyāḥ yad vadanāravindaṃ tasya saurabhyaṃ saugandhyaṃ tasya sauhṛdena saṃparkeṇa sagarvāḥ samīraṇā yatra tādṛśāni /
GK16visah_cu:8455: atreti candrasya nidrābhāvāt tandrāpadasyāprakāśe lakṣaṇā samīraṇasyotkṛṣṭatvaṃ tadvyaṅgyam, tathā samīraṇasya garvābhāvāt utkṛṣṭe lakṣaṇā sukhasparśatvaṃ tadvyaṅgyam /
GK16visah_cu:8459: alidhvanicandrasamīraṇaiḥ kāmoddīpakaiḥ vyaṅgyasya śṛṅgārasya apyatra pratītirityatastasya candrojjvalatvena samīraṇotkṛṣṭatvena tasya sukhasparśatvena ca lakṣaṇāmūlakavyaṅgye na prakarṣaṇādanugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvarupasaṃkaropyatraiva śloke bodhyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8462: yathā--- khaṇapāhuṇiā deara jāāe kiṃ pide bhāṇiā /
GK16visah_cu:8465: kṣaṇaprāghuṇikā devara jāyayā kimapi te bhaṇitā /
GK16visah_cu:8468: gṛhapatiprasaktāmupanāyikāmutsave tadgṛhāgatāṃ tatpatnyā bhartsitāṃ paścāt gṛhe rudatīmanunetuṃ gṛhapatijyeṣṭhabhrātṛpatnyāḥ sopahāsoktiriyam
GK16visah_cu:8469: atra kṣaṇa utsavastatra prāghuṇakā abhyāgatā utsavāgatetyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8470: taddevara sā te tava jāyayākimapyapriyaṃ bhaṇitā satī paścādvalabhīgṛhe roditīti /
GK16visah_cu:8475: ayaṃ kiṃ svataḥ sambhavivastuvyaṅgyavastudhvaniḥ kiṃvā anunayapade
GK16visah_cu:8496: bhedāstasyoditi iti--tasya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyakāvyasya evamaṣṭavidhavyaṅgyabhedāt tasyāṣṭau bhedā uditā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8498: (lo, ṝ) evaṃ dhvanyākhyaṃ kāvyasya bhedaṃ nirupya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyamavatārayati atheti--tatra syāditi---kākkā ākṣiptaṃ vācyavat sphuṭīkṛtam /
GK16visah_cu:8512: (vi, ka) rasāderaṅgaṃ rasādi ityubhayatra ādipadāt bhāvādyaṅgatāpi rasādeḥ, evaṃ vācyāṅgatvamapi vastvalaṅkārayorityuktam /
GK16visah_cu:8513: ayaṃ sa iti---bhūriśravasaḥ samarapatitaṃ hastamādāya rudatyāstatpatnyā uraktiriyam /
GK16visah_cu:8516: rasatāpannasya tasya śṛṅgāreṇa prakarṣaṇāt pūrvānubhūtasukhasmaraṇe hi karuṇaprakarṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8518: (lo, ḷ) yathoddeśamudājihīrṣuritarāṅgamiti vivṛṇoti, itarasyārthāt pradhānabhūtasya rasādeḥ, rasaśabdenātra bhāvādīnāmupagrahaḥ ādiśabdena
GK16visah_cu:8521: ---idaṃ hi mahābhārate, samaracchinnaṃ bhūriśravaso hastamādāya tatkāntāyā vilapanam /
GK16visah_cu:8525: hā !hā! kathaṃ nu bhavato ripurājadhānīprāsādasaṃtatiṣu tiṣṭhati kāmilokaḥ
GK16visah_cu:8531: bhavato ripurājadhānīprasādasantatiṣu kathaṃ kamilokastiṣṭhati iti anvayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8534: tādṛśasandiviśiṣṭānāṃ ripurājadhānīkāmilokānāṃ śocyāvasthājñāturvaktuḥ śokarūpaḥ karuṇo rājaviṣayaratibhāvasyāṅgamityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:8536: śokavyañjaka iti granthakṛto 'bhiprāyaḥ tadaiva vyaṅgyabhūtasya hāhāśabdapratipādyasya śokarūpakaruṇasya vyaṅgyatvopapatteḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8543: "janasthāne bhrāntaṃ kanakamṛgatṛṣṇāndhitadhiyā vaco vaidehīti pratipadamudaśru pralapitam
GK16visah_cu:8544: kṛtālaṅkābharturvadanaparipāṭīṣu ghaṭanā māyāptaṃ rāmatvaṃ kuśalavasutā na
GK16visah_cu:8550: mayā rāmatvaṃ prāptaṃ rāmasadṛśo 'haṃ jāta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8552: mayā kanakarūpayā mṛgatṛṣṇayā marīcikāyāndhitadhiyā janānāṃ sthāne bhrāntam asāre saṃsāre kanakasyāpi tucchatvena tasyopādetvabhramajanakatvādupādeyajalabhramakanakamṛgṛṣṇayāndhitadhiyā bhrāntam /
GK16visah_cu:8553: mayā vai iti sambodhya pratipadaṃ sthāne dehīti vacaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8554: mayā bharttuḥ īśvarasya paripāṭīṣu paricaryyāsu aṃlamityarthakā ghaṭanā na kṛtā tadvat rāmeṇāpi laṅkābharttuḥ rāvaṇasya vadanānāṃ mukhānāṃ paripāṭyāṃ paripāṭanasya nimittamiṣughaṭanā kṛtā kintu kuśalaṃ dāridṣāpanāyakaṃ vasu dhanaṃ yasya tādṛśatā tu mayā na prāptā /
GK16visah_cu:8555: atra tuśabdena rāmavāk chedāt rāmeṇa tu kuśalavasutā prāptā ityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:8556: pratīyate--tatra ca kuśalavau sutau yasyāstādṛśī sītetyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8558: (lo, e) aṅgaparipoṣakatvād vācyāṅgabhūtamanuraṇanarūpaṃ śabdaśaktimūlamudāharati-evaṃ ca rasabhāvāderaṅgaṃ rasabhāvādi, vācyasya cānuraṇanarūpaṃ vyaḍgyamiti dvidhetyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8561: kanakaṃ prati mṛgatṛṣṇā viphalāśā, kanakamṛge tṛṣṇā ca vai niścitaṃ;
GK16visah_cu:8564: kābharttuḥ kutsitasvāminaḥ yad vadanaṃ tasya paripāṭīṣu paramparāsu laṅkābharttuḥ rāvaṇasya vadanānāṃ mukhānāṃ paripāṭyāṃ paṅktau iṣughaṭanā śarayogaśca /
GK16visah_cu:8565: kuśalam āyatiśuddhaṃ vasu dhanaṃ yasya evaṃbhūtatā, kuśalavau sutau yasyāḥ sā sītā ca /
GK16visah_cu:8573: prāptatatkāt rāmāt upamānād vailakṣaṇyarūpo vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ naño vācyaḥ
GK16visah_cu:8575: tadaṅgamiti manasikṛtya vyaṅgyasya sādṛśyasya agūḍhatvāt guṇībhūtatvamupapādayitumāha--atra rāmatvamiti /
GK16visah_cu:8583: yadyapi ekaśabdarūpaṃ sādṛśyaṃ śrotragrāhyameva na tu vākyaṃ,
GK16visah_cu:8585: tathāpi śabdasya sādṛśyatvena rūpeṇa vyaṅgyatvameva na śrotragrahyatvam /
GK16visah_cu:8588: na ca tad gopanāt agūḍharūpaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprabheda evāyamiti vācyam
GK16visah_cu:8590: vācyārtho rāmavyatireko naño vācyaḥ, tatprakarṣānvayopapādakatayā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8591: na tu rāmavyatirekasyānvayaniṣpādakatayā abādhitatvena tad vināpi tanniṣpatteḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8595: tathā ca vyatirekālaṅkāraśarīraghaṭakameva sādṛśyam; kathaṃ tatprakarṣakamiti cenna /
GK16visah_cu:8596: ekaviśeṣaṇenāpi tad ghaṭanasambhave bahuviśeṣaṇasambhavāttatprakarṣakatvamapi labhyate tacca
GK16visah_cu:8598: (lo, ai) atreti vacane tu rāmo 'smītyuktvā punaḥ sādṛśyahetukatādātmyaropaṇaṃ janasthāna ityādi vacanapratipādanenāpi labhyam /
GK16visah_cu:8602: vyaṅgyamiti pāṭhe tu sugamā eva vyākhyā /
GK16visah_cu:8608: "mathnāmi kauravaśataṃ samare na kopādduḥśāsanasya rudhiraṃ na
GK16visah_cu:8610: saṃcūrṇayāmi gadayā na suyodhanorūṃ sandhi karotu bhavatāṃ nṛpatiḥ paṇena"
GK16visah_cu:8611: atra mathnāmyevetyādivyaṅgyaṃ vācyasya niṣedhasya sahabhāvenaiva sthitam /
GK16visah_cu:8616: mathnāmīti---duryoghanena saha sandhikaraṇe pravṛttaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ śrutvā kuddhasya bhīmasya sahadevaṃ pratyuktiriyam /
GK16visah_cu:8617: bhavatāmityanena asmākam asamīhitakāritvāt nāsmākaṃ nṛpatiriti sūcitam /
GK16visah_cu:8621: tayā vyañjanayā aparanañor'thopasthāpanāt na mathnāmītyartho labhyate
GK16visah_cu:8635: (vi, ca) vācyasiddhyaṅgamudāharati---anupannasya vācyārthasya yad vyaṅgyānvayenaiva siddhiḥ tādṛśaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ vācyasiddhyaṅgam /
GK16visah_cu:8638: anvayasāya vairikulasya vaṃśapadavācyasya veṇutvaropaṇarūpo vyaṅgaya iti kulaveṇudvayārthakasya vaṃśapadasya prakaraṇāt kule niyantraṇena veṇo stad vyaṅgyatvena tadrūpaṇasyāpi vyaṅgyatvāt davānalatvāropasiddhyaṅgamiti kule davā nalavādhena veṇāveda tad bādhāt /
GK16visah_cu:8640: yadi prakaraṇavaśāt anekārthasya vaṃśapadasya prathamaṃ kulabodhakatvam; tadaiva veṇurūpor'tho vyaṅgyo bhavati tadeva tu na;
GK16visah_cu:8642: kintu kulaveṇyorubhayorekadā eva davānalānvayārthaṃ tātparyyād vaṃśayorupasthityā arthadvayameva vācyam /
GK16visah_cu:8650: "iti atra hi rājamaṇḍalasya grāsakarūpasambandhitayā rāhuvādhāt bāhau
GK16visah_cu:8652: ata eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtāpi sadvaṃśamuktāmaṇirityatra rājño muktāmaṇyāropaṇasya satkule bādhāt satkule saha veṇuropaṇaṃ tatkāraṇamityuktam /
GK16visah_cu:8653: ato dīpayan rodasīrandhramityādikaṃ paramparitarūpakodāharaṇameva, na vācyasiddhyaṅgodāharaṇam
GK16visah_cu:8655: na hi dīpayan ityādau āhave jagaduddaṇḍetyādau ca ekasya vācyasiddhyaṅgatvamanyasya paramparitarūpakatvamityatravinigamakaṃ nāsti /
GK16visah_cu:8656: vācyasiddhyaṅgodāharaṇaṃ tu-- "gacchāmyacyuta ! darśanena bhavataḥ kiṃ tṛptirutpadyate kintvevaṃ vijanasthagrerhatajanaḥ sambhāvayatyanyathā /
GK16visah_cu:8660: pūrvārddhāmantraṇetyādivākyārthasya apratītikāle asiddhestad-vyaṅgyārthasya he acyuta ! madvidhanāyikādarśanenāpi dhairyyacyutarahita ityevaṃvidhāyāḥ bhaṅgyāḥ pratītyaiva siddhayati na ca nṛpamaṇḍale candramaṇḍalāropaṇamapi vyaṅgyaṃ sadevālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8663: prathamaṃ nṛpamaṇḍale rāhoranvayāsambhāvena rājamaṇḍalapadādekadaiva nṛpacandramaṇaaḍalayoḥ upasthityā drayorapi vācyatvācca /
GK16visah_cu:8664: nanu tatkatham--- bhramimaratimalasahṛdayatāṃ praṇayaṃ mūrcchāṃ tamaḥ śarīrasādam /
GK16visah_cu:8665: maraṇaṃ ca jaladadabhujagajaṃ prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām /
GK16visah_cu:8666: "ityatra viśeṣajale rūpetaṃ halāhalaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ bhujagarupaṇasiddhikṛdityuktyā halāhalasya vyaṅgyatvamuktvā kāvyaprakāśakṛtā vācyasiddhyaṅgodāharaṇatvena taduktamiti cenna /
GK16visah_cu:8667: tatra uddīpakatayā prākaraṇikamanekārthasya viṣaśabdasyārtho jalam ityato 'prākaraṇikaṃ halāhalaṃ vyaṅgyamityuktam /
GK16visah_cu:8668: na ca dīpayannityatrāpi prākaraṇikatvena vaṃśapadārthakulavācyaṃ veṇustu aprākaraṇiko vyaṅgya eveti vācyam /
GK16visah_cu:8669: davānalarūpaṇasyāpi tātparyyaviṣayatvena tasya kule bādhena tadupapādanatayā veṇorapi prākaraṇikatvāt
GK16visah_cu:8672: bhramimaratimityādau tu jalade bhujagarūpaṇaṃ śyāmatvenāpakāritvena ca jale halāhalarūpaṇaṃ vināpi āpātataḥ siddhatyeveti halāhalamaprākaraṇikamityato vyaṅgyameva /
GK16visah_cu:8673: parantu praṇidhāne sati jalasya bhujagajanyatvāsambhavena bhajagarūpaṇāsiddhyā tatsiddhikāritvena paścājjale halāhalarūpaṇamiti /
GK16visah_cu:8681: kiṃ vācyārthena kiṃ vā vyaṅgyārthena vyañjito 'yaṃ ityevaṃ sandehaviṣayatvaṃ tattvam /
GK16visah_cu:8682: halastviti kumārasambhave ākālike vasante jāte sarveṣāmeva kāmodreke sati halasyāpi kiñcit tathātvavarṇanamidam /
GK16visah_cu:8686: cumbanābhilāṣastu vyaṅgyaḥ taddvayamapi śṛṅgāranubhāvastat kena raso vyañjita iti sandehāt
GK16visah_cu:8687: na ca dvābhyāmeva vyajyatāṃ, tathā ca tulyaprādhānyodāharaṇameva
GK16visah_cu:8689: dhairyyaparivṛtteḥ kiñcittvena cumbanābhilāṣo jāto na vā; iti sandehena nadīyarasavyañjakatāyā api tadadhīnasandehāt ata eva vācyārthena tadvyañjanamapi saṃdigdhameva /
GK16visah_cu:8695: atra paraśurāmo rakṣaḥkulakṣayaṃ kariṣyatīti vyaṅgyasya vācyasya ca samaṃprādhānyam /
GK16visah_cu:8698: (vi, ja) tulyaprādhānyamāha---brāhmaṇeti---digvijaye paraśurāmaṃ jigīṣuṃ rāvaṇaṃ prati tadamātyasya tattrāsakavākyamidam /
GK16visah_cu:8699: bhavatāmeva bhūtaye na tu svārtha bravīmītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8710: paryyāptātvādaprastutapraśaṃsāvat parasparānapekṣayā camatkārāspadatvāt dvayorapi samaṃ prādhānyam
GK16visah_cu:8714: atrāllāvadīnākhye nṛpatau dānasāmādimantareṇa nānyaḥ praśamopāya iti vyaṅgyaṃ vyutpannānāmapi jhaṭityasphuṭam /
GK16visah_cu:8718: jhaṭityasphuṭamiti tat praśamopāyo nāstyeva iti hi vyaṅgyamāpātataḥ pratibhāti /
GK16visah_cu:8734: ahaṃ vratavatīti dharmopadeśinaḥ asya upabhogo mama vratabhaṅgāya no bhaviṣyatītyato 'haṃ vratavatyeva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8735: svairaṃ svacchandam ataḥ param uktena kiṃ prayojanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8743: prajjvālitasya rajanīṃ madanānalasya dhūmaṃ dadhat prakaṭalāñchanakaitavena" /
GK16visah_cu:8744: atra cumbīti pade vadanasaṃsargarūpasāyarthasyāsambhavāt saṃsargamātraṃ lakṣyaṃta tadatiśayaścābhidheyavat sphuṭaṃ pratīyate /
GK16visah_cu:8748: atra dattasaṃketaḥ jaścillatāgṛhaṃ praviṣṭa iti vyaṅgyāt "sīdantyaṅgani"
GK16visah_cu:8757: vānīrakuñje kṛtasaṃketāyā gṛhakarmavyāpārāt tatra gantumaśaktāyā vadhvā aṅgāvasādavarṇanamidam
GK16visah_cu:8758: atreti--praviṣṭa ityantamātraṃ na vyaṅgyaṃ vadhvāstatrāgamanasyāpi tadīyapakṣikolāhalaśravaṇādhīnāṅgāvasādena vyaṅgyatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:8760: camatkāra iti vadhvā vipralambhavyañjakatvena hyatra camatkāraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8761: sa cātroddīpakaśakunikolāhalaśravaṇādhīnāvasādasya vipralambhaṃ vinā anyato 'sambhavāt tatpratītyavaśyambhāvena saṃketasthale vadhvā
GK16visah_cu:8763: vadhvā īdṛśakāryyatyāgenāpi tatrāgamanasambhavādṛte vācyāṅgāvasādamukhaprekṣatvena tasya nyūnacamatkāritetyarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:8769: kiñca yo dīpakatulyayogitādiṣūpamādyalaṅkāro vyaṅgyaḥ sa guṇībhūtavyaṅgya eva /
GK16visah_cu:8773: tatparatvaṃ na kāvyasya nāsau mārgo dhvanermataḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:8782: alaṅkārāntarasyāpi pratītau satyāṃ yaccālaṅkārāntaraṃ bhasata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8785: yatreti pāṭhe tu yatra kāvye bhāsate ityalaṅkāra iti kartṛpadamadhyāhāryyam /
GK16visah_cu:8787: (lo, u) idānīmanyatrāpi vyaṅgyasya guṇībhāvasthale dhvanibhramaṃ nirasyan āha---kiñceti /
GK16visah_cu:8789: kāvyasya ca tatparatvaṃ na bhāsata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8794: (vi, ḍa) anyamapi guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprakāramāha yatreti---vyaṅgyārthasya gopanakṛtacārutve hi dhvanitvaṃ tad viparyyāso vyaktīkāraṇaṃ yatra śabdāntarādinā kriyate so 'gūḍharūpaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprabheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8797: "dṛṣṭyā keśava ! goparāgahṛtayā kiṃcinna dṛṣṭaṃ mayā tenātra skhalitāsmi
GK16visah_cu:8799: ekastvaṃ viṣameṣu khinnamanasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatir- gopyevaṃ gaditaḥ saleśamavatādroṣṭhe harirvaściram" //
GK16visah_cu:8802: (vi, ḍha) dṛṣṭyeti---keśavaṃ dṛṣṭvā madanāndhatayā goṣṭe patitāyā gopyāḥ saleśaṃ saśleṣaṃ gadito hariściramavatāt /
GK16visah_cu:8803: dṛṣṭyetyādi--saśleṣoktiḥ tatra vācyārtho yathā---he keśava gavāṃ parāgeṇa rajasā hṛtayā naṣṭayā dṛṣṭyā mayā kiñcit na dṛṣṭam /
GK16visah_cu:8806: he nātha ! patitāṃ māṃ kiṃ nālambase /
GK16visah_cu:8807: kathamālambiṣye ityatrāha---ekastvamiti---viṣameṣūñcanīceṣu vartmasu khinnamanasāṃ patnena klāntahṛdayānāṃ sarvābalānāṃ sakalabalarahitānāṃ
GK16visah_cu:8810: rāgeṇa tvayyanurāgeṇa hṛtayā dṛṣṭyā mayā kiñcinnijatiroṣādikaṃ na dṛṣṭam /
GK16visah_cu:8812: he nātha ! patitāṃ patibhāvaṃ bharttṛtvaṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase
GK16visah_cu:8814: yato viṣameṣuṇā pañceṣuṇā khinnamanasāṃ sarvāsām abalānāṃ tvameko gatiriti /
GK16visah_cu:8816: (lo, ū) dṛṣṭyeti---gavāṃ parāgeṇa rajasā hṛtayā tiraskṛtayā /
GK16visah_cu:8817: gāḥ indriyāṇi sambhāgadānādinā pātīti gopaḥ tasmin gope tvayi, rāgeṇa pramṇā hṛtayā vaśīkṛtayā skhalitā bhraṣṭapādā gatadhairyyā ca /
GK16visah_cu:8818: atha patitāṃ mārgapatitāṃ dhavatvaṃ ca nāvalambase na dhārayasi na parigṛhaṇāsi ca /
GK16visah_cu:8819: viṣameṣu uccanīcasthāneṣu, viṣameṣuḥ kāmaḥ tena ca khinnamanasām /
GK16visah_cu:8822: atra goparāgādiśabdānāṃ gope rāga ityādivyaṅgyārthānāṃ saleśamiti padena sphuṭatayāvabhāsaḥ
GK16visah_cu:8833: yatra vastvalaṅkārasādirūpavyaṅgyānāṃ rasābhyantare guṇībhāvastatra pradhānakṛta eva kāvyavyavahāraḥ
GK16visah_cu:8836: (vi, ta) kvacittu vyaṅgye guṇībhūte 'pi dhvanikāvyavyavahāra eva na
GK16visah_cu:8841: 'parāṅgākhyaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyaivoktatvāt iti vācyam, yatra guṇībhūtānāmalaṅkārasādīnāmaṅgijanakatvameva natvaṅgi prakarṣakatvaṃ tatraivāṅgino vyañjakaviśeṣaṇatvenāṅgina eṣa camatkāritvāt dhvanivyavahārat yathā ca calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭimityatra madhukarakāmukarūpālaṅkārasya vyaṅgyasya hatā iti vyañjakaviśeṣalabhyavyaṅgyavipralambhapratijanakatvāt nāparāṅgatvaṃ kintu vipralambhadhvanitvameva /
GK16visah_cu:8842: yathā--- "jāne kopaparāṅmukhī priyatamā svapne 'dya dṛṣṭā mayā mā māṃ saṃspṛśa pāṇineti rudatī gantuṃ pravṛttā tataḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8843: no yāvat parirabhya cāṭukaśatairāśvāsayāmi priyāṃ bhratastāvadahaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā nidrāharidrīkṛtaḥ"
GK16visah_cu:8844: ityatra vidhiṃ pratyasūyādhvanireva śaṭhapadena vyañjakaviśeṣeṇa vyaktaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8845: no yāvadāśvāsayāmi ityanena vyaṅgyasya vipralambhasya tu asūyājanakatvameva nāsūyāprakarṣakatvamityato nāparāṅgatvamityādi svayamūhyam /
GK16visah_cu:8848: pradhānena rasenaiva kāvyavyavahāro na tu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyena /
GK16visah_cu:8849: tathā ca tatrottamakāvyatvameva ityarthaḥ yathā"ayaṃ sa
GK16visah_cu:8850: rasanotkarṣo"tyādaveva hi tatra śṛṅgārasya guṇībhāve 'pi taṃ bhāgamavalambya madhyamakāvyavyavahāro 'pi na karttavyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8861: kvacittu prakāraṇagmye vastuni tātparyyasattvena aṅgībhūtarasādau tātparyyābhāve 'pi āpātataścamatkāribhistairaṅgabhūtai rasādyaireva parāṅgavyavahāra ityāha /
GK16visah_cu:8869: sandhyābhramaṃ tādṛśaraśmisañcaraṇādeva sandhyākāle iti bhrāntiṃ prāpnuvatāmunmadānāṃ madanamattānāṃ pramadājanānāmanaṅganepathyavidhiṃ kāmasambhogaveśaṃ vidhatta ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8872: ityādau rasādīnāṃ nagarīvṛttāntādivastumātreṅgatvam, tatra teṣāmatātparyaviṣayatve 'pi taireva guṇībhūtaiḥ kāvyavyavahāraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8875: (vi, dha) atra hi prakaraṇāt purāprakarṣe tātparyyasattvena anaṅganepathyavidhānavyaṅgyasya śṛṅgārasya tātparyyaviṣayatvābhāve 'pi
GK16visah_cu:8880: guṇapradhānabhāvāvabhāsastāvannānubhūyate, kālāntare tu prakaraṇādiparyālocanayā bhavannapyasau na kāvyavyavadeśaṃvyāhantumīśaḥ,
GK16visah_cu:8889: tatra āpātatastadananubhave 'pi uttarakālaṃ prakaraṇādiparyyālocanayā purīprakarṣaprādhānyāvagamo bhavannapi kāvyasya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyavyapadeśaṃ vyāhantuṃ neśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8892: tathāca apradhānenāpi śṛṅgāreṇā'svādāt na guṇībhūtavyaṅgyavyapadeśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8905: tanna, yadi hi avyaṅgyatvena vyaṅgyābhāvastadā tasya kāvyatvamapi nāstīti prāgevoktam /
GK16visah_cu:8912: saguṇāviti taiḥ kāvyalakṣaṇe kṛte vyaṅgyarasadvāreṇaiva ca saguṇatvena vyaṅgyābhāve saguṇatvābhāvāt kāvyatvaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8923: āsvādyavyaṅgyatve eva kāvayatvāṅgīkārāt idaṃ ca svakapolakalpitaṃ dūṣaṇam /
GK16visah_cu:8925: nanu āsvādye eva tāratamyānna prācīnadvayāntarbhāva ityata āha---yadi
GK16visah_cu:8928: astu tāvat kṣudratvaṃ tu kāvyatvāprayojakatvenānupādeyatvādanāsvādyatvameva ityāha---kṣudratāyāmiti---tathā ca dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyaṃ dvayameva
GK16visah_cu:8930: citrākhyaṃ padyaṃ na tu kāvyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8941: evamuktaprabandhena vyaṅgyasya pradhānaguṇabhāvābhyām ubha eva kāvye vyavasthite /
GK16visah_cu:8943: tatra kāvyavyavahārastu sādharmyād gauṇa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8948: nanu sarasatvameva kāvyasāmānyamiti nyāyasahastrairuktam; ucyate vakṣyate ca--tasya ca vyaṅgyasya
GK16visah_cu:8949: dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyau dvau bhedau, tayorapi pratyekaṃ vyaṅgyasya
GK16visah_cu:8950: vastvalaṅkārasarūpatvena traividhyamityuktaprakāreṇātmanā eva ātmano bhedaḥ prabhedaśca /
GK16visah_cu:8951: iti durupapādaḥ sāmānyalaśraṇaśca vyāpteḥ iti cet; atrocyate-yadi
GK16visah_cu:8952: vayaṃ rasavattvākhyasya kāvyasāmānyalakṣaṇasya vastvalaṅkāravyaṅgyayoḥ kāvyabhedayorabhāvaṃ brūmaḥ tadaiṣa
GK16visah_cu:8957: rasavadeva kāvyaṃ; tacca kvacit vastudhvaninā śavalaṃ
GK16visah_cu:8960: ata evāhuḥ---rasādyapekṣayā tu sarvaguṇābhāvavyabhicāra eva iti /
GK16visah_cu:8961: nanu tarhi kathaṃ niḥśeṣacyutacandanamityādau vastudhvaneḥ prādhānyaṃ, tatra hi dautyakarmajīvikāyāṃ kṛtaghnāyāṃ tvayi tasmin adhame śaṭhe ca mama nāsūyā, kintu yadevaṃvidhāyāṃ tvayi viśvasimi, tathāvidhe ca tasmin anuraktāsmi, tadevaṃvañcanāsahastrajanitaprauḍhaparitāpāyāstu mama yuktameveti vipralambhaprabhederṣyāmānavyabhicāranirvedadhvaniḥ pradhānam
GK16visah_cu:8965: nanvevamalaṃ yathākathañcit prādhānyamupakalpya vastvalaṅkārarūpayordhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyoḥ kāvyavyavahārapravarttakoktyā rasadhvanināpi sa nivarttatāmiti cet, atrāha
GK16visah_cu:8966: kāvyaprakāśakāraḥ---"samanantaroktaṃ yadyapi sa nāsti kaścidviṣaya iti /
GK16visah_cu:8967: pradhānaṃ cāpātamātreṇa āparyantaṃ pradhānena rasena eva vyapadeśaḥ"
GK16visah_cu:8973: yatra khalu samāsoktyādyalaṅkāreṣu vyaṅgyasya vaiṣadyenāpi pratītiḥ,
GK16visah_cu:8979: iti kiñca kvacit kadācit yatrālaṅkāre vyaṅgyasyāsvādaprakarṣakatvena prādhānyamapi yathāprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ---
GK16visah_cu:8980: "jaṃ vellihiṇa ma asi jaṃ cāsi paraviraṃ pilaghemaṃ /
GK16visah_cu:8981: tamaṇḍe kohali ajjaṃ valaṃ piphuli haṃsi" //
GK16visah_cu:8982: ityādāvacamatkāraiṇaḥ kuṇḍākarṣaṇārthāt prastutāt gṛhakarmaratyā yuvānaṃ prati nāyikāyā aprasaṅganiṣedhāya prastutasya bālāyā yauvanodbhedakathanasya tasya dhvanau antarbhāvo 'stu, uktarītyā tasya mahāviṣayatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:8983: evaṃ cālaṅkāreṣu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyāntarbhāve eṣa eva nyāyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8984: kiñca dīpakatulyayogitādau yeyamupapādyālaṅkāṇṇāṃ pratītirna tatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyākāvyabhedāntaḥ pāto 'nāsvādyatvāt vyaṅgyasya, siṃ tvavarjanīyasannidhitvamātreṇāvasthiteḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8985: ata eva kavipratibhāsaṃrambhagocaratvaṃ teṣu nāstīti vācyam /
GK16visah_cu:8986: vānīrakuñje ityādau vyaṅgyasya nānāsvādyatvam, kintu vācyāpekṣayā āsvādapakarṣa iti teṣu ucito guṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyakāvyavyavahāraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:8996: pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ atha keyamabhinavā vyañjanā nāma vṛttirityucyate---
GK16visah_cu:8999: (vi, ka) vyaṅgyabhedāt kāvyabhedasya uktatvād vyaṅgyasya ca vyañjanāvṛttigamyatvād vyañjanāṃ pṛcchati---atha keyamiti /
GK16visah_cu:9003: (lo, a) idānīṃ samanantaroktakāvyabhedadvayasya vyañjanāvyāpārasiddhyadhīnatvena tatra vipratipattiṃ nirācikīrṣuḥ prathamaṃ paricchedamārabhamāṇaḥ
GK16visah_cu:9027: yatra ca svaśabdenābhidhānaṃ tatra pratyuta doṣa eveti vakṣyāmaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9030: abhihitānvayavādibhiraṅgīkṛtā tātparyākhyā vṛttirapi saṃsargamātre parikṣīṇā na vyaṅghyabodhinī
GK16visah_cu:9034: nanu rasādirabhidhayaiva bodhyatām ityata āhana ca saṃketita iti /
GK16visah_cu:9035: nanu vibhāvādibhireva rasādibhāvādiḥ saṃketita eva ityatrāhana hīti /
GK16visah_cu:9036: tadaikyarūpyaṃ tatsvarūpatā, vibhāvādirhi nāyakādiḥ, rasaśca tadvyakteratyādiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9040: nanu rasādirnābhidhayā bodhyatām, naiyāyikasvīkṛtayā tātparyākhyayā vṛttyā bodhyatāmityata āha---abhihitānvayeti /
GK16visah_cu:9043: rasādirapi kathaṃ na saṃketita ityāśaṅkyāha---na ceti /
GK16visah_cu:9046: yadi rasādeḥ saṃketitatvamucyate tat kiṃ vibhāvādivācakena śabdena ?
GK16visah_cu:9047: kiṃ svaśabdenā vā ? nādyaḥ, tasya vibhāvādibhirvyañjanīyatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:9048: svaśabdābhidhāne ca na tasya pratītiḥ kintu doṣa eva /
GK16visah_cu:9049: svaśabdo hi rasaśabdaḥ, śṛṅgārādiśabdo vā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9050: "śṛṅgāraḥ sakhi ! mūrtimāniva madhau mugdho hariḥ kīḍatī"tyādau ca vibhāvādisāmagrayādeva tadvyañjakatvam na tu śṛṅgārādiśabdasya /
GK16visah_cu:9057: vyaṅgyabodhikā, yathā dhanurdharamuktena iṣuṇā pratisaṃhitamekaṃ lakṣyaṃ dīrgheṇa vegarūpavyāpāreṇa bhittvā apratisaṃhitaṃ lakṣyāntaramapi dīrgatarībhūtena tenaiva vegarūpavyāpāreṇa bhidyata iti yat keṣāñcimatam,
GK16visah_cu:9058: yacca tātparyavṛttireva vyaṅgyabodhikā iti dhvanikasya matam, dūṣayituṃ
GK16visah_cu:9060: so 'yamityabhidhaiva vyaṅgyabodhiketi yat kaiściduktaṃ tatra so 'yamityabhidhānarūpeṣorvyāpāra ivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9063: ayamarthaḥ--yathā khalu dhanuṣmatā mukto bāṇa ekenaiva vegarūpavyāpāreṇa śatroḥ kavacādikamanekaṃ bhinatti, tathaika eva śabdasya
GK16visah_cu:9073: vyañjanāyāstātparyātatiriktatvād asau naṃ dhvanirna vyañjanā, kintu tātparyamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9079: na tulayā dhṛtam; kvacinnirūddhaprasarīkṛtya vākyārthabodhanamātre vyavasthāpitam /
GK16visah_cu:9081: tayorupari "śabdabuddhikarmaṇāṃ viramya vyāpārābhāvaḥ" iti vādibhireva pātanīyo daṇḍaḥ
GK16visah_cu:9087: bodhanānupapattiḥ, kramaśo bodhe ca tatsattve viramya vyāpārabhāva
GK16visah_cu:9089: idaṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ na ruciram; vyañjanāvādināpi kramaśo bodhāṅgīkāreṇa
GK16visah_cu:9091: tātparyasattve vṛttibheda eva viramya vyāpāraḥ svīkriyate, na tu ekayā vṛttyā iti cenna
GK16visah_cu:9094: tasmāt kramaśo bodhena tātparyagrāhakābhāva eva tayorupari doṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9095: na ca phalameva tadgrāhakamiti vācyam; phalasya tātparyottarabhāvitvāt /
GK16visah_cu:9096: kramaśo vyañjanayā bodhane tu vaktṛboddhavāyadivaiśiṣṭyameva tātparyagrāhakam /
GK16visah_cu:9097: na caivaṃ tadgrāhitaṃ tadevaṃ tātparyaṃ dhvanikamate vṛttirastu, na vyañjaneti vācyam "ityatrātātparyaviṣayasya vyaṅgyaśṛṅgārasya aparāṅgam,
GK16visah_cu:9098: yathā vā "surabhimāṃsaṃ bhuṅkṣva "iti sugandhimāṃsatātparyake vākye dhenumāṃsavyañjanā
GK16visah_cu:9105: evaṃ ca kimiti lakṣaṇāpuyapāsyā ? dīrghadīrghatarābhidhāvyāpāreṇāpi tadarthabodhasiddheḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9110: (lo, ṛ) evaṃ ca yadi śabdaśruteranantaraṃ yāvānartho 'vagamyate
GK16visah_cu:9111: tāvati śabdasyābhidhā eva vāyapāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9115: kimiti ca "brāhmaṇa ! putraste jātaḥ, kanyā te garbhiṇī" ityādāvapi harṣaśokādīnāmapi na vācyatvam
GK16visah_cu:9118: (vi, ja) nanu na aṅgīkāryaiva lakṣaṇā ityata āha---kimiti ceti /
GK16visah_cu:9119: kanyeti---atra kanyā adattā; tasyā eva garbhe pituḥ śokāt /
GK16visah_cu:9120: atra hi sambodhyavrāhmaṇasannihitāparajanasya tādṛśaśabdaśravaṇānantaraṃ vrāhmaṇasya harṣaśokāvagamāt tacchabdīyadīrghatarābhidhayaiva tadvodhasambhavena tayorvācyatāpattirityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9123: ayamarthaḥ--harṣādayo hi na kenāpi vācyatvenābhyupagamyante, yato 'mī
GK16visah_cu:9129: tataśca kāvyaśabdānāṃ niratiśayasukhāsvādavyatirekeṇa pratipādyapratipādakayoḥ pravṛttyaupayikaprayojanānupalabdherniratiśayamukhāsvāda eva kāryatvenāvadhāryate /
GK16visah_cu:9130: "yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ" iti nyāyāt" iti /
GK16visah_cu:9133: (vi, jha) yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ "iti jaiminivākyameva vyaṅgyabodhane tātparyākhyavṛttau pramāṇamiti mataṃ dūṣayitumutthāpayati---yatpunariti /
GK16visah_cu:9138: tathā ca sukhāsvādakāraṇatā kāvyavākyasya vyaṅgyabodhadvāreṇaiva etadvākyasya vyaṅgyatātparyakatvāt
GK16visah_cu:9141: kāvyaprakāśe tu asya vākyasya bhinna evārthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9142: tathā hi--"yatparo yatsādhyatātparyakaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdasya
GK16visah_cu:9143: prāmāṇyaniyāmakor'thaḥ na tu siddhaṃśe tasya śabdasya prāmāṇyam"iti /
GK16visah_cu:9145: na tu siddhagavāṃśaḥ; yathā vā, "dadhnā juhoti"ityatra dadhnaḥ karaṇatvaṃ pādhyāṃśastu tathā; na tu vākyāntarataḥ siddhahomāṃśa iti /
GK16visah_cu:9147: (lo, ḷ) samprati gurumataikadeśīyasya, "yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:9154: pratipādyo yaṃ prati vākyaṃ śrāvyate; pratipādakastasya śrāvayitā /
GK16visah_cu:9156: tasmānniratiśayasukhāsvādarūpo rasādirūpor'thaḥ śabdasya tātparyaviṣayo jātaḥ kiṃ vṛttyantarakalpanayeti
GK16visah_cu:9157: yatpase yaduddeśyaprayuktaḥ; sa śabdārthaḥ śabdenāvaśyaṃ boddhavyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9159: tatra praṣṭavyam-kimidaṃ tatparatvaṃ nāma, tadarthatvaṃ vā, tātparyavṛttyā tadvodhakatvaṃ vā ? ādye na vivādaḥ, vyaṅgyatve 'pi tadarthatānapāyāt /
GK16visah_cu:9166: sa śabdārtha ityasya vākyasya tatparatvamarthaḥ tadeva tatparatvaṃ
GK16visah_cu:9171: tadanyā vā iti tātparyākhyā vṛttiḥ saṃsargaṃ bodhayitvā vyaṅgyārthamapi bodhayatīti dhvanikena yaduktaṃ tacca prāgeva dūṣitam /
GK16visah_cu:9180: nanvastu yugapadeva tātparyaśaktyā vibhāvādisaṃsargasya rasādeśca prakāśanam-iti cet ? na, tayorhetuphalabhāvāṅgīkārāt /
GK16visah_cu:9186: (vi, ṭa) nanu atiriktapadārtharūpā turīyā vūttirdhvanikena nocyate,
GK16visah_cu:9192: rasaniṣpattirityatra rasasya jñānaniṣpattireva niṣpattiḥ svaprakāśasya svajñānābhinnatvāt
GK16visah_cu:9201: anayaiva diśā pratīyamānayorvastvalaṅkārayorapi,"yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ"itinyāyāśrayeṇa vyañjanāṅgīkāro 'nupapanna eva /
GK16visah_cu:9202: kiñca, "yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ"iti nyāyamaṅgīkurvatāṃ vyañjanānaṅgīkāre vānīrakuñja ityādau guṇībhūtaḥ pratīyamānor'thaḥ
GK16visah_cu:9203: prathamamavataran śabdasya tatparatvābhāvāt kasya vyāpārasya viṣayatāmavalambatām ? nanu tarhi bhaṭṭanayavat, "pīno devadatto divā na
GK16visah_cu:9205: '; ityādau, "rātrau bhuṅkte'; ityādivadatrāpi vyaṅgyārthapratītau vākyaśeṣaṃ kalpatāmiti cenna /
GK16visah_cu:9208: "gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ" ityādau taṭādyarthamātrabodhaviratāyā lakṣaṇāyāśca kutaḥ śītatvapāvanatvādivyaṅgyabodhakatā
GK16visah_cu:9212: (vi, ṭha) nanu lakṣaṇāmūlavyañjanā nādriyatām, ekayaiva lakṣaṇayā lakṣayavyaṅgyārthadvayaṃ bodhyatāmityata āha---gaṅgāyāmiti /
GK16visah_cu:9224: (vi, ḍa) nanu abhidhā lakṣaṇā ca dīrghatarībhūtaiva vyaṅgyārthaṃ
GK16visah_cu:9226: vyaṅgyabodhana iva svīkārya ityato vaidharmyādeva vācyavyaṅgyabodhakavyāpārayorbhedaṃ sādhayati
GK16visah_cu:9228: kāryam, pratītiḥ, kālaḥ, āśrayaḥ, viṣayaścetyādīnāṃ ca bhedādityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9230: bhinno 'bhidheyato vyaṅgya iti---yadyapi abhidhāvyañjanayoreva bhedaḥ pradarśanīyaḥ, tathāpi tadbhedapradarśanenaiva tadvodhakasyāpi bhedaḥ pradarśita ityāśayena itthamuktam /
GK16visah_cu:9240: vācyārthasya vaiyākaraṇairvedyatayā, vyaṅgyārthasya ca sahṛdayairityevaṃ yathāsaṃkhyamanvayaḥ
GK16visah_cu:9241: vaiyākaraṇa hi padasya padavācyārthasya jñānamātre nipuṇāḥ, na tu vyaṅgyārthajñāne /
GK16visah_cu:9243: "bhama dhammia--" (242 pṛ.) ityādau kvacidvācye vidhirūpe niṣadharūpatayā,
GK16visah_cu:9244: kvacit "niḥ śeṣacyutacandanam-" (62 pṛ.) ityādau niṣedharūpe vidhirūpatayā
GK16visah_cu:9253: vidhirūpe vācye jñāte sati niṣedhirūpatayā vyaṅgyo jñāyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9259: "gato 'stakarkaḥ" ityādau ca vācyor'tha eka eva pratīyate /
GK16visah_cu:9266: vācyārthaḥ śabdoccāraṇamātreṇa vedyaḥ, eṣa tu tathāvidhapratibhānairmalyādineti nimittabhedaḥ
GK16visah_cu:9285: "kassa va ṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇapiāeṃ savvaṇaṃ aharaṃ /
GK16visah_cu:9291: (vi, da) viṣayabhedaṃ darśayati---"kassa vā ṇa hoi'; iti /
GK16visah_cu:9292: kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam ?
GK16visah_cu:9295: upanāyakadaṣṭādharāṃ patnīṃ tarjayantaṃ prati nāyikāsakhyāḥ pratāraṇoktiriyam /
GK16visah_cu:9296: he vāritavāme ! vārite sabhramarapadmāghrāṇe vāme pratikūle ityāpātataḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9301: nāyikayā hi pratīyate iyaṃ pratārayatītyevaṃ vyaṅgyārthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9304: (lo, i) kassa vā ṇeti---vāritādarthād vāme pratikūlakāriṇi /
GK16visah_cu:9305: tatra vācyaṃ sakhīviṣayam, "bhramareṇa daṣṭadhareyaṃ, na punaḥ parakāmukena'; iti vyaṅgyaṃ tu kāntaviṣayam /
GK16visah_cu:9307: kvacidapi nīlapītādau narapuṅgavādau bhedo na syādityāśayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9310: śabdaikasamadhigamyatvābhāvād, iti cedatra kecidāhuḥ-yathā śabdabodhitasya kvacid vācyasyārthasya satyāsatyatvajijñāsāyāṃ satyatvamanumānaviṣaya iti
GK16visah_cu:9312: vyaṅgyastu eva eva śabdapramāṇena prakaraṇādibodhya iti dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭānti kayorvaiṣamyam /
GK16visah_cu:9314: yathā prakaraṇāderviṣṇvādyanekābhidheyasyāpi haryādyabhidheyāvacchedakatvaṃ tathānekavyañjakasyāpi śabdasya ekavyaṅgye prakaraṇadisāhāyyasyeti kartavyatārūpatayā śabdasyāṅgatvaṃ svāṅgasya cāvyavadhāyakatvaṃ nyāyasiddhameviti na śabdapramāṇavyākopaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9315: iha ca yadyapi vākyārthasya pratītyanantaraṃ tasya satyāsatyatvajijñāsāyāṃ satyatvaṃ pramāṇāntareṇānumānenaiva
GK16visah_cu:9316: tathāpi satyāsatyatvajijñāsātaḥ pūrvamupapannāyā vākyārthapramāyā apramābhāvāt śabdaikasamadhigamyatvācca na śabdaprāmāṇyavyākopaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9317: na hi cakṣurādinā pratītau satyāsatyatvapratyakṣaprāmāṇyaṃ vyākupyeta
GK16visah_cu:9322: na khalu etāvataiva vyaṅgyānāmabhidhālakṣaṇābodhyatvaṃ nāsti, api tu itaradhāpītyarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:9329: (vi, dha) rasādibodhikā na lakṣaṇā nāpi abhidhā sambhavatītyāha--prāgasattvāditi /
GK16visah_cu:9330: tatkāvyasthaśabdajanyo yo rasastasya śabdabodhānantarameva janyamānatvāt tatprāk tasyāsattvāt tatra tatkāvyasthaśabdasya śakterlakṣaṇāyā vā grahītumaśaktatvādityarthaḥ; prāgupasthite vastunyeva tayorgrahaṇasambhavāt /
GK16visah_cu:9331: nanu kāvyāt prathamamanubhūyamāno yo rasastanniṣṭhasāmānyadharmarūpayā sāmānyalakṣaṇayā upasthite bhāvinyapi rase śaktigraho 'stviti cenna /
GK16visah_cu:9332: śaktyā lakṣaṇayā vā prāthamikarasabodhasyaiva tatsambhavāt prāk tasyānupasthitatvāt vibhāvādivācakaśabdānāṃtatra śaktigrahakatvābhāvāccetyapi bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:9336: ataḥ śṛṅgārādiśabdābodhyatve rasatvānāpteḥ; kintu vibhāvādyabhidhānadvāraiva tatpratīterānubhāvikatvāt nanu iha kāvyasthāt
GK16visah_cu:9337: śṛṅgārādiśabdājjñātasya rasasya prāgupasthitatvena vibhāvādivācakaśabdairlaṇayā rasāderbodho 'stu ityata āha---kiñca
GK16visah_cu:9343: trayāṇāmapi vyaṅgyānāṃ mukhyārthabādhavirahādapi na lakṣaṇā bodhiketi
GK16visah_cu:9348: kiṃñca, yatra"gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ" ityādāvupāttaśabdārthānāṃ bubhūṣannevānvayo 'nupapattyā bādhyate tatraiva hi lakṣaṇāyāḥ praveśaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9351: (vi, na) nanu rase 'pi tātparyasattvāllakṣaṇāṃ vinā tadanirvāha eva mukhyārthabādha ucyata ityata āha--na hīti /
GK16visah_cu:9352: yadi rasādiśabdāttasya prāgupasthitistadaiva tasya lakṣaṇayā bodhārthamuktarūpamukhyārthabādhanirvacanaṃ saiva tu netyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9353: rasanātmako vyañjanātmako vyāpāro yasya, etādṛśarasād bhinna eva
GK16visah_cu:9375: yadi tu "gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ'; ityādau padārthānāmanvayakāla eva
GK16visah_cu:9376: bādhapratibhāsādyanvayasya vidhurībhāvastadā tena padārthena jalamayādinā ākṣipto yastaṭādistena saṅgatiranvaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9378: na punaḥ "śūnyaṃ vāsagṛham--" ityādau (22 pṛ.) mukhāyāthabādhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9388: yadi ca "gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ" ityādau prayojanaṃ lakṣyaṃ syāt, tīrasya mukhyārthatvaṃ bādhitatvaṃ ca syāt /
GK16visah_cu:9389: tasyāpi ca lakṣyatayā prayojanāntaraṃ tasyāpi prayojanāntaramityanavasthāpātaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9393: ghoṣaḥ'; ityādau yat śaityapāvanatvaṃ ca vyaṅgyamuktaṃ tīralakṣaṇānantaraṃ
GK16visah_cu:9394: tatrāpi lakṣaṇaivāstu; kiṃ vyañjanayā ? ityāha---yadi ceti /
GK16visah_cu:9396: mukhyārthatvaṃ bādhitatvaṃ ca syāditi---ubhayameva tu nāstīti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9400: (lo, ḷ) nanvevaṃ vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau māstu lakṣaṇā;
GK16visah_cu:9403: śabdo hi prathamaṃ mukhyamarthaṃ pratipādya tasya vākyārthānvayānupapattau tatsambandhinamarthaṃ lakṣayati /
GK16visah_cu:9404: iha yadi tīrapratyayānantaraṃ bodhyaṃ prayojanaṃ lakṣayati tadā gaṅgāśabdasya tīraṃ mukhyor'thaḥ syāt /
GK16visah_cu:9414: na cāpi prayojanaviśiṣṭa eva tīre lakṣaṇā /
GK16visah_cu:9416: nīlādisaṃvedanānantarameva hi jñātatāyā anuvyavasāyasya vā saṃbhavaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9419: (vi, bha) nanu lakṣyārthabodhānantaraṃ yadi prayojane lakṣaṇā tadaivānavasthā; śītapāvane tīre ghoṣa ityevaṃ prayojanaviśiṣṭa eva
GK16visah_cu:9421: tatra gaṅgātīre ghoṣa ityato 'dhikārthasya pratītiḥ prayojanamiti kāvyaprakāśakṛduktaṃ prayojanamanusandheyam /
GK16visah_cu:9426: nanu tadanabhyupagame kiṃ bījam ? iti cet--lakṣaṇayā
GK16visah_cu:9427: yatpāvanatvaviśiṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ janayitavyaṃ tatprayojanībhūtaṃ jñānaṃ ca tadeva paryavasitamityataḥ kāryakāraṇayorabhedāpattireva bījamiti sarvatra tu tayorbheda eva dṛśyate ityāha--nīlādīti nīlādijñānaṃ vyavasāyarūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ, tatkāryaṃ tu jñātatā /
GK16visah_cu:9428: naiyāyikānāṃ murāreśca mate 'nuvyavasāyaḥ tādṛśakāryakāraṇayośca kramotpattireva ityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:9431: (lo, e) nanu yadi taṭādyarthabodhanāya lakṣaṇāvṛttirāśrayaṇīyā, iha caitadviśiṣṭameva taṭaṃ lakṣaṇā bodhayatu kiṃ vṛttyantareṇa ? tathā hi gaṅgātādātmyena taṭapratyayastāvallakṣyaḥ, gaṅgātādātmyapratītyā ca taṭasya daivasiddhameva śaityādiviśiṣṭatvamityāśaṅkyāha--na
GK16visah_cu:9436: ābhāsatvena hetūnāṃ smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ // VisSd_5.4 //
GK16visah_cu:9441: rasādīnāṃ ratyādīnāṃ vyaṅgyānāṃ bodhanakṣamaṃ bodhakāraṇaṃ nānumānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9445: tasyānandasvarūpatvābhāvena anāsvādyatvāt; kintu śabdānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyatvena vyañjanayā śābdabodhaviṣayo ratyādirbhāvukairbhāvyamānaḥ svaprakāśānandamayatvena pariṇata āsvādyamāno rasaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9448: tathā ca tādṛśarasasya hetūnāṃ ratyādikāryakāraṇasahakārirūpāṇāṃ vibhāvādānāmābhāsatvena nānumānaṃ nānumitirityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9449: tathā hi vibhāvādayaḥ sītādayo hetavo mutubarthadidṛkṣādisambandhena rāmādivṛttayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9450: sādhyastūktarūpo rasaḥ kāvyaboddhaniṣṭha ityato hetūnāṃ viruddhatvamasiddhiśceti hetvābhāsatā
GK16visah_cu:9452: rasādibuddhiḥ smṛtirūpāpi netyāha--smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ iti /
GK16visah_cu:9455: vastutastu svaprakāśānandarūpatvenaiva na smṛtiḥ; tasyā evaṃbhāvābhāvāt /
GK16visah_cu:9457: (lo, ai) evaṃ vyaṅgyasyāsya prācīnavedyatvaṃ nirasya mahimabhaṭṭena khalu rasavastvalaṅkāravyañjakānāṃ vākyānāmantarbhāvārthaṃ yadanumānaṃ darśitaṃ tattaddhetvābhāsadoṣeṇa vidhurīkṛtam /
GK16visah_cu:9459: vyaktivivekakāreṇa hi--"yāpi vibhāvādibhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ sānumāna evāntarbhavitumarhati
GK16visah_cu:9461: te hi ratyādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ kāraṇakāryasahakāribhūtāstānanumāpayanta eva rasādīnniṣpādayanti
GK16visah_cu:9462: ta eva pratīyamānā āsvādapadavī gatāḥ santo lasā ucyante, ityavaśyaṃbhāvī tatpratītikramaḥ kevalamāśubhāvitayāsau na lakṣyate, yato
GK16visah_cu:9471: ta eva anumīyamānā ratyādaya eva punaḥ punaranuśīlanādāsvādyapadavīṃ gatāḥ santo jñānasambandhena sāmājikaniṣṭharasatāmāpadyanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9472: tatpratītikrama iti---vibhāvādijñānam, tato ratyanumitiḥ, tataḥ punaḥ punaranuśīlanam, tata āsvāda ityevaṃ pratītikrama ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9475: kintu vibhāvādibhireva ratyādirvyajyata ityave bhramo jāyata
GK16visah_cu:9488: ādye na vivādaḥ, kintu "rāmādigataragādijñānaṃ rasasaṃjñayā nocyate 'smābhiḥ" ityeva viśeṣaḥ
GK16visah_cu:9493: ratyāderanumānaṃ vyañjanā ceti vivādo nāpātata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9494: tadaivātra vivādaḥ syād yadā rāmādigataratyādivyañjanaṃ mayā
GK16visah_cu:9496: mayocyate rāmādigataratyādervyañjanam, tataśca vyaṅgyaratyādireva sāmājikaratyādāvabhedenā'pyamāṇo rasanākhyavyāpāreṇāsvādyamāno rasa iti
GK16visah_cu:9498: sa eva dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ, tasyānumeyatvāsambhava ityāha---dvitīyastviti
GK16visah_cu:9510: "yatra yatraivaṃvidhānāṃ vibhāvānubhāvasāttvikasañcāriṇāmabhidhānamabhinayo vā tatra tatra śṛṅgārādirasāvirbhāvaḥ" iti sugrahaiva vyāptiḥ pakṣadharmatā ca /
GK16visah_cu:9513: (vi, va) vyaktivivekakāreṇa sambandhaviśeṣaṇavibhāvādīnāṃ yathoktānandarūpasavyāpyatā pakṣadharmatā ca sādhyate, dūṣayituṃ
GK16visah_cu:9517: abhidhānaṃ vācakaḥ śabdaḥ, abhidheyo nāṭyām, tadvyañjikā kriyā,
GK16visah_cu:9521: (lo, au) atra mahimabhaṭṭadarśitāṃ vyāptiṃ dūṣayitvā vyāptigrahaṇābhāvaṃ draḍhayati--yaccetyādi
GK16visah_cu:9532: arthāntarasya rasasyābhivyaktau āsvādane nibandhanakāraṇaṃ vo yuṣmākaṃ yā sāmagrīṣṭā saiva vibhāvādirūpā sāmagrī no 'smākaṃ mate gamakatvena anumāpakatvena sammateryarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9535: arthāntarābhivyaktau yā sāmagrī kāraṇam iṣṭā saivāsmākamanumitau liṅgamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9536: sāmagrībhāve 'pi hi vyaṅgyārthapratipattau yataḥ kutaścidapi yadeva tadeva pratīyate /
GK16visah_cu:9538: tasya vyāptigrahaṇaṃ vinā ābhāsataiva syāditi bhavatāmapi vyāptigrahaṇaṃ vinā vyaṅgyajñānaṃ na sambhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9550: siṣādhayiṣitatvaṃ cātra icchāviṣayatvamātram, na tu anumitsitatvam,
GK16visah_cu:9555: na, anumitsābhāvāt, na hi tasya niyamato 'numitsā bhavati, rasabodhastu niyamata eva /
GK16visah_cu:9556: tathā jñātavibhāvādirūpā sāmagrī rasāboddhurjanasyāpyastīti vyabhicāraśceti bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:9564: yacca "mama dhammia--" ityādau (242 pṛ.) pratīyamānaṃ vastu /
GK16visah_cu:9570: (vi, sa) yatra vastuno 'laṅkārasya vā vyañjanā tatra vastvalaṅkārau anumānagamyau eveti naiyāyikamataṃ dūṣayitumutthāmapayati---yacceti /
GK16visah_cu:9576: jalakelau śrīkṛṣṇena svīyakaradattajalena rādhikāmukhacandraṃ punaḥ purabhiṣicya svīyakareṇa pidhīyate ca mucyate ca /
GK16visah_cu:9578: pidhāne rātrau virahiṇastasya prātaḥ kālabhramāt saṃghaṭanam, mocane candrodayaviśiṣṭasandhyākālabhramād vighaṭanam /
GK16visah_cu:9580: pidhānamocane kṛṣṇasyaiva kareṇa natu rādhikāyācha, tatkarasya jalakelitaralatve kṛṣṇamukhasyaiva sicyamānatvasambhavena svamukhasya pidhānāyogāt /
GK16visah_cu:9581: yad vā--rādhikāreṇa pidhānamocanayorapi jalasekadvārā kṛṣṇakaraprayojyatvāttaddvārā kṛṣṭakareṇaiva pidhānamocane /
GK16visah_cu:9583: atra śloke mukhe candrarūpaṇam ādipadadvayāt ślokāntare alaṅkārāntaramityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9592: rādhikāmukhasya candratvasya vyaṅgyatvāccandradarśanādarśanābhāyāṃ hi rātrisadbhāvābhāvabuddhyā cakavākayorvighanasaṃghaṭane bhavataḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9603: pakṣe parvatādau sapakṣe mahānasādau ca vipakṣe jalahradādau vvāvṛttatvam /
GK16visah_cu:9604: liṅgād vyāpyād dhūmādeḥ liṅgini vyāpake vahnyādau /
GK16visah_cu:9611: (vi, ka) liṅgyasya trirūpatā ca sādhyavyāptisattve eva sambhavatīti /
GK16visah_cu:9617: (lo, u) atra prakṛte, "bhrama dhārmika'; ityādau bodhyār'tho vyaṅgyo bodhako vācyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9619: tataśca bodhakor'tho liṅgam, bodhyaśca liṅgī, bodhakasya cārthasya pakṣasattvaṃ nibaddhameva
GK16visah_cu:9621: tasmādatra yadvācyārthālliṅgarūpālliṅgino vyaṅgyārthasyāvagamastadanumāna eva paryavasyati" iti /
GK16visah_cu:9625: godāvarītīradeśe bhīruṇā dhārmikeṇa na bhramaṇīyam, tatra siṃhasattvādityanumānena bodhakārthaḥ siṃhasattvam /
GK16visah_cu:9630: pakṣe godāvarītīranikuñjarūpe āśraye sāmarthyādavaseya iti na khalu sapakṣasattvavipakṣavyāvṛttatvābhāvaḥ
GK16visah_cu:9633: tanna, tathā hyatra "bhama ammia-" ityādau (242 pṛdṛ) gṛhe śvanivṛttyā vihitaṃ bhramaṇaṃ godāvarītīre siṃhopalabdherabhramaṇamanumāpayati" iti yadvaktavyaṃ tatrānaikāntiko hetuḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9644: kuto na yuktamityāha--tathā hīti atra--gṛhe iti /
GK16visah_cu:9645: ayamarthaḥ--yasya khalu bhīrorgṛhe śvanivṛttyā bhramaṇaṃ vihitaṃ sa
GK16visah_cu:9649: bhīrorapi guroḥ prabhorvā nideśena priyānurāgeṇa vā gamanasya saṃbhavāt,
GK16visah_cu:9650: puścalyā vacanaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ na veti saṃdigdhāsiddheśca /
GK16visah_cu:9657: pakṣe godāvarītīre hetoḥ siṃhasattvasya sandehāt sāndigdhāsiddhirityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9662: kiñca ya khalu vīraḥ sparśādiśaṅkayā śuno bibheti sa saṃhasadbhāvasthānaṃ pratyuta mṛgayādikutūhalena gacchatīti darśanādviruddho bhramaṇarūpasādhyaviruddhasya sādhanāt /
GK16visah_cu:9664: "jalakeli-" ityatra "ya ātmadarśanādarśanābhyāṃ cakravākavighaṭasaṃghaṭanakārī sa candra eva" ityanumitireveyamiti na vācyam, uttrāsakādāvanaikāntikatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:9685: ābhāsamāna ābhāsau hetorupalabhyamāno vyabhicāraḥ kokatrāsakavṛttiḥ svadarśanādarśanarūpaḥ
GK16visah_cu:9691: (lo, e) yogakṣema itikartavyatā ābhāsasya; yathā itikartavyatā kāryaniṣpādanaṃ tathaivevaṃvidhārthatvāditihetoriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9694: tathā "dṛṣṭi he prativeśini ! kṣaṇamihāpyasmadgṛhe-" ityādau (250 pṛdṛ)
GK16visah_cu:9695: nalagranthīnāṃ tanūllikhanam, ekākitayā ca strotogamanam, tasyāḥ parakāmukopabhogasya liṅgino liṅgamityucyate; taccātraivābhihitena svakāntasnehenāpi saṃbhavatītyanaikāntiko hetuḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9703: granthakṛtastu stanāghātastrotogamanayoḥ pṛthakkathane 'pa na pṛthak hetudvayam /
GK16visah_cu:9726: tatkāle sannihatajanastu yadi na vyaṅgyaboddhā tadā tasyānumānamapi nāstītyatastatrāpi navivādaḥ
GK16visah_cu:9727: yadi tu vyaṅgyaboddhā tadā tṛtīyapakṣe evāntarbhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9731: tadviraheṇektasya candanacyavanāderupabhogavyāpyatā nāstīti tatraiva vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:9733: (lo, o) na vivāda iti---na khalu vayaṃ dūtyāstatkalasannihitānāṃ
GK16visah_cu:9735: tathāvidheti---na khalu, "niḥ śeṣacyutacandanam'; ityādipratipādikāyā abhiprāyaḥ kenacinniścitatayā viṣayīkṛtaityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9737: nanu vaktrādyavasthāsahakṛtatvena viśeṣyo heturiti na vācyam /
GK16visah_cu:9757: kiñcaivaṃvidhānāṃ kāvyānāṃ kavipratibhāmātrajanmanāṃ prāmāṇyānāvaśyakatvena saṃdigdhāsiddhatvaṃ hetoḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9770: tena ca tatkāntasyādhamatvaṃ prāmāṇikaṃ na veti kathamanumānam /
GK16visah_cu:9773: (vi, ḍa) nanu vyabhicāriṇa sandigdhena vā candanacyavanādinā kathamupabhogasya bhavanmate vyañjanāpītyata āha---vyaktivādinā ceti /
GK16visah_cu:9776: na hyanumāna iva vyañjanāyāmapi vyabhicārādikamaṅgamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9777: anumānapakṣe adhamasaninahitapreṣitatve satīti viśeṣaṇadānamapi na sambhavatītyāha---tena ceti /
GK16visah_cu:9780: adhamatvasya prāmāṇikatvepi tasya dūtīgamanecchārāditye sati tāvatāpyanumānāsambhava ityapi bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:9797: yathā "yo jīvati sa kutrāpyavatiṣṭhate, jīvati cātra goṣṭhyāmavidyamānaścaitraḥ" ityādi
GK16visah_cu:9805: (lo, ī) yadi khalu pūrvaṃ jīvataḥ kutrāpi sthānamavagacchet /
GK16visah_cu:9806: arthapattisvarūpaṃ hi--dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vā anyathā nopapadyate iti,
GK16visah_cu:9809: pratyakṣānumānopamānārthāpattyabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ pañcabhiḥ pramāṇairupalabdhaḥ śabdasya ca prādhānyakhyāpanārthaṃ bhedena nirdiśati--śruta iti /
GK16visah_cu:9810: śruta iti śabdalakṣaṇena jñātor'thor'thaviśeṣo 'nyathā nopapadyata iti /
GK16visah_cu:9811: śābdī hyākāṅkṣā śabdenaiva prapūryata iti darśanāt /
GK16visah_cu:9812: "pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte'; ityatra rātrau bhuṅkte iti vākyaśeṣaḥ kalpyate /
GK16visah_cu:9815: tato lokaprasiddhyopalabdhimātre vartate, na tu vikalpapratipādana
GK16visah_cu:9817: śabdo hi kalpyater'thapratītyai viprakṛtasādhanaṃ tadvaram arthe eva kalpyatāmiti /
GK16visah_cu:9824: pīno devadatta ityādau rātribhojane, jīvaṃścaitro 'tra goṣṭhyāṃ na vidyata ityatra kutrāpyavasthāne pūrvānubhavyāptimupajīvyaivārthāpatteḥ pravṛttiriti /
GK16visah_cu:9829: kiñci---vastravikrayādau tarjanītolanena daśasaṃkhyādivatsūcanabuddhivedyo 'pyayaṃ na bhavati, sūcanabuddherapi saṅketādilaukikapramāṇasāpekṣatvenānumānaprakāratāṅgīkārāt /
GK16visah_cu:9832: (vi, ta) sūcanā nāma kaścid vyāpāraḥ kaiściducyate tadgamya eva vyaṅgyārthaḥ iti mataṃ dūṣayitumāha---kiñceti
GK16visah_cu:9837: tathā ca yadyaṅgulitolanādau vyabhicāraśaṅkā na bhavati tatrānumānam
GK16visah_cu:9842: saṃketādilaukikapramāṇāsāpekṣatvenetyanena yatra yatrāṃ rdhvatarjanī tatra tatra daśaṃsakhyeti punargṛhītavyāptiruraskāravacanam /
GK16visah_cu:9848: (vi, tha) rasādibuddheḥ smṛtirūpatvaṃ saṃskārajanyatvenānumanyamānānāṃ mataṃ duṣayitumāha---tatrāpīti
GK16visah_cu:9849: idaṃ cāpātata eva; sarvaṃśe saṃskārajanyatvasya hetokhyabhicārāt /
GK16visah_cu:9850: kintu svaprakāśānandasvarūpasya rasasya smṛtītvāsambhava eva doṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9852: (lo, ū) smṛtirna ca rasādidhīḥ itikārikāpadārthaṃ viśadayati--yañceti
GK16visah_cu:9856: "durgālaṅghita-" ityādau (59 pṛ.) ca dvitāyārtho nāstyeva---iti yaduktaṃ mahimabhaṭaṭena tadanubhavasiddhimapalapato gajanimīlikaiva /
GK16visah_cu:9860: nāstyevetyarthaḥ apalapata ityasya, upari, iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9863: (lo, ṛ) gajanimīlikaiveti--paryālocanaṃ vināpi lokāpavādaśaṅkayā mattagajavaccakṣuṣī nimilya vacanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:9865: tadevamanubhavasiddhasya tattadrasādilakṣaṇārthasyāśakyāpalāpatayā tattacchabdādyanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitayā cānumānādipramāṇāvedyatayā cābhidhādivṛttitrayābodhyatayā ca turīyā vṛttirupāsyaiveti siddham Locanā:

GK16visah_cu:14036: tatkṣamasva vibho ! kiṃ ca sugrīvaste samarpitaḥ //

GK16visah_cu:14060: kāryasya sambandhai yat sādhuno maṅgalasya pravarttanaṃ tat ityarthaḥ /

GK16visah_cu:14068: yadi samaramapāsya nāsti mṛtyorbhayamiti yuktamito 'nyataḥ prayātum /

GK16visah_cu:14075: droṇasya maraṇena palāyamānān vīrān prati aśvatthāmna uktiriyam /
GK16visah_cu:14085: yathā tatraiva--"sahi, ṇa juttaṃ assamavāsiṇo jaṇassa akidasakkāraṃ adidhivisesaṃ ujjhia sacchandado gamaṇam" /
GK16visah_cu:14093: eṣāṃ ca lakṣaṇanāṭyālaṅkārāṇāṃ sāmānyata ekarūpatve 'pi bhedena vyapadeśo gaḍḍalikāpravāheṇa
GK16visah_cu:14101: etāni lakṣaṇāni, etā alaṅkṛtaya ityevaṃ bhedena ityarthaḥ /

GK16visah_cu:14111: keṣāñcit vakṣyamāṇopamāvyatirekālaṅkārādirūpatvena teṣu kāvyāṅgeṣu keṣāñcicca guṇabhāvatatsamvandhivyañjakatvena teṣu kāvyāṅgeṣu antarbhāvasambhave 'pi ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:14112: prayatnataḥ karttavyatvāditi---karttavyatā ca tattaprasaṅgaucityānusāreṇa yathāyogyameva na tu sarvatraiva
GK16visah_cu:14128: (vi, la) sukavinā tu etat sakalaviśiṣṭamapi naṭakaṃ karttyamiti

GK16visah_cu:14491: asatpralāpavyāhāramṛda(mārda) vāni ca tāni tu // VisSd_6.256 //

GK16visah_cu:14987: sākṣātkatudhyānaikatānā dhyānamātrāviṣṭā yoginaḥ pratimuhurupāsate tadbrahma yā mathurāpurayuvatayaḥ kautukādāliṅgantītyādi tā dhanyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:14998: he kānte ! karopānte imāṃ gaṇḍasthalīṃ kimarthaṃ karoṣi ? tataḥ praṇayapravaṇa ityādi spaṣṭam

GK16visah_cu:15000: atra prathamaślokārtho dvitīyaśloka utkikarmatvena ukta iti ekavākyatā /
GK16visah_cu:15007: sargabandho mahākāvyaṃ tatraiko nāyakaḥ suraḥ // VisSd_6.315 //
