GK16visah_cu:15040: sāṅgopāṅga iti---amī sāndhyāsūryendvādayaḥ putrajanmāntā iha kāvye yathāyogaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ sāṅgopāṅgā varṇanīyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15046: sargopādeyeti---sarge upādeyā varṇitā yā kathā tayā sarganāmetyarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:15054: (vi, ta) bahuvacanamavivakṣitamiti---avasāna ekasyāpi anyavṛttikasya dṛṣṭa tvāt /
GK16visah_cu:15069: śiṣyaṃ prati guruṇāmākhyānaśāstrakathane yāḥ saṃjñā adhyāyarūpāstādṛśasaṃjñakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15110: vṛttagandhojjitaṃ gadyaṃ muktakaṃ vṛttagandhi ca // VisSd_6.330 //
GK16visah_cu:15128: atra "kuṇḍalīkṛtakodaṇḍa'--ityanuṣṭubvṛttasya pādaḥ, "samarakaṇḍūla" iti ca prathamākṣaradvayarihitastasyaiva pādaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15136: bhujadaṇḍe kuṇḍalīkṛtakodaṇḍasya śiñjinyāḥ guṇasya ṭaṅkāreṇa ujjagaritaṃ vairinagaraṃ yena
GK16visah_cu:15142: aniśaṃ viṣamānāṃ niśitānāṃ śarāṇaṃ visareṇa--pātena vidalitāḥ parighāḥ mudrarāḥ gadāśca yatra tādṛśaṃ parabalaṃ yasmāt, he tādṛśetyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15143: guṇaratnasāgaretyādi---atra rephāntaṃ nāma dvayaṃ nāntañca sambodhanadvayamalpasamāsakam /
GK16visah_cu:15145: kathāyāṃ sarasaṃ vastu gadyaireva vinimitam // VisSd_6.332 //
GK16visah_cu:15157: asyāmanyakavīnāṃ ca vṛttaṃ padyaṃ kvacitkvacit // VisSd_6.334 //
GK16visah_cu:15169: āryeti--āryādicchandasāṃ madhye yena kenacicchandasā āśvasasya mukheādau anyāpadeśena--anyacchalena bhāvyarthasya vakṣyamāṇārthasya sūcanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15173: iti daṇḍyācāryavacanāt kecit ākhyāyikā nāyakenaiva nibaddhavyā" ityāhuḥ,
GK16visah_cu:15181: (vi, ra) "ākhyāyikā nāyakenaiva nibaddhavyā" iti yad kenaciduktaṃ tad
GK16visah_cu:15214: iti sāhityadarpaṇo dṛśyaśravyakāvyanirūpaṇo nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15215: saptamaḥ paricchedaḥ iha hi prathamataḥ kāvye doṣaguṇarītyalaṅkārāṇāmavasthitikramo daśitaḥ,
GK16visah_cu:15216: saṃprati ke ta ityapekṣāyāmuddeśakramaprāptānāṃ doṣaṇāṃ svarūpamāha---
GK16visah_cu:15219: (vi, ka) iha hi prathamataḥ prathamaparicchede doṣānāmavasthitikramo 'vasthitiprakāro darśita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15222: "utkarṣahetavaḥ proktā guṇālaṅkārarītayaḥ'; ityuktyā ca guṇādīnāmutkarṣakatvenāvasthitiprakāro darśita iti /
GK16visah_cu:15223: atra ca rītyalaṅkārāṇāmiti pāṭhastu uddeśavyutkrameṇa lekhakapramādaparamparayaiveti lakṣyate
GK16visah_cu:15226: (lo, a) kāvyasvarūpaṃ nirūpya doṣān nirūpayitukāmaḥ tatprastāvaṃ darśayati /
GK16visah_cu:15246: pade tadaṃśe vākyer'the saṃbhavanti rase 'pi yat // VisSd_7.1 //
GK16visah_cu:15248: (lo, i) te punariti--te doṣāḥ padatadaṃśādipañcake sthitā yasmāt vākyārthabhūtasyāsvādasyāpakarṣakāraṇāni tasmāt pañca prakārāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15259: aprayuktatā ityatra dvandvottarasya bhāvapratyayasya pratyekamabhisambandhāt duḥ śravatvādaya eva doṣāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15260: etadādyavimṛṣṭavidheyāśabhāvāntāḥ trayodaśa doṣāḥ padavākyayoḥ pade vākye 'pi sambhavanti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15263: nirarthakatvamasamarthatvaṃ cyutasaṃskāratā ceti doṣatrayaṃ paraṃ kevalaṃ pade natu vākye ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15266: (lo, ī) tatra ke doṣāḥ kiniṣṭā ityata āha--duḥ śraveti /
GK16visah_cu:15278: etacca vīrabībhatsaraudrān rasān vihāya iti bodhyam, teṣu tasyānuguṇatvādeva /
GK16visah_cu:15280: samagrapadavyāpakatve tu pratikūlavarṇatvadoṣa eva ityadi boddhavyam
GK16visah_cu:15298: tatra vrīḍājugupsayoḥ kārakatvaṃ maṅgalasya ca jñāpakatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:15304: (vi, cha) dṛptārīti---sādhanaṃ senā ca cārthaḥ prākaraṇikatvāt anekārthasya sādhanaśabdasya vācyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15305: puṃvyañjanarūpastvartho vyaṅgyaḥ śrotṝṇāṃ vrīḍājanakaḥ; natu vrīḍāvyañjakaḥ tadapratīteḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15311: he tanvi ! tava vināśe adarśane sati tadā mama duḥ khotpādanāya vāyuḥ
GK16visah_cu:15321: vināśaśabdaśca adarśanārthe maraṇasya ca smāraṇāt kameṇa vrīḍādivyañjakāḥ
GK16visah_cu:15330: vināśaśabdaśca adarśanārthe maraṇasya ca smāraṇāt krameṇa vrīḍādivyañjakāḥ
GK16visah_cu:15343: tena idānīntanānekakavibhiḥ prācīnaikakavinā vāsyā'dare 'pi doṣa eva /
GK16visah_cu:15344: evañca "padmān hi me prāvṛṣi khañjarīṭān "iti naiṣadhakṛtā prācīnaikakavinā ādare 'pi doṣa eva /
GK16visah_cu:15345: kāvyavyatirikte bhāṣāmātre tadādare tu adoṣa eva, ityataḥ nānuśāsanaprāmāṇyam /
GK16visah_cu:15365: yogaśastra eva na tu loke arthaśāstre vā /
GK16visah_cu:15370: te ca manasi varttamānāḥ puruṣe apadiśyante iti /
GK16visah_cu:15371: kiñcaivaṃ vaktṛboddhavyayoḥ śāstrānabhijñatvabodhādiṃ vinā doṣa iti /
GK16visah_cu:15374: "āśaīḥ paramparāṃ vandyāṃ karṇe kṛtvā kṛpāṃ kuru" /
GK16visah_cu:15375: atra vandyāmiti kiṃ bandībhūtāyāmuta vandanīyāmiti saṃdehaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15391: aśaktikṛtaṃ kaverasāmarthyamātreṇa kṛtaṃ na tu rūḍhiprayojanayoḥ anyatareṇa kṛtamityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:15400: darśitaṃ hi sthāne sthāne lakṣyārthāteśayaḥ prayojanamiti cet, na /
GK16visah_cu:15404: prakṛte nirjitatve lakṣyārthe mukhaniṣṭhaśobhājanyatvameva vivakṣito yogaścaraṇāghāte mukhyārthe cālīke tacchobhābhāvāt tajjanyatvanirjitatvaṃ na pratīyata eva /
GK16visah_cu:15405: tataśca tadapratītyā asyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ kaviprayogānarhatvajñānena aśraddheyatvāt lakṣyārthatiśayaḥ prayojanaṃ na pratīyate eva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15413: śambaraśabdo daitye prasiddhaḥ, iha tu jale nihatārthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15417: yamunāyāḥ śambaraṃ jalam ambaram ākāśaṃ vyatānīt vyāptamityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:15419: atreti---naca napuṃsakaliṅgarūpavyaktiviśeṣāt jalasyaiva upasthitiriti vācyam, tulyaprasiddhikasthale eva tasya niyantritatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:15420: atra tu prasiddhivaśāt liṅgānanusandhāne 'pi padamātreṇaiva prathamataḥ tadupasthityavalambanāt liṅgasyānvayasya ca bodhāttu paścādeva jalapratīteḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15429: atreti na ca ghadhātornānārthatvena dāne grahaṇe 'pi śaktirastyeva,
GK16visah_cu:15430: āṅupasargeṇa tu dānabodhapratibandha evetyataḥ śakyārthe kathaṃ śaktibhrama iti vācyam /
GK16visah_cu:15431: upasargasya pratibandhakatvakalpane kāraṇībhūtābhāvapratiyogitvapraveśena gauravāt, tadapekṣyā āḍupasargarahitasyaiva dāñaḥ dāne śaktirityasyaiva yuktatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:15432: ḍudāñ dāne iti sāmānyataḥ śaktidarśanāttu śaktibhramaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15433: neyārthe tu bhramabījābhāvāt na bhrama iti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15434: ato neyārthatvalakṣaṇe śaktibhramābhāve sati iti viśeṣaṇādānādasāṅkaryam /
GK16visah_cu:15435: avācake ca śaktibhramāt vivakṣitārthe tātparyasattvāt tātparyarūpāyā lakṣaṇāyā vivakṣitārthatvabodhakatvamastyeva iti /
GK16visah_cu:15438: parantu iyaṃ lakṣaṇā na neyārtho, nāpi kaviprayogārheti bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:15439: nirthakādidoṣapatrayasya tu vākyadoṣatvaṃ na sambhavatīti tadapāsyam
GK16visah_cu:15449: (vi, tha) yathā vā--"dinaṃ me tvayi saṃprāpte dhvāntacchannāpi yāminī /
GK16visah_cu:15451: dhvāntacchannāpīti apikāreṇa dhvāntacchannatvaviparītabodhanāt prakāśamayatvasyaiva tadviparītabodhāt na tu dinatvasya /
GK16visah_cu:15471: atra kṣīrodajā lakṣmīstasyā vasatiḥ padmaṃ tasya janmabhuvo jalāni /
GK16visah_cu:15482: atreti---bhavasya patnītyarthe sādhitasya bhavānīśabdasya arthena patiśabdārthasya anvayavaśāt caitrasya bhāryāyāḥ patirityatra iva upapatipratītyānindā /
GK16visah_cu:15484: (lo, au) bhavānīśabdo bhavasya patnītyarthe nadādau ānapratyayāntaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15489: atra vṛthātvaṃ vidheyam, tacca samāse guṇībhāvādanuvādyatvapratītikṛt /
GK16visah_cu:15493: sa ca samabhivyāhārapratītisākṣiko na tu gata eva /
GK16visah_cu:15494: tathā hi prāṅnirddiṣṭavidheyakaṃ bahuvrīhiṃ vinā samāsāntare vidheyasya pāte, asamāse tu uddeśyāt pūrvavidheyasya pāte tathātvam /
GK16visah_cu:15499: tasyedānīṃ vṛthātvamityataḥ ucchūnatve uddeśye vṛthātva vidheyam /
GK16visah_cu:15500: taccātra karmadhārayasamāsagatatvenāvimṛṣṭamityarthaḥ bahuvrīhisamāse prāṅnirddiṣṭaṃ vidheyaṃ tu vidheyatayaiva pratīyate /
GK16visah_cu:15502: 'dhara"ityatra rāge nirmṛṣṭatvasya citragurityatra gavicitratvasya ca vidheyasya vidheyatayaiva sārvalaukikī pratītiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15503: na tu karmadhāraye vidheyapāte tadavimarśa iti satyam /
GK16visah_cu:15507: yatra tūddeśyatāvacchedake vidheyamanveti tatra vidheyatayaiva pratīteḥ ānubhāvikatvānna doṣaḥ
GK16visah_cu:15508: yathā"eṣvayamatyanvapaṇḍita"ityatra atyantasya vidheyasya uddeśyatāvacchedake pāṇḍitye evānvayo vidheyatayaiva pratītiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15511: kaṭhinaṃ khalu te cetaḥ śirīṣasyeva bandhanam //
GK16visah_cu:15514: tathā ca prakṛte 'pi ucchūnatvena uddeśyatāvacchedakenānvitasya vṛthātvasya kathamavimṛṣṭatvam. ucchūnabhuje vṛthātvasya tu kiṃpadenaiva uktatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:15516: hyayameva me yadahayaḥ'; ityatra vākyagataṃ vidheyāvimarśamudāharati /
GK16visah_cu:15517: atra caraṇe ucchūnatvamātraṃ cānuvādyaṃ natu vṛthātvaviśeṣitam"ityuktam, tena vidheyāvimarśadoṣo vidheye darśitaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15521: tathā hi svargaviluṇṭhane ucchūnatvameva janyate natu tad vṛthātvaṃ vṛthātvaviśeṣitamucchūnatvaṃ vā /
GK16visah_cu:15524: 'nanvayādabhavanmatayogadoṣa eva darśitaḥ na cābhavanmatadoṣasya vākyamātragāmitvameva tenoktaṃ kathaṃ,"samāsaikapade tatsambhava"miti
GK16visah_cu:15531: ayamāśayaḥ-- tatpuruṣasamāse uttarapadasyaiva prādhānyāt vṛtheti pūrvapadasya vidheyasya prādhānyenānirddeśādavimṛṣṭavidheyāṃśo doṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15533: iha vakturdaśamukhasyāyamāśayaḥ--purā mama bhujānāṃ yad ucchūnatvaṃ sthitaṃ taditānīṃ vṛthābhūtamiti
GK16visah_cu:15534: evaṃ vidheyatvena vivabhitasya vṛthātvasya samāse guṇībhāvādanuvādyatvapratyayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15535: tena ca pūrvato bhujānāmucchūnatvasya vṛthātvābhāvād bhujānāmapakarṣa eva pratīyate na bhujavikṣepaṇotkarṣaḥ
GK16visah_cu:15545: atra rāmasambandhādevāyamahaṅkāra ityato rāmasambandhabodhikāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tatpuruṣe lopāt rāmasambandhasya vidheyasāvimarśaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15551: na khalu tasya kevalasya mukhyatā kintu rāmasambandhina ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15557: "yatra te patati subhru ! kaṭākṣaḥ ṣaṣṭhabāṇa iva pañcaśarasya" /
GK16visah_cu:15561: (vi, pha) yathā veti---atra samudraparyyantatvasya vidheyasya samāse
GK16visah_cu:15566: (lo, i) ṣaṣṭha iti--atra utprekṣāviṣayatvena vivakṣitasya ṣaṣṭapadasya tatpuruṣasamāse pūrvānikṣepo na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15576: tathā ca mocanābhāvasya evātra vidheyatvāt asamāsenaiva tathātvaṃ
GK16visah_cu:15578: samāse tu tadbhannatvasya eva pratītyā paryyudāsatvameva tatra tu vidheyasya pratīṣedho na pratīyate itadyatastasyāvimarśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15585: jugopātmānamatrasta ityādau iva vidheḥ prādhānya yatra nāsti /
GK16visah_cu:15586: navajaladhara ityādisamanantaroktodāharaṇavat yatra pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ kiyayā kaṇṭhoktayā adhyāhāryyayā vā astibhavatyādirūpayā paryyudāsatāpātātparyyudāsayogakṣemāpatteḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15590: uktodāharaṇo tu tatpuruṣasamāse guṇībhāve nañaḥ paryudāsatayā niṣedhasya vidheyatayānavagamaḥ
GK16visah_cu:15593: (vi, bha) asamāse eva nañarthasya vidheyatvarūpaṃ prādhānyaṃ,
GK16visah_cu:15594: pratiyoginastvaprādhānyaṃ tādṛśasthale nañaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhatvam ityatra samvādamāha---aprādhānyamiti
GK16visah_cu:15596: pratiṣedhe nañarthe 'samāsavaśāt pradhānatā, vidheyatā pratīyate iti
GK16visah_cu:15598: tathātvaṃ kīdṛśaprayogamityatrāha---kriyayeti---na pacatītyādau ākhyātakriyayā saha samāsābhāvāt ; kriyayetyanena asamāsa eva lakṣyate /
GK16visah_cu:15599: tathā ca asamāse yatra nañ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15600: ata evātra muktakriyayā nañaḥ sāhitye 'pi asamāsābhāvāt na prasajyapratiṣedhatā /
GK16visah_cu:15603: amuktetyatra tu samāsāt na tathātvamityāha---uktodāharaṇe tviti /
GK16visah_cu:15613: vidheyapratiyogibhūtābhāvasya pratiṣedhe naño 'pradhānatā samāsavaśāt apratīyamānavidheyatārūpāpradhānatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15616: pratiyogipadottarasthāne yatra naña ityarthe yatrottarapade, arthāt asamāsena paryyudāso jñeya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15617: na pacatītyatra uttaratra nañsattvāttu na paryyudāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15618: idamatrāvadheyam---pratiyogipadottaranañsattve samāsāsambhavāt yatrottaretyādinā samāsastha eva paryyudāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15619: anyathā na pacatītyatra, na dṛptaniśācara ityatra pūrvapatitasyāpi nañaḥ paryyudāsatvāt yatrottaretyādeḥ pralāpatvāpatteḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15620: yadyapyasamāsasthasyāpi ghaṭo netyatra paryyudāsatvam asamāsasthasya kriyānvayinaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhatvamiti tu niyataṃ bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:15621: samāse kṛdantakriyānvayino 'pi paryyudāsatvāt asamasteti kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ samāse paryyudāsatvameva
GK16visah_cu:15626: atrātrastatādyanūdyātmagopanādyeva vidheyamiti nañaḥ paryudāsatayā guṇībhāvo yuktaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15629: (vi, ya) ityasya udāharaṇaṃ darśayati--jugopeti--evaṃ ca nañaḥ paryyudāsatve tadarthasya samāse vidheyatvāpratīteḥ ityāha /
GK16visah_cu:15630: yukta ityatra vidhayasya nañarthasya avimarśa eveti sādhitam /
GK16visah_cu:15638: ityatrāpi prasajyapratiṣedho bhavatīti ced ? na, atrāpi yadi bhojanādirūpakriyāṃśena nañaḥ sambandhaḥ syāttadaiva tatra prasajyapratiṣedhatvaṃ vaktuṃ śakyama, na ca tathā ; viśeṣyatayā pradhānena taddhojyārthena kartraṃśenaiva nañaḥ sambandhāt /
GK16visah_cu:15643: yadi kriyāṃśe nañaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt tadaiva prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ syāt "kiyayā saha yatra naña"iti vacanāt /
GK16visah_cu:15644: iha tu śrāddhabojanaśīlādayamanya iti kartraṃśenaiva sambandhāt nañaḥ paryyudāsatvameveti
GK16visah_cu:15654: prasajyapratiṣedharūpayoḥ śrāddhabhojanābhāvasūryyadarśanābhāvayoḥ pratītidarśanāt tad dṛṣṭāntena amuktetyatrāpi mocanābhāvarūpasya pratiṣedhasya vidheyasya vidheyatvāpattimāśaṅkate---nanviti samādhatte, cenneti /
GK16visah_cu:15656: akṣoddhetyanayorapi yadi bhajanadarśanakriyayornañarthasyānvayaḥ syāt tadaiva tathātvāpādanaṃ sambhavati /
GK16visah_cu:15657: tayoranvaya eva tatra netyāha--- na ca tatheti /
GK16visah_cu:15659: karttari vihitābhyāṃ kṛtpratyayābhyāmupasthāpitena bhojirūpakartraṃśena ca sahaiva naño nañarthasya sambandhāt ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15662: kṛtpratyayena kartrupasthānāt śrāddhabhojī ityatra bhojanakarttaiva pratīyate ityatra samvādamāha--yadāhuḥ--śrāddhabhojaneti
GK16visah_cu:15663: atra kṛtpratyayādevaṃ darśanakarttāro rājadārā api pratīyante ityapi bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:15664: tathā ca tayorapi śrāddhabhojibhinnasūryyadarśakabhinnatvam ityevaṃ paryyudāsa eva pratīyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:15665: tathā ca samāsasthatannañ--dṛṣṭāntenāpyamuktā ityatra samāsasthanañaḥ paryyudāsatvameva sidhyatīti manasikṛtya amuktetyatra bhojītyataḥ kiñcinmātraṃ valakṣaṇyaṃ darśayati /

GK16visah_cu:18529: (vi, bha) itthamaṅgini virodhināṃ sākṣādavirodhaṃ darśayitvā sākṣāt paramparābhyāṃ tādṛśānāmavirodhamāha---yathā vā---kṣipta iti /

GK16visah_cu:18544: evaṃ cāviśrāntidhāmatayā karuṇasyāpyaṅgataiveti dvayorapi karuṇaśṛṅgārayorbhagavadutsāhaparipuṣṭatadviṣayaratibhāvāsvādaprakaṣrakatayā yaugapadyasambhāvādaṅgatvena na virodhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:18547: (vi, ma) kavigatā kaviniṣṭhā pradhānam, sa dahatu ityādi

GK16visah_cu:18557: tasyotsāhasya sākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatvena dahatviti nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyakavibhāvāṅgatvenāprādhānyarūpayā aparipuṣṭatayā rasapadavīmanāptatayā bhāvamātrasya sthāyibhāvasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:18565: itthaṃ bhagavadutsāhapuṣṭasya bhagavadviṣayakavibhāvasya sākṣātparamparābhyāmaṅgabhūtau karaṇaśṛṅgārau virodhisvarūpau api aviruddhau iti darśayati---evaṃ cāviśrāntīti /
GK16visah_cu:18567: bhagavadutsāhastu aṅgamapi bhāvasyāvirodhitvāt tadvirodho na darśitaḥ

GK16visah_cu:18578: tathā hi yāsāṃ tripurayuvatīnāṃ praṇayaroṣanivāraṇārthaṃ kāmī nirākṛtahastagrahaṇāni kṛtavān

GK16visah_cu:18745: he sakhi ! tava pāṇḍukṣāmavadanādikaṃ tava hṛdantaḥ kṣetriyarogam asmin kṣetre śarīre 'cikitsyaṃ rogamāvedayatītyarthaḥ /

GK16visah_cu:19113: sucaraṇaviniviṣṭairnūpurairnartakīnāṃ jhaṇiti raṇitamāsīttatra citraṃ kalaṃ ca /

GK16visah_cu:19124: tathā cātra sṛṅgāranuguṇe 'pyetādṛśaprauḍhyā vyajyamāne aujasya smadukte audāryyasyāntabhārva iti bhāvaḥ /

GK16visah_cu:19169: masṛṇena vikaṭena vā mārgeṇopakrāntasya sandarbhasya tenaiva pariniṣṭhānaṃ mārgābhedaḥ /

GK16visah_cu:19182: atra tādṛśasthale tu samatā mādhuryyaujoguṇayoranyataraguṇa ityarthaḥ

GK16visah_cu:19186: etāvatā kim ito dṛśyamānāt prodyatāṃ durddharagandhānāṃ sindhuraśatasya hastiśatasya proddāmadānārṇavānāṃ śoṣaṇāt punaḥ kalpāgniralpāyate /
GK16visah_cu:19197: oja ādi udāhāntāḥ pañcārthaguṇāḥ tadabhāvasya doṣatvādeva svīkṛtā ityarthaḥ /

GK16visah_cu:19212: taccādhikapadatvadoṣābhāvatvena uktivaicitryam anekavārapratipādanīyasyārthasya bhaṅgyantareṇa kathanam, tacca anavīkṛtvādoṣābhāvatvena /
GK16visah_cu:19232: sphūrjatphutkāraghoraḥ pratidiśamakhilān vārayanneṣa jantūn kopāviṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prativanamarūṇocchūnacakṣustarakṣuḥ
GK16visah_cu:19239: (vi, ya) vicitratāmātramiti---tathā ca vaicitryamalaṅkāra ityalaṅkārasāmānyalakṣaṇākrāntatvādalaṅkāra evaisau na guṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19246: yogaḥ sammelanaṃ sa eva rūpaṃ yasyā ghaṭanāyāstadrūpaḥ śleṣo vaicitryamātram /
GK16visah_cu:19252: kramakauṭilyetyādi bahuvrīhisamāsaṃ vivṛṇotisa eva rūpaṃ yasyā iti /
GK16visah_cu:19253: sa eva eṣāṃ yoga eva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19265: dvayaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhūrtto nāyakaḥ paścāt pṛṣṭhataḥ upetya vihitakrīḍānubandhacchalaḥ san ekasyā nayane nayanadvayaṃ pidhāya īṣadvakritakandharaḥ sapulakaḥ san ādarādaparāṃ cumbati /
GK16visah_cu:19266: aparāṃ kīdṛśī, premṇā ullasanmanasām antarhāsena lasatkapole pulako yasyāstādṛśī ca /

GK16visah_cu:19272: anena ca vācyopapattigrahaṇavyagratayā rasatvādau vyavahitaprāya ityasyāguṇatā /
GK16visah_cu:19281: vācyaṃ yaccumbanaṃ paścādgamanādinā tadupapattergrahaṇaniṣpādane dhūrttasya vyagratayā tadvodhāt boddhṝṇāṃ rasāsvādo vyavahitaprāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19304: nijanayanapratibimbe nīlotpalabhrameṇa taddharaṇe pravarttya tadaprāptyā pratāritā vāstavanīlotpale 'pi karamarpāyituṃ tadbhavati na veti vimṛśatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19316: kvacit "nidāghaśītalahimakāloṣṇsukumāraśarīrāvayavā yoṣit" iti vākyārthe vaktavye "varavaṇinī" iti padābhidhānam /
GK16visah_cu:19320: tatra ca padārthe vākyaracanā vākyārthe ca padābhidhā /
GK16visah_cu:19321: prādirvyāsasamāsau ca iti caturvidhā prauḍhiḥ parairuktā /
GK16visah_cu:19322: tasya guṇatvaṃ nocitam iti vaktuṃ tadīyaṃ padārthe vākyaracanetyādikaṃ darśayati---kvaciñcandra itīti /
GK16visah_cu:19331: (lo, ṝ) vākyārthanyāso yathā--- asau nānākāro bhavati sukhaduḥ khavyatikaraḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā prabhavati bhavatyeva bhavataḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19332: janastasmādūrddhaṃ bhavati na ca duḥkhaṃ na ca sukham /

GK16visah_cu:19348: yathā nāyaṃ paṇḍita ityekavākyena vaktavye nāyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ nāyaṃ tarkaṃ vettītyādikhaṇḍakhaṇḍavākyena samastaśāstrājñānakathanam /
GK16visah_cu:19368: (lo, a) idānīṃ rītiṃ nirūpayitukāmaḥ saṃgati karoti---athoddeśeti /

GK16visah_cu:19404: ekasamastā ekapadasamāsayuktā, svalpaprāṇākṣarā mūrddhnā mṛdvṛttetyādivat na kaṣṭoccāraṇīyavarṇā
GK16visah_cu:19416: anyāpekṣayā prāklikhitabandha āḍambaraḥ; etanmate uktavarṇānāmanuprasitatvaniyama iti

GK16visah_cu:19441: samṛddhyā sampattyā samedhitā dīptā medhā buddhiryasyāstādṛśyā /
GK16visah_cu:19447: madhurāṃ sukumārāṃ ca pāñcālīṃ kavayo viduḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:19452: sābhiprāyatvarūpeṇa ojasā aujjvalyarūpayā kāntvā ca samanvitāmityarthaḥ /

GK16visah_cu:19458: tatra mādhuryyavyañjakairityatra bahuvacanādatra madhukarāṅganayā ityatra tadvyañjakaikavarṇamātrasattvena tatprasaktyabhāvāt /
GK16visah_cu:19464: (lo, ū) antarā sthitetyanena nātyalpasamāsā na bahulasamāsā, evamanyatra /

GK16visah_cu:19501: pāñcālī miśrabhāvena lāṭī tu mṛdubhaiḥ padaiḥ" //

GK16visah_cu:19540: (lo, e) mūrddhavyādhūyamānetyādau ca na vaktraucityam, nāṭakāntaḥ pātitvācca uktaprakāreṇa prabandhaucityamapi /
GK16visah_cu:19554: ākhyāyikāyā gadyamayaprabandhatvenagadyasya ca vikaṭabandhadīrghasamāsabahulaprācuryyautityāt tatra śṛṅgāre 'pi na prāyeṇa sukumāraracanādiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19560: yaduktaṃ dhvanikṛtā---"sandānikādiṣu vikaṭabandhaucityād madhyamasamāsadīrgharamāse eva saṅghaṭane"

GK16visah_cu:19563: iti sāhityādarpaṇe rītivivecano nāma navamaḥ paricchedaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19581: tathāhi rasādyadhyavasāyapṛthakyatnanivarttyasya yamakāderekarūpānubandhanavato 'nuprasāsyāsamīkṣya viniveśitasya rūpakādeśca rasānupakāritvādalaṅkāratā /
GK16visah_cu:19589: iti rūpakādeḥ samīkṣya niveśanaṃ ca tenaivoktam---
GK16visah_cu:19596: muhuṛ kaṇṭhe laganaḥ taralayati bāṣpaḥ stanataṭaṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe ! na tu vayam" //
GK16visah_cu:19600: bāṣpaḥ aśru, kaṇṭhe lagnaḥ saktaḥ sana, stanataṭaṃ, kucaprāntaṃ, muhuḥ punaḥ punaḥ taralayati kampayati /
GK16visah_cu:19602: manyuḥ krodhaḥ, tava priyo jātaḥ ayi niranurodhe ! anaṅgīkṛtānuvarttane !
GK16visah_cu:19603: vayaṃ priyā hitāḥ na bhavāmaḥ iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19604: atra patrālīmarddanavāyāpāreṇa saubhāgyahārī manyuḥ tava priyo jāta ityanena tvadanurodhakāriṇo vayaṃ tava hitā na bhavāma ityanena ca upālambho gamyate /
GK16visah_cu:19612: jagadvijayakarmaṇi smaramahībhujaḥ kārmaṇaṃ dṛśornigaḍabandhanaṃ trijagatāṃ paraṃ bhūṣaṇam
GK16visah_cu:19615: yaduktaṃ dhvanikṛtā--- rasākṣiptatayā yasya bandhaḥ śakyakiyo bhavet /
GK16visah_cu:19617: tathālaṅkārantaraṇi nirūpyamāṇadurghaṭanānyapi rasasamāhitacetasaḥ pratibhānavataḥ kaverahaṃpūrvikayā parāpatanti /
GK16visah_cu:19624: "mitre kvāpi gate saroruhavane baddhānane tāmyati kandatsu bhramareṣu vīkṣya dayitā sannaṃ puraḥ sārasam /
GK16visah_cu:19625: cakāhvena viyoginā bisalatā nāsvāditā nojjhitā kaṇṭhe kevalamargaleva nihitā jīvasya nirgacchataḥ"
GK16visah_cu:19626: ityatra coddīpanarūpāyā bisalatāyāḥ prayatnajīvaharaṇāvasānopakārakatvāt jīvananirodhārgalarūpotprekṣāyāṃ vipralambhaśṛṅgāratadābhāsayorananuguṇatvānnālaṅkāraḥ rasasyopakārakaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19628: tadeva suṣṭhūktaṃ śabdārthaśobhātiśayadvāreṇa rasāderupakārakā alaṅkārā iti /
GK16visah_cu:19630: alaṅkārā asthirā iti naiṣāṃ guṇavadāvaśyarakī sthitiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19633: (vi, kha) naiṣāṃ guṇavaditi---mādhuryyādīnāṃ śṛṅgārādivyāpakatvāt tatra teṣāmavaśyasthiteḥ
GK16visah_cu:19638: yathā guṇā rasasya sthiradharmāstathā naite śabdārthayoḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19639: evaṃ śabdārthayoranupacaritadharmatvenāsthiratvena śabdārthaśobhādhānadvāreṇa rasopakārakatvena ca guṇavyatiriktatvamalaṅkārāṇāṃ darśitam /
GK16visah_cu:19641: śabdārthayoḥ prathamaṃ śabdasya buddhiviṣayatvācchabdālaṅkāreṣu vaktavyeṣu śabdārthālaṅkāsyāpi punaruktavadābhāsasya cirantanaiḥ śabdālaṅkāramadhye lakṣitatvātprathamaṃ tamevāha--
GK16visah_cu:19662: atra "navapalāśapalāśavanaṃ puraḥ" ityādāvapi āpātataḥ paunaruktyāvabhāsanaṃ; kintu tadekarūpaśabdagatam
GK16visah_cu:19671: kīdṛśaḥ, bhujaṅgarūpakuṇḍalavān; tathā vyaktena śaśinaḥ śubhrāṃśunā śītaḥ śītalaḥ gaurvṛṣaḥ yasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19676: paryyavasāne tu śaśinaḥ śubhrā ujjvalā yeṃ'śavaḥ tadvat śītā gāvaḥ
GK16visah_cu:19680: atra pāyāditi pādhātoḥ, avyāditi avadhātoḥ rakṣaṇārthasya liṅantatve paunaruktyāvabhāsaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19684: paryavasāne tu bhujaṅgarūpaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ vidyate yasyetyādyanyārthatvam /
GK16visah_cu:19717: tatra bhavān sadā anatyā paranatirāhityena bhātīti /
GK16visah_cu:19722: (lo, ṝ) tṛtīyādau ca dānatyāgābhyāṃ saha varttate iti
GK16visah_cu:19724: sadā sarvadā anatvā, anamanena, agaḥ parvata iti paryyavasānam /
GK16visah_cu:19736: tena "ke vāte sevayā deśe gehe ca lebhire yaśa"ityatra nānuprāsaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19746: (lo, ḷ) anuprāsa iti---svaravaiṣamye 'pi śabdasāmyamityatra śabdā vyañjanānyeva /
GK16visah_cu:19748: tenaiṣā bālāyātītyādau svaramātrasya asakṛdāvṛttāvapi vyañjanavaisādṛśye cārutvābhāvasya sahṛdayasaṃvedyatvānnālaṅkāraḥ
GK16visah_cu:19754: darduradura ityādau prathamaduraśabdadakārasya mūrdhri rephalogānna yamakam /
GK16visah_cu:19755: duradhyavasāya sāyamityādau cānusvārayogādanuprasā eva na yamakam /
GK16visah_cu:19756: "ākarṇya karṇamadhurāṇī" tyādau ca prathamakarṇaśabdasya svataḥ svarāyoge 'pi dvitīyakarṇaśabdaniṣṭhasvabhāvāt svaravaiṣamyam /
GK16visah_cu:19757: naitrānandena candreṇa māhendrī digalaṅkṛtetyādau nakārarapheyuktadakārayordūrāvasthānād anuprāsābhāvabuddhirna
GK16visah_cu:19774: rasaḥ sara ityāde kramabhedena sādṛśyaṃ nāsyālaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19781: vācyam; tatra svarasyāpi sāmyena etad bhedāt /
GK16visah_cu:19783: (lo, ai) rasa rasa ityatra rasayoḥ svarūpata eva sāmyaṃ, na tu kamataḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19793: atra gandhanandhītisaṃyuktayoḥ, kāverīvārītyasaṃyuktayoḥ, pāvanaḥ pavana iti vyañjanānāṃ bahūnāṃ sakṛdāvṛttiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19797: (vi, ḍa) varṇadvayasyāpi saṃghapadārthatvenātra vivakṣaṇattyoranekavarṇānāṃ cātra sakṛttvaṃ darśayati---atreti /
GK16visah_cu:19800: evaṃ ca vṛttyanuprāsasyāpi vidagdhaprayojyatve 'pi tatra rūḍhyabhāvāt na chekapadaprayogaḥ
GK16visah_cu:19810: anekadhāpi vāsakṛt sāmyaṃ dvitīyaḥ, asakṛdityanena chekānuprāsavyavacchedaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19811: ekasya vyañjanasya sakṛdasakṛd vā sāmyamiti dvāviti caturddhā vṛttyanuprāsaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19813: ekadhā svarūpata eva, na tu kramato 'pi /
GK16visah_cu:19822: aṃtra anekasyetyasyānvayaḥ, tathā cānekasyānekadhā sakṛttve chekaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19839: "kākalī tu kalau sūkṣme dhvanau tu madhurā sphuṭe" ityamaraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:19842: atra "rasollāsairamī" iti rasayorekadhaiva sāmyam, na tu tenaiva krameṇāpi
GK16visah_cu:19844: prathame ekasya makārasya sakṛt, dhakārasya cāsakṛt /

GK16visah_cu:20479: he hara śambho ! tvaṃ sarvasya lokasya sarvasvaṃ, tvaṃ kimabhūtaḥ ?

GK16visah_cu:20494: (vi, ta) atra āyāsi iti vinā sarvatra luptasuptiṅantatve 'pi āyāsi ityatra luptāluptadvayāntatve 'pi ca padayoraikarūpyaṃ darśayati---atra

GK16visah_cu:20504: hara bahusaraṇaṃ taṃ cittamāhemavasara ume sahasā" //
GK16visah_cu:20508: saṃskṛtapakṣe---he mahade he utsavadātri ! he ume pārvati ! āgamasya vedasya āharaṇe vaśīkaraṇe me mama taṃ prasiddhaṃ samāsaṅgam ava rakṣa /
GK16visah_cu:20510: samāsaṅgaṃ kīdṛśaṃ surasandhaṃ surāṇāṃ sandhaṃ sambandhikārakaṃ, mama suratvaprāpakamityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:20511: tathā taṃ prasiddhaṃ cittamoham avasare 'parthānmaraṇarūpe sahasā hara nāśayaḥ kīdṛśaṃ cittamohaṃ bahusaraṇaṃ nānāvidhakāryyaviṣayam /
GK16visah_cu:20513: prākṛtapakṣe--- mama dehi rasaṃ dharmeṃ tamovaśāmāśāṃ gamāgamād hara naḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20514: haravadhu śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ cittamoho 'pasaratu me sahasā //
GK16visah_cu:20516: tadarthaśca--he haravadhu ! mama dharme rasaṃ dehi /
GK16visah_cu:20522: saṃskṛtapakṣe---mahade utsavade ! ume ! pārvati ! me mama āgamāharaṇe
GK16visah_cu:20523: āgamānāmākalane taṃ samāsaṅgam āsaktim ava sthirīkurviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20525: āgamādhyāsasya svargahetutvād bahu bahulaṃ saraṇaṃ prasāro yasya evaṃbhūtaṃ cittamohaṃ manoniṣṭham ajñānam, avasare, sahasā vegena hara
GK16visah_cu:20529: "mahyaṃ dehi rasaṃ dharme tamovaśāmāśaṃ gamāgamādvara naḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20530: haravadhu ! śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ cittamoho 'pasaratu me sahasā" //

GK16visah_cu:20551: (lo, au) evaṃ varṇādigatatvenāṣṭavidhaṃ śleṣamuktvā punaḥ prakārāntareṇa trividhamāhṛ---punariti
GK16visah_cu:20569: yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchirohara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarā /
GK16visah_cu:20577: tvāṃ sarvadā sa umādhavaḥ sarvado mādhavaśca pāyāt /
GK16visah_cu:20578: tatra mādhavapakṣe, abhavena anutpattinā yena anaḥ śakaṭaṃ dhvastaṃ
GK16visah_cu:20582: ekatraiva nityaśarīre ākārabhedapradarśanamātraṃ, na tu śarīrabheda
GK16visah_cu:20584: yaśca udvṛttasya durvṛttasya bhujaṅgasya aghāsurasya hantā /
GK16visah_cu:20585: ravasya nānātmakabrahmaṇo layo līnatā yatra tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20586: agaṃ govarddhanaṃ, kūrmavarāhamūrttyā ca gāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca yo 'dhārayat
GK16visah_cu:20587: śaśimathaḥ rāhoḥ śirohara iti stutyaṃ nāma yasyāmarā āhuḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20590: umādhavapakṣe---dhvastamanobhavena dhvasto dalito manobhavo kāmo yasmāt /
GK16visah_cu:20591: yena balijito viṣṇoḥ kāyaḥ purasya tripurāsurasya nāśakāstrīkṛtaḥ,
GK16visah_cu:20593: yaścodvṛttabhujaṅgarūpo hāraḥ valayaśca kaṅkaṇaḥ yasya tādṛśaḥ,
GK16visah_cu:20596: hara iti stutyaṃ nāma cāmarā āhuḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20602: balijit viṣṇuḥ, tasya kāyaḥ purā daityārthamastrīkṛtaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20603: udvṛttā ativarttulākārā bhujaṅgā eva hārā valayāśca yasya /
GK16visah_cu:20606: andhakadaityasya kṣayo nāśaḥ, tatkaraḥ sarvadā umādhavaḥ gaurīpatiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20609: ātmana eva kāyaḥ purā pūrvam amṛtāharaṇakāle 'suramohanārthaṃ
GK16visah_cu:20611: udvṛttaḥ uddhato bhujaṅgaḥ kāliyaḥ taṃ hantīti /
GK16visah_cu:20613: agaṃ parvataṃ govarddhanākhyaṃ gāṃ pṛthvīṃ ca /
GK16visah_cu:20614: śasinaṃ mathnāti iti śaśimadrāhuḥ tasya śiroharaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20615: andhakānām andhakavaṃśīyānāṃ kṣayo nivāso dvārakāpurasambhandhī tatkaraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20624: (lo, ā) samprati sabhaṅga eva śabdaśleṣaviṣayaḥ; abhaṅgastvarthaśleṣa iti svīkurvatāṃ pakṣamanūdya dūṣayati---ihetyādi /
GK16visah_cu:20626: sabhaṅgaḥ varṇavyūheṣu bhaṅgena yutaḥ, tadbhāvātmakena bhinnapadena vā
GK16visah_cu:20634: yathā-- "sārasavattā vihatā na bakā vilasanti carati no kaṅkaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20636: iti atra hi rājapakṣe sā, iti, kam iti /
GK16visah_cu:20637: saraḥ pakṣe netītyatra tu sā nāsti /
GK16visah_cu:20639: yathā kāṣṭhayorbhinnayorapyupāyavaśena jaḍīkṛtayorekatā tathābhinnayoḥ padayoḥ śabdayorekatra varṇavyūhe sanniveśaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20647: yathā ekasminneva vṛnte phaladvayaṃ tathā ekasminneva
GK16visah_cu:20650: yo hi yadāśritaḥ sa tadalaṅkāra eva /

GK16visah_cu:20661: tāvataiva kathamarthālaṅkāratvam ityatrāha---yo hi yadāśraya iti /

GK16visah_cu:20668: loke āśrayāśrayibhāvena eva vyapadeśaḥ, yathā rājapuruṣaḥ /

GK16visah_cu:20682: (lo, u) siddhāntamāha---tad uktaprakāraṃ pūrveṣāṃ matam, anye
GK16visah_cu:20685: atra alaṅkāraprastāve yeṣāṃ dvandvārthānāṃ śabdānāṃ paryyāntareṇa pratipādane 'pi na kṣatista evārthagatāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20686: yeṣāṃna tu tathā te śabdagatā eveti niyamanāt prācīnairalaṅkārakārairiti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20688: na ca "andhakakṣaya" ityādau śabdābhedaḥ, "arthabhedena śabdabhedaḥ" iti darśanāt /

GK16visah_cu:20697: na ca tatkathaṃ nānārthakaśabdāḥ śrūyante iti
GK16visah_cu:20706: visadṛśaśabdadvayasya bandhe cevaṃvidhasya vaicitryābhāvād vaicitryasyaiva cālaṅkāratvāt /

GK16visah_cu:20716: nanu andhakādyakhaṇḍaśabdasya mukhyatve kiṃ pramāṇamityata āhavisadṛśaśabdadvayasyeti /

GK16visah_cu:20739: vidhau" ityādau śabdabhede 'pyarthālaṅkāratvaṃ tathāpi prasajyata ityubhayatrāpi śabdālaṅkāratvameva
GK16visah_cu:20752: yatra tu śabdaparivarttane 'pi na śleṣatvakhaṇḍanā, tatra--

GK16visah_cu:20765: (lo, ḷ) tat kva nu punararthaśleṣa ityāha---yatra hīti /
GK16visah_cu:20774: alaṅkārāntarasya ca śleṣāsaṅkīrṇaviṣayasattvāt sāmānyamalaṅkārāntaramapavādatvena bādhitvā śleṣa evālaṅkāraḥ alaṅkārāntaraṃ tu tat saṅkīrṇaṃ tadgrāhakameveti kecidāhuḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20776: tatpratibhotpattihetutvamiti---tatpratibhā, alaṅkārāntaraviṣayiṇī pratibhā tasyā evotpattihetutvamasya śleṣasya tadviṣayabodhakatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20781: (lo, e) eṣa ca niyamādalaṅkāraṇāṃ vicchittimādāyaiva sambhavatītyetadviṣaye vidyamānānāmalaṅkāraṇāṃ bādha iti ye manyante teṣāṃ pakṣamupanyasya dūṣayati--asya ceti /
GK16visah_cu:20784: teṣāmalaṅkāraṇāṃ bādhakatvādavakāśāntarābhāvena tahyapadeśaṃ bādhitvā mukhyatvena vyapadeṣṭuṃ yogyatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:20792: (vi, ra) tanmate 'pi sakalālaṅkārasaṃkare śleṣo na bādakaḥ, kintu katipayālaṅkārasaṃkare eveti niṣkarṣaṃ pratipādayitumāha---itthamatreti /
GK16visah_cu:20793: tatra samāsoktyaprastutapraśaṃsāsaṅkīrṇasya śleṣasya taddvayabādhakaprasaktireva nāsti ityāha---samāsektīti
GK16visah_cu:20799: aprastutakathanena prastutavyañjanaṃ cāprastutapraśaṃsā; sā ca kvacit
GK16visah_cu:20801: yathā--- "satataṃ yā madhyasthā kathayati yaṣṭiḥ pratiṣṭitāsīti /
GK16visah_cu:20811: (lo, ai) itthamiti vakṣyamāṇasya buddhisthitayāṃ idamā parāmarśaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20815: yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgād galitaṃ na lakṣitam"
GK16visah_cu:20817: "eṇālaṃ sambhrameṇa tyaja gavaya ! bhayaṃ sairibha ! svairamāssva kṣaubhaṃ mā yāstarakṣo ! vihara giridarīṃ svecchayaivācyabhalla !
GK16visah_cu:20822: anabhidheyatayā abhidhāyāḥ prakṛtabodhanena viramād asya śleṣasya /
GK16visah_cu:20824: "vidvanmānasahaṃsa--" ityādau śleṣagarbhe rūpake 'pi mānasaśabdasya cittasarorūpobhayārthatve 'pi rūpakeṇa śleṣo bādhyate /
GK16visah_cu:20825: sarorūpasyaivārthasya viśrāntidhāmatayā prādhānyāt, śleṣe hyarthadvayasyāpi samakakṣatvam
GK16visah_cu:20830: viduṣāṃ mana eva mānasaṃ sarastatra haṃseti rājñaḥ sambodhanam /
GK16visah_cu:20832: viśrāntidhāmatā paryyantikapratītiviṣayatā, haṃsāśrayatvena na tadrūpakasyaiva tathātvāt
GK16visah_cu:20834: yathā "pṛthukārttasvarapātram" ityatra sadanadvayaviśeṣaṇayoḥ śliṣṭārthayoḥ viśrāntistadāha---śleṣe hīti /
GK16visah_cu:20839: ataevātra "rājanārāyaṇaṃ lakṣmīḥ samāliṅgati nirbharam" ityatra rājño nārāyaṇatvocitalakṣmīsamāliṅganaṃ varṇyate /
GK16visah_cu:20842: samakakṣatvaṃ na khalu rūpakavad ekasya gauṇatānyasya prādhānyam /
GK16visah_cu:20859: nahī andhakārasannihitasūryyamūrttirnāyikā na vāndhakārasānnidhyaṃ sūryyabimbasya iti bādhasyāpi upasthitimātreṇa eva virodhābhāsālaṅkāratā śleṣasya tu śliṣṭārthasyānvaye satyeva alaṅkāratā virodhābhāsavat śleṣābhāsālaṅkārānabhyugamāt /
GK16visah_cu:20862: bhāsvataḥ sūryyasya, bhāsvataḥ kāntimato 'pīvā sūryyamūrttau andhakārasya sannidhānābhāvād virodhābhāsaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20868: (vi, śa) evaṃ punarurakteti---na hi bhujaṅgakuṇḍaliśabdayoḥ ekārthatvabodhaḥ paryntikaḥ; āpātamātrataḥ śleṣeṇa tathā bodhāt /
GK16visah_cu:20874: (vi, ṣa) itthamuktasthaleṣu śleṣālaṅkāraṃ bādhitvā te te alaṅkārā
GK16visah_cu:20875: evetyuktvā alaṅkārāntarasyaiva bādhakaḥ śleṣa iti tadabhipretaṃ
GK16visah_cu:20878: svecchopajātetyādau dapike sakalakalamityādau copamāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi śleṣeṇaiva vyapadeśo bhavituṃ yukta ityagre 'nvayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20879: tena yena dhvastamityādau mādhavomādhavayordvayorapi prākaraṇikayoḥ yena dhvastetyādyekadharmānvayarūpastulyayogitālaṅkāraḥ
GK16visah_cu:20884: nītānāmityādau tu aprākaraṇikayoreva vanavṛddharakamalayoḥ nītānīmityādi pūrvārddhekte karmānvayaḥ
GK16visah_cu:20890: "svecchopajātaviṣayo 'pi na yāti vaktuṃ dehīti mārgaṇaśataiśca dadāti
GK16visah_cu:20901: svecchayā sarvalokopari prāptādhikāro 'pi dehīti vacanaṃ na yāti na prāptoti /
GK16visah_cu:20903: tathāpi mārgaṇaśataiḥ asaṃkhyabāṇaiḥ duḥ khaṃ dadāti /
GK16visah_cu:20904: uktarūpaḥ prabhustu lokeṣu dehīti dadasveti vacanaṃ na yāti na prāptoti /
GK16visah_cu:20906: mārgaṇaśataiḥ paradhanānveṣaṇarūpamārgaṇaśataiḥ arthāt īdṛśapadātiśataiḥ duḥ khaṃ dadāti /
GK16visah_cu:20907: dehītyanuktvāpi padatidvārā sarvasaṃva hṛtvā duḥ khaṃ dadātītyarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:20912: atra prākaraṇi ka uktarūpaḥ prabhuraprākaraṇikaḥ prasūnaviśikhaḥ;
GK16visah_cu:20918: svecchayā upajāta āśritaḥ viṣayaḥ bhogaḥ yasya /
GK16visah_cu:20919: vaktuṃ na yātīti na tatra svārthanivedanaṃ vaktuṃ śakya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20921: iti mārgaṇaśataiḥ yācanaśataiḥ pradānābhāvāt punaḥ punaḥ kṛtaiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20926: vaktuṃ na yātīdṛśaḥ samprati me kāma iti /
GK16visah_cu:20932: ityādau copamāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi śleṣasyaitadviṣayaparihāreṇāsaṃbhavād eṣāṃ ca śaleṣaviṣayaparihāreṇāpi sthiteretadviṣaye śleṣasya prādhānyena camatkāritvapratīteśca śleṣeṇaiva vyapadeśo bhavituṃ yuktaḥ, anyathā tadvyāpadeśasya sarvathā bhāvaprasaṅgācceti /
GK16visah_cu:20938: pratikūlatāmupagate hi vidhau ityādiṣu etadviṣayaparihāreṇa śleṣasya śleṣarahitatulyayogitādīpakopamānāntu śleṣaparihāreṇa sthitirbahuṣvevodāharaṇeṣu draṣṭavyā /

GK16visah_cu:20947: (lo, i) sakalakalaṃ kolāhaladhvanisahitaṃ, sakalābhaiḥ kalābhiryuktaṃ ca /
GK16visah_cu:20948: eṣāṃ tulyayogitādīnāṃ trayāṇāmalaṅkāraṇāṃ prābalyena camatkāritvaṃ kavinā vdyarthaśabdasya vaicitryabodhopāyatvenopādānāt /
GK16visah_cu:20952: atra ca mādhavomādhavayorekasya vācyatvaniyame parasya vyaṅgyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16visah_cu:20959: śabdayostantratāṅgīkāreṇa dvayorvācaytvaniyamaḥ samanantaroktaprakāreṇa dhvanitantravādimate caikasya vācyatvamitarasya vyaṅgyatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20969: śleṣaviviktaviṣayasyāpi sattvena sāmānyatvādapavādena śleṣeṇa darśitāstulyayogitādayo 'laṅkārā bādhyanta iti keṣāñcinmate darśite,
GK16visah_cu:20971: śleṣasyālaṅkārāntaraviviktaviṣayāsattve eva tasyāpavādakatvaṃ, tadeva tu na /
GK16visah_cu:20974: atra yena dhvastamityādau iti samīcīnaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:20983: tathā ca vaktrā yadyekamevārthaṃ prakramyedaṃ padyamuktaṃ syāttadānyārthasya vyaṅgyatvena tulyayogitāyā atra prasaktyabhāvenāyameva tulyayogitālaṅkāraviviktaḥ śleṣasya viṣayaḥ syādityarthaḥ naca tathāpi vyaṅgyopamālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇa evāyaṃ śleṣa iti vācyam,
GK16visah_cu:20984: sambhavadavācyatākasyālaṅkārasya vyaṅgyatve alaṅkāratvābhāvāt kintu tadalaṅkāradhvanitvādeva kevalaṃ tatrālaṅkāravyapadeśo brāhmaṇaśramaṇanyāyena vācyatādaśāyāmalaṅkāratvamādāya gauṇa eva /
GK16visah_cu:20986: alaṅkāratā, nanu mādhavomādhavayoḥ dvayārapi tulyavibhaktiviṣayatvena prākarāṇakatvamevetyato dvayārvācyatvenātra tulyayogitaivetyata
GK16visah_cu:20996: evaṃ ca yena dhvastetyādau nītānāmityādau ca
GK16visah_cu:20998: vastutastu taddvaye śleṣa eva tulyayogitārahita iti sādhitaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:21003: pracakame pallavarāgatāmrā prabhā pataṅgasya muneśca dhenuḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:21004: ityādau tulyayogitāyāmekasyaiva nilayagamanopakramarūpadharmasya saurabhīprabhayordharmiṇoḥ sambaddhatayā pratyayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21005: iha tu śleṣeṣu punaranekeṣāṃ dharmiṇāṃ mādhavomādhavaprabhṛtīnāṃ yena dhvastamanobhavenetyādirūpapṛthagdharmasambaddhatayā pratyaya ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21011: yadyapi tulyayogitāyāmapi dvayorna prakṛtāprakṛtatvaṃ tathāpi tad
GK16visah_cu:21015: pūrṇopamāyā nirviṣayatvāpatteḥ "kamalamiva mukhaṃ manojñametat" ityādyasti pūrṇopamāyā viṣaya iti cet ? na, yadi "sakala-" ityādau śabdaśleṣatayā nopamā tatkimaparāddhaṃ "manojñam" ityādāvarthaśleṣeṇa /
GK16visah_cu:21021: (vi, kha) tathā sakalakalamityādau ca yadupamāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi apavādatvena śleṣasyaiva prādhānyena vyapadeśo bhavituṃ yukta ityuktaṃ tatropamaivālaṅkāro na śleṣa iti pratipādayati---sakalakalamityādau ceti /
GK16visah_cu:21027: atra śleṣa eva tvalaṅkāra iti netyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21028: tathā ca śliṣṭadharmasādharmyā upamā evālaṅkāra ityuktamanena /
GK16visah_cu:21030: upamānopameya sādhāraṇadharme vādicaturṇām upādāne hi pūrṇopamā /
GK16visah_cu:21035: nanu śleṣarahitaguṇasādharmyopamaiva pūrṇopamā ; tadvān viṣaya eva
GK16visah_cu:21037: atra hi na śleṣo manojñatvaguṇakathanarūpakriyayoreva sādharmyād na tu śliṣṭaśabdasya iti
GK16visah_cu:21040: yadi sakalakalamityatropamāṃ bādhitvā śleṣa eva śabdālaṅkārastadā kamalamiva mukhamityādāvapyupamāṃ bādhitvā arthaśleṣālaṅkāre prasajati tena kimaparāddhaṃ manojñatvādidharmāṇāmubhayatrānvayarūpaśliṣṭatvaditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21041: ivaśabdasadbhāvādupamāyā eva tatrānubhavikatve tu sakalakalamityādāvapi śabdasādharmyodanubhūyamānopamaivetyabhiprāyeṇātra rudraṭoktamapi pramāṇayati---sphuṭamartheti /
GK16visah_cu:21043: hṛdaye ca me" ityatra śabdāsādharmyāt samuccayālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21047: pūrṇopamāprakaraṇe lakṣyamāṇārthaśleṣeṇa kamala mivetyādau manojñatvadharmasya kamalamukharūpapratisambandhibhedāṅgīkāraprayojitena kimaparāddham /
GK16visah_cu:21048: tulyenāparādhena śabdaśleṣaviṣaye pūrṇopamāmanaṅgīkṛtya etad viṣaye kiṃ tasyāḥ parigraho 'bhimato yuṣmākaṃ, dvayoḥ samānatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21052: iha śabdālaṅkāramadhye guṇasāmyaṃ, kamalamityādi, kriyāsāmyaṃ candra iva mukhaṃ śobhate ityādi /
GK16visah_cu:21054: nanu guṇakriyāsāmyasyaivopamāprayojakatā yuktā, tatra sādharmyasya vāstavatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:21055: śabdasāmyasya tu na tathā, tatra sādharmyasyāvāstavatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:21056: tataśca pūrṇopamāyā anyathānupapattyā guṇakriyāsāmyasyaivārthaśleṣaviṣayatayāḥ parityāge pūrṇopamāviṣayatā
GK16visah_cu:21057: yuktā, na tu "sakala-" ityādau śabdasāmyasyaiveti cet ?
GK16visah_cu:21066: na tu sakalakalamityādau śabdasādharmyasya ityatra upamāprayojakatvamityanvayaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21069: śabdasya sādharmyaṃ ca vācakatāsambandhena iti yadvṛttitvāditibhāvaḥ
GK16visah_cu:21071: (lo, ṛ) tatra guṇakriyāsāmye vāstavatvāt svābhāvikatvāt avāstavatvāt atāttvikatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:21075: yadi ca śabdasāmye sādharmyamavāstavatvānnopamāprayojakam, tadā kathaṃ "vidvanmānasa--" ityādāvādhārabhūte cittādau sarovarādyāropo
GK16visah_cu:21079: (vi, gha) yadi hi vācakatāsambandhasya vṛttiniyāmakatvābhāvena śabdarūpasādharmyasya avāstavatvānnālaṅkāraprayojakatvaṃ tadā paramparitarūpake eva śabdavācyatvena sāmyena tadarthayorabhedāropātmakarūpaṃ kathaṃ rūpakālaṅkāraprayojakamityāha---śabdasāmya iti /
GK16visah_cu:21086: kiñca-yadi vāstavasāmya evopamāṅgīkāryā, tadā kathaṃ tvayāpi
GK16visah_cu:21090: (vi, ṅa) nanu sādharmyaṃ tāvat samāno dharmastasyāvāstavatve tadanupapannam /
GK16visah_cu:21100: kiñca atra śleṣasyaiva sāmyanirvāhakatā, na tu sāmyasya śleṣanirvāhakatā,
GK16visah_cu:21101: śleṣabandhataḥ prathamaṃ sāmyasyāsaṃbhavāt, ityupamāyā evāṅgitvena vyapadeśo jyāyān "pradhānena hi byapadeśā bhavanti" iti nyāyāt /
GK16visah_cu:21102: nanu śabdālaṅkāraviṣaye 'ṅgāṅgibhāvasaṅkaro nāṅgīkriyate tatkathamatra śleṣopamayoraṅgāṅgabhāvaḥ saṅkara iti cet ? na,
GK16visah_cu:21114: sakalakalapadabandhābhāve puracandrabimbayoḥ sāmyāpratīteḥ, aṅgitvena paryyantikapratītiviṣayatayā pradhānatvena; tathā ca śliṣṭapadārthānusandhānena sāmyapratītau tato 'ṅginyupamā pratīyate śleṣastu tannirvāhakarūpamaṅgamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21125: śleṣādestvarthānusādhānāt sāpekṣatvena parasparāpekṣāsambhavāt kathaṃ vā na svīkriyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21135: (vi, cha) itthaṃ sakalakalamityatropamaiva na śleṣa iti sādhite
GK16visah_cu:21138: tatra dhārttarāṣṭrāḥ kṛṣṇavarṇacañcūcaraṇā haṃsaviśeṣāḥ śaratkālavaśāt medinīpṛṣṭe nipantītyanvayaḥ
GK16visah_cu:21140: āśā prasādhanaṃ dikṣu gamanaṃ, caurādikasya sādhergatyarthatvāt /
GK16visah_cu:21143: tatra dhārttarāṣṭrā dhṛtarāṣṭrāputrā duryyodhanādayaḥ prasādhitāśāḥ śāsitadiṅmaṇḍalāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21145: satpakṣāḥ prakṛṣṭasahāyāḥ kālavaśād yamavaśāt madhuragiraḥ kāntavācaḥ medinīṣṭe nipatanti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21153: atra śaradvarṇanayā prakaraṇena dhārtarāṣṭrādiśabdānāṃ haṃsādyarthābhidhāne niyamanādduryodhanādirūpor'thaḥ śabdaśaktimūlo vastudhvaniḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21154: iha ca prakṛtaprabandhābhidheyasya dvitīyārthasya sūcyatayaiva vivakṣitatvādupamānopameyabhāvo na vivakṣita iti nopamādhvanirna vā śleṣa iti sarvamavadātam /
GK16visah_cu:21157: (vi, ja) atra copamādhvanitvaṃ śleṣālaṅkāraśca na prasajyata ityāha---iha ceti /
GK16visah_cu:21158: prakṛtaprabandho veṇīsaṃhāranāṭakaṃ tadabhidheyasya tatpratipādyasya kurūṇāṃ maraṇarūpasya dvitīyārthasya sūcyatayaiva vyaṅgyatayetyarthaḥ, na tu haṃsopamānatveneti evakārārthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21164: sakalakalamityādau ca śleṣaghaṭita upamālaṅkāra evetyādikaṃ viśaditamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21168: "sūcayed vastubījaṃ vā mukhyapātramathāpivā"iti upameyopamānabhāvo haṃsādīnāṃ duryodhanādibhaiḥ sahetyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21173: (lo, au) samprati rasānupakārakamapi kavibhisteṣu teṣu śaktipradarśanārthamupanibaddhatvātprācyairalaṅkāramadhye lakṣitaṃ citraṃ
GK16visah_cu:21175: asya cālaṅkāratāyāṃ tathāvidhanaipuṇyādisaṃskāravaśena vismayāveśo yathākathañcid bījam /
GK16visah_cu:21178: asya ca tathāvidhilipisanniveśaviśeṣavaśena camatkāravidhāyināmapi varṇānāṃ tathāvidhaśrotrākāśasamavāyavi śeṣavaśena camatkāravidhāyibhirvarṇerabhedenopacārācchabdālaṅkāratvam /
GK16visah_cu:21182: atra varṇasmārakalipīnāṃ sanniveśasyaiva padmādyākārakatvāllipīnāṃ cāśabdatvāt śabdālaṅkāratvamasyānupapannamityāśaṅky
GK16visah_cu:21184: tathāvidhalipismāryyavarṇasya yaḥ śrotrarūpa ākāśe samavāyaviśeṣaḥ tadvaśena camatkārādhāyibhirvarṇaiḥ saha lipeḥ abhedopacārādityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21185: tādṛśasamavāyasya varṇānubhavajanakatvaṃ tajjanitasaṃskāreṇa lipito varṇasmaraṇaṃ tataścamatkāra ityetatparamparayā śrotrākāśasamavāyasya camatkārajanakatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:21189: sanniveśaviśeṣor'thād bhūmyādisthale samyagabhimatanirvāhopayikatayā niveśaviśeṣaḥ, tadvaśena tannimittīkṛtyetyarthaḥ /

GK16visah_cu:21204: kīdṛśī cārurucā viśiṣṭā ataeva māsuṣamā, lakṣmītulyaparamāśobhā /
GK16visah_cu:21210: pūrvatrānvitasyāpi āvṛttyā paścādapyanvayena sā vāmā me māramā kāmalakṣmīrastu /
GK16visah_cu:21211: āvṛttivaśena sā vāmā ityasya paścādapyanvayena tasya vā parakīyapadatvādapi tatparatvād me ityādeśaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21222: karṇikāyāmādyavarṇaṃ likhitvā dale dvau dvau varṇau lekhyau /
GK16visah_cu:21225: (lo, ā) mārameti---māyā lakṣmyā ramaṇāt māramo viṣṇustasya asusamā praṇasamā /
GK16visah_cu:21228: ātto gṛhīto dhūrttatamasyāvāso yathā evaṃbhūtā na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21229: tathābhūtā sā prasiddhā ramā lakṣmīrme vāmā, vakāmāstviti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21231: karṇikāyām "mā" śabdaṃ vinyasya "ramā" ityasyākṣaradvayaṃ tatra digdale liśitvā, "su'; "ṣa'; iti akṣaradvayaṃ vidigdalena praveśya "cāru"
GK16visah_cu:21234: tadanantaradigdale "dhūrtta" ityakṣaradvayena praviśya punaḥ karṇikākṣarāt prabhṛti tenaiva nirgamya "tamā" ityakṣaradvayena, punaḥ tadanantaravidigdale praviśya, tadanudigdale, "vā sā " ityakṣaradvayena nirgamapraveśau /
GK16visah_cu:21235: taditaradigdale "me 'stu" ityakṣaradvayena nirgatya punaḥ prāk nirgamya digdale "māra" ityakṣaradvayena praviśya karṇikātāṃ gate "mā"
GK16visah_cu:21240: "sānandaṃ devadaityadvijabhujagamukhaiḥ praṇibhiḥ sevyamānā nāśaṃ tāpaṃ nayantī śaradi śaśikalāṃ śyāmayantī svabhāsā /
GK16visah_cu:21241: sā sakhyaḥ sādharāre sakalajagadadhīśena saṃyuktahārā sā dhvastāśeṣapātā salilanidhisutā santaṃ pātu yuṣmān" //
GK16visah_cu:21252: nālaṅkāro na rasaprakarṣako 'laṅkāra iti, kintu uktyaṅkāra evetyāha---uktivaicitryamātramiti
GK16visah_cu:21253: tathā ca vaicitryamalaṅkāra iti alaṅkārasāmānyalakṣaṇākrāntatvād uktyalaṅkāra eva sa ityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:21254: sā cyutadattetyāditriprakārā kriyā guptyādikā ca bhavatītyāha---vyutadatteti /
GK16visah_cu:21266: atra yathāśruter'thasambhavepi anupayuktakathanarūpatvena cyutadattākṣaratve eva tātparyyāt
GK16visah_cu:21267: prahelikātvaṃ tatra yathāśrute 'partho yathā---kokilāḥ śālavṛkṣe kūjanti /

GK16visah_cu:21274: ebhiruddīpakairmadanena nipīḍitā satī kuraṅgākṣī kiṃ karotviti /

GK16visah_cu:21292: iti atra mayūraṃ jayati ityatra luptaḥ karttā /
GK16visah_cu:21293: siddhānte tu mayusturaṅgavadano giriśaṅgasthitaṃ sarvaṃ janaṃ rañjayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21298: siddhānte tu vāḥ jalaṃ puruṣo 'yamayati yāti /
GK16visah_cu:21299: akṣaralopaguptiḥ viruddhapradarśanaṃ ca yathā--- "mukundenāmunā nūnaṃ śubhreṇa varavarṇini
GK16visah_cu:21301: " atra mukundena śbhreṇa hasitenāsitena iti viruddhadharmavattvam /
GK16visah_cu:21303: siddhānte tu mukundapadasya mukārarāhityāt kundena ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21304: tathā ca tena kundavaiśiṣṭyena yad hasitaṃ tena rājamānāsītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21311: upamārūpakotprekṣādayo bahavo 'laṅkārāḥ sādṛśyamūlā anyālaṅkārāntarāpekṣayā camatkārādhikyāt prathamaṃ te lakṣitumucitāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21321: sāmyaṃ vācyamavaidharmyaṃ vākyaikya upamā dvayoḥ // VisSd_10.14 //
GK16visah_cu:21326: dvayorupameyopamānayoḥ sāmyaṃ vākyaikye vācyaṃ sad upamā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21328: rupakādiṣu sāmyasya vyaṅgyatvam, vyatireke ca vaidharmyasyāpyuktiḥ,
GK16visah_cu:21329: upameyopamāyāṃ vākyadvayam, ananvaye tvekasyaiva sāmyoktirityasyā bhedaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21339: atra ca sāmyamityasya samāno dharma iti nār'thaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21342: kintūpameyopamānayoḥ sāmānyasādṛśyarūpasya dharmasya tayoranuyogitapratiyogitākhyaḥ sambandha eva atra sāmyapadārthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21343: yandra iva mukhamityatra candrapratiyogisādṛśyavanmukhamiti bodhe sādṛśyasya pratiyogitāyāścandre 'nupayogitāyāśca mukhe pratīteḥ sādṛśyasambandha evopametyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21344: etaeva sādharmyamupamābhede itikāvyaprakāśoktalakṣaṇe samānena dharmeṇa sambandha upamā ityeva tatra vyākhyātam /
GK16visah_cu:21345: parantvivādayaḥ ṣaṣṭhīvat sambandhaṃ pratipādayanti, iti tatra likhanāt sādṛśyapratiyogitākhyaḥ sambandha eva tanmate upamānānuyogitākhyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:21346: granthakṛnmate tu upamānopameyagataṃ sanbandhaṃ bodhayantītyagre likhanāt pratiyogitānuyogitākhyasambandhadvayamevopamā
GK16visah_cu:21347: kāvyaprakāśe ca tādṛśapratiyogitāyā ivādyavyayapadavācyatvena upamāyāśca śrautītvaṃ tulyādyanavyayapadavācyatvena tasyā ārthotvam /

GK16visah_cu:22239: ityatra śyāmatvenopakārakatvena ca jalade bhujagarūpaṇaṃ prathamaṃ siddhyatyeva /

GK16visah_cu:22244: tasya vyaṅgyatve tu vācyasiddhyaṅgamiti sthite "dīpayane rodasīrandhrameṣa jvalati sarvataḥ
GK16visah_cu:22248: rājamaṇḍalarāhave ityatra iva tatrāpi mukhyadavānalarūpakasādhakatvena veṇvāropaṇasya vācyatvādeva
GK16visah_cu:22250: (lo, u) jagaduddaṇḍo 'tiśayotkaṭaḥ, rājamaṇḍalaṃ nṛpasamūhaḥ candramaṇḍalaṃ ca /
GK16visah_cu:22252: atra rājamaṇḍalaṃ nṛpasamūha eva candrabimbamityāropo rājabāhau hāhutvārope nimittam /
GK16visah_cu:22256: atra padmāyā udaya eva padmānāmudayaḥ,satāmāgatireva sadāgamanam, bhūbhṛto rājāna eva parvatā ityādyāropo rājñaḥ sūryatvādyāropanimittam /
GK16visah_cu:22262: atra hi lakṣyā udaye sūryyasya, satāmāgatau samīraṇasya, bhūbhṛtāṃ rājñāmāvalau dambholeścānupayogena padmāyā udayādau paṅgajodayādyāropaṇaivatadupayogāttannimittatā /
GK16visah_cu:22265: vijayaprāgbhāvabhīma ! prabho ! sāmrājyaṃ varavīra ! vatsaraśataṃ vairiṃcamuccaiḥ kriyāḥ /
GK16visah_cu:22268: tasyārtho hi "he varavīra ! vairiṃcaṃ brāhmaṃ vatsaraśatam uccaiḥ sāmrājyaṃ kriyāḥ kuryyāḥ
GK16visah_cu:22270: viduṣāṃ mānasaṃ manaḥ eva mānasasaraḥ tat haṃsa, kamalānāmasaṅkoco vikāśastatra dīptadyute sūryya /
GK16visah_cu:22271: durgāṇāmamārgaṇaṃ durgaṃ vinā yodvṛtvaṃ, tadeva durgāyā mārgaṇaṃ

GK16visah_cu:22273: prajāpate ! vijayaḥ paraparābhava eva vijayor'junastat prāgbhāve pūrvotpattau bhīmasena ! he prabho ityatra rājñi haṃsādyāropamukhyarūpakāraṇyanekāni pratyekaṃ tatsādhakāni manaādau mānasasarovarādirūpakāṇyanekāni /

GK16visah_cu:22279: asyārthaḥ he deva ! sadvaṃśaḥ satkulameva sadvaṃśaḥ sadveṇuḥ tatra muktāratnaṃ bhāvān kairna stūyate ? vaṃśe muktotpatteḥ /

GK16visah_cu:22451: atrārthaḥ kṣmāyāṃ mahiṣītvāropaḥ khaḍge sauvidallatvārope nimittam /

GK16visah_cu:22464: yadi caikasya vācyasya rūpyasya sādhakānyanekānyanyāni rūpakāṇyeva mālā ityabhiprāyaḥ, tadā "rākāyā nabhasaścandraḥ puṇḍarīkaṃ śaśasya ca"
GK16visah_cu:22466: atra hi śaśini rūpyamāṇe puṇḍarīke vācye rākāyāḥ padahastalakṣmītvaṃ gaganasya saroratvaṃ śaśasya bhramaratvaṃ cārthasādhakam /
GK16visah_cu:22470: ayamarthaḥ-atra kṣmāyāṃ mahiṣītvarūpaṇasyārthatvād ekadeśavivartirūpakaṃ, tadrūpaṇasya ca khaḍgasya
GK16visah_cu:22472: iha ca kṣmāyāṃ mahiṣītvarūpaṇaṃ vinā khaḍgasya sauvidallatvarūpaṇaṃ nopapadyate /
GK16visah_cu:22477: "asti svastyayanaṃ śriyaḥ sucaritaṃ drāghīyasaḥ śreyasaḥ saundaryyasya rasāyanaṃ niravadheḥ śīlasya līlāyitam /
GK16visah_cu:22478: vidyānāmadhidaivataṃ nirupadheḥ śauryyasya visphūrjitaṃ śrībhānustrikaliṅgamaṅgalapadaṃ gaṅgānvaye bhūpatiḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:22479: atra śrīprabhṛtīnāṃ prāṇiviśeṣatvarūpaṇam ārthaṃ svastyayanarūpaṇe hetuḥ /

GK16visah_cu:22497: ayaṃ sudhāṃśuḥ amareśadiśaḥ prācyāḥ, mukhaṃ vicumbati /
GK16visah_cu:22498: kiṃ kṛtvā ? udāmahīdhararūpasya stanasyāgre karaṃ raśmimeva karaṃ pāṇiṃ nidhāya, stanāgre kīdṛśe galitaṃ tama. paṭalarūpamaṃśukaṃ yatna tādṛśe /
GK16visah_cu:22509: na cātra śliṣṭaparamparitam ? atra hi "bhūbṛdāvalidambholiḥ--" ityādau rājādau parvatatvādyāropa vinā varṇanīyasya rājāderdambholitādirūpaṇaṃ
GK16visah_cu:22511: tarhi kathaṃ "padmodayadinādhīśaḥ-" ityādau paramparitam, rājādeḥ sūryādinā sādṛśyasya tejasvitādihetukasya saṃbhavāditi na vācyam /
GK16visah_cu:22512: tathā hi--rājādestejastitādihetukaṃ suvyaktaṃ sādṛśyam, na tu prakṛte
GK16visah_cu:22514: iha tu mahīdharādeḥ stanādinā sādṛśyaṃ pīnotuṅgatvādinā suvyaktameveti na śliṣṭaparamparitam
GK16visah_cu:22520: paramparitaṃ yad rūpakaṃ tadeva mukhyarūpakasādhakaṃ natu sādṛśyaṃ tatsādhakam /
GK16visah_cu:22521: yatra tu sādṛśyādapi mukhyarūpakaṃ siddhyati na tatra paramparitarūpakam /
GK16visah_cu:22523: nanu yadi sādṛśyāsattve eva paramparitarūpakaṃ, tadā " padmodaya"
GK16visah_cu:22539: evaṃ ca "bhramimarati " mityādau viṣaṃ jalameva viṣamityāropo jalade prasiddhasādṛśyabhujagasyārope nimittamiti śliṣṭaparamparitameva /
GK16visah_cu:22540: atra "vidvanmānasahaṃsa" ityādau rājādau haṃsatvāropo mānase mānasatvārope heturiti manyamānā āhuḥ--"neha viṣaśabdasya dvyarthatā "vidvanmānasahaṃsa" ityādāviva jalade bhujagāropahetukā, kintu etatpadyāvasthitavaidyaśāstraprasiddhabhramādimaraṇāntāṣṭavidhagaralakāryyaviśeṣotthāpiteti dvyarthatāyāstādātmyāropaṇaṃ vinā prasiddheriha śleṣālaṅkāra eveti /
GK16visah_cu:22542: jalade bhujagasādṛśyasya sakalakalaṃ puramityādāviva viṣaśabdasya dvyarthatāṃ vinānupapatteḥ
GK16visah_cu:22543: kiñca jaladabhujagajaṃ viṣaṃ jalamiti na ghaṭate /
GK16visah_cu:22545: tasmād viṣameva viṣamiti rūpaṇamākṣipyaiva vācyarūpaṇaṃ saṃgacchate /
GK16visah_cu:22546: naca śleṣamātneṇāstu vācyarūpaṇopapattiriti yuktaṃ, śleṣeṇa tādātmyāpratīteḥ /
GK16visah_cu:22551: indutviṣo yudhi haṭhena tavārikīrtti- rānīya yatra ramate
GK16visah_cu:22553: iha ekadeśavarttini rūpake kṣitibhṛd rājā eva kṣitibhṛt parvata iti śliṣṭam /
GK16visah_cu:22554: tātrālaṅkārikacaṇḍidāsapaṇḍitādayaḥ rājani parvatatvāropaṇaṃ nistriṃśasya tamālavanatvāropaṇe heturiti śliṣṭaparimparitamādriyante /
GK16visah_cu:22556: tathāhi kṣitibhṛto vdyarthatayā "vidvanmānasahaṃsa'; ityādau mānasatvāde rājño haṃsatvādirūpaṇanimittamiva, nistriṃśasya tamālavanatvarūpaṇopayogitvam /
GK16visah_cu:22558: pratāpakīrttyornāyikanāyikātvopakaraṇatvād iha prakṛtasūtroktaṃ śliṣṭaikadeśarūpyaṃ sāvayavaikadeśavivartirūpakameva bhāvituṃ yuktaṃ, natu śliṣṭaparamparitamiti manyāmahe /
GK16visah_cu:22559: kiñca śliṣṭaparamparite vidvanmānasahaṃsetyādau rājño haṃsatvaṃ mānasasya mānasatvāropaṇasādṛśyaṃ vināsiddham /
GK16visah_cu:22560: iha tu nistriṃśasya tamālavanāntatvaṃ nīlimādināpi prasiddham /
GK16visah_cu:22564: kevalaṃ mānasādipadeṣu ākṣipyamāṇaṃ sarovarādyartharūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ haṃsatvādisādhakamātram
GK16visah_cu:22565: ataevātra kṣaṇadānibhetyasyāpi padasya rātrikālākṣepeṇa aniḥ śeṣaṃ bhātīti tamaso bahulībhāvāt haṭharamaṇopayogiteti prācyānāmapi vyākhyā /
GK16visah_cu:22566: tadevaṃ kṣitibhṛta ityādi sarveṣāṃ rūpyamāṇānāṃ haṭharamaṇopakaraṇatvād yathoktameva jyāyaḥ
GK16visah_cu:22568: āntarnimagnacarapuṣpaśaro 'tipātā-- tkiṃ kiṃ cakāra taruṇo nayadīkṣaṇāgniḥ //
GK16visah_cu:22569: ityatra nayanāgneḥ taruṇatvasya prauḍhatvarūpamarthamādāya prathamamabhidhāyā viśrāmād vyañjanayaiva yuvarūpor'thaḥ pratīyate /
GK16visah_cu:22570: iha tu kṣitibhṛta ityādau bahūnāṃ rūpaṇāt pratāpasya taruṇatvarūpaṇaṃ śābdam /

GK16visah_cu:27758: (vi, va) namayantvityādikaṃ na ślokaḥ, kintu jetṛnṛpaterjetavyanṛpatiṣu jijñāsāvākyamātramidam
GK16visah_cu:27759: praṇipātārthaṃ te rājānaḥ śirāṃsi vā namayantu yuddhārthaṃ dhanurvā namayantu ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:27760: tathā ca bhamājñā cākarṇapūrīkriyatāṃ karṇaṃ pūrayitvā śrūyatāṃ yuddhārthaṃ maurvo vākarṇaparyantaṃ nīyatāmityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:27774: (lo, o) tulyabalayorekasmin kārye niyojitumarhayoḥ, virodhaḥ ekadā nirvāhayitumaśakyatvāt
GK16visah_cu:27790: davāyovetyādiniyamagarbhatvena ekavyaktikavittābhiprāyeṇa vā virodho darśita iti vā /
GK16visah_cu:27795: guṇau kriye vā yugapatsyātāṃ yadvā guṇakriye /
GK16visah_cu:27801: guṇadvayaṃ vā kriyādvayaṃ vā guṇakriyādvayaṃ vā yadi yugapad varṇitaṃ syādityartaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:27809: "haṃho dhīrasamira ! hanta jananaṃ te candanakṣmābhṛto dākṣiṇyaṃ jagaduttaraṃ paricayo godāvarīvāribhiḥ /
GK16visah_cu:27810: pratyaṅgaṃ dahasīti me tvamapi ceduddāmadāvāgniva- nmattoyaṃ malinātmako vanacaraḥ kiṃ vakṣyate kokilaḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:27813: (vi, sa) haṃho dhīreti . mandasyaiva dhairyavattvenākāryanivṛttirūpeṇa sambodhanam /
GK16visah_cu:27820: īdṛśastvamiti virahe me mama pratyaṅgaṃ dāvāgnivad dahasi cet tadā matta unmatto malinātmakaḥ kuṣṇavarṇa eva kuṭilasvabhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:27821: vanacaratvena ca lokavyavahārānabhijñaḥ kokilaḥ kiṃ vakṣyate ? sa sutarāṃ dhakṣyatītyarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:27823: (lo, ā) dhīraḥ vaṃśena vidhinā pāṇḍityacca, kṣmābhṛtparvataḥ bhūdharaṇakṣamaḥ kaścit mahāpuruṣaḥ
GK16visah_cu:27828: atra dāhe ekasmiṃścandanakṣmābhṛjjanmarūpe kāraṇe satyapi dākṣiṇyādīnāṃ hetvantarāṇāmupādānam
GK16visah_cu:27842: "śaśī divasadhūsaro galitayauvanā kāminī saro vigatavārijaṃ mukhamanakṣaraṃ svākṛteḥ /
GK16visah_cu:27843: prabhūrdhanaparāyaṇaḥ satatadurgataḥ sajjano nṛpāṅganagataḥ khalo manasi sapta śalyāni me"
GK16visah_cu:27847: ete sapta dhūsaratvaviśiṣṭaśayyādayaḥ sapta manasi śalyānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:27851: evaṃ galitayauvanāyāḥ kāmavattvaṃ kāminyā galitayauvanatvaṃ vā anucitam /
GK16visah_cu:27856: nṛpāṅgaṇa gatasya khalatvaṃ, khalasya nṛpāṅāgaṇagatatvaṃ vā
GK16visah_cu:27859: tatra daivādhānadoṣeṇa śocyasya sattvaṃ svādhīnadoṣeṇa śocyasyāsattvam /
GK16visah_cu:27860: tatra śaśino dhūsaratvaṃ, kāminyā galitayauvanatvasya vidheyatvapakṣe
GK16visah_cu:27862: sajjanasya durgatatvaṃ tadaiva doṣāt śocyatvena śobhanam /
GK16visah_cu:27863: galitayauvanāyāṃ kāmavattvasya vidheyatvapakṣe vidheyasya tasya prabhordhanaparāyaṇasya dhanaparāyaṇe prabhutvasya vā, vidheyasya khale nṛpāṅgaṇagatatvasya nṛpāṅgaṇagate khalatvasya vā bidheyasya svādhīnadoṣeṇa
GK16visah_cu:27867: sadasadyogaḥ" iti anye tu--"śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ svataḥ śobhanatvaṃ dhūsaratvādīnāṃ tvaśobhanatvamiti sadasadyogaḥ" /
GK16visah_cu:27868: atra hi śaśiprabhṛtiṣu dhūsaratvāderatyantacitatvamiti vicchittiviśeṣasyaiva camatkāravidhāyitvam
GK16visah_cu:27870: "nṛpāṅganagataḥ khala" iti tu kramabhedādduṣṭatvamāvahati sarvatra viśeṣyasyaiva śobhanatvena prakramāditi /
GK16visah_cu:27876: (vi, kha) pūrvoktaślokepi vidheyānāmeva tathātvād bhinnābhiprāya granthakṛnmanasi kṛtvāparoktaṃ sadasadyogaṃ darśayati---iha keciditi /
GK16visah_cu:27882: uddeśye sattvāsattvābhyāṃ tu teṣāṃ matena camatkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:27886: śasī dhūsara ityādyuddeśyavidheyārthakasarvavākye ityarthaḥ, ayaṃ ca doṣaḥ, khale nṛpāṅgaṇagatvasya vidheyatā gatatvasya vidheyatāpakṣa eva
GK16visah_cu:27887: nṛpāṅgaṇagatade khalatvasya vidhayatā pakṣetūddeśyaḥ śobhana eveti naiṣa doṣa iti bodhyam
GK16visah_cu:27899: "aruṇe ca taruṇi nayane tava malinaṃ ca priyasya mukham /
GK16visah_cu:27900: mukhamānataṃ ca sakhi te jvalitaścāsyāntare smarajvalanaḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:27904: (vi, ga) guṇayoḥ kriyayośca yogapadyarūpaṃ samuccayamāha---aruṇe ceti
GK16visah_cu:27906: tau ca yayoruttarabhūtau tayoryaugapadyabodhakau ityata āhaatrādye iti /
GK16visah_cu:27910: patitaṃ ca mahīpatīndra ! teṣāṃ vapuṣi prasphuṭamāpadāṃ kaṭākṣaiḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:27915: atra pūrvārdhe guṇottaraṃ cakāraḥ, pārardhe tu kriyāttaramityanayoryaugapadyam /
GK16visah_cu:27925: na cātra dīpakam, ete hi guṇakriyāyaugapadye samuccayaprakārā niyamena kāryakāraṇakālaniyamaviparyayarūpātiśayoktimūlāḥ, dīpakasya cātiśayoktimūlatvābhāvaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:27931: ete guṇākriyāyaugapadye ye samuccayaprakārāste kāryakāraṇayoryaḥ paurvāparyyarūpaḥ kālaniyamaḥ tadviparyyayarūpātiśayoktimūlā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:27932: darśitodāharaṇeṣu sarvatraiva guṇayoḥ kriyayorvā kāryakāraṇabhāvasattvepi yaugapadyokteḥ /
GK16visah_cu:27935: tathā cet taddvayābhāve satīti viśeṣaṇaṃ deyamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:27953: ripoḥ pratīkāre pratyapakāre 'śaktena kenāpi yadi tatsambandhino
GK16visah_cu:27960: tenābhiyojyatayā pratinidhibhūtortho ripoḥ sambandhī varṇyate iti pratyanīkaṃ nāmālaṅkaraṇam
GK16visah_cu:27971: atra madhyena svamadhyajayāt nāyikā siṃhasya ripuḥ, tatkucasādṛśyāt karikumbhau tadīyau /
GK16visah_cu:27974: svasambandhaḥ kucakumbhasambandhaḥ sādṛśyasambandhādidaṃ ca kvacidanukūlasya vāñchitācaraṇepi sambhavati /
GK16visah_cu:27975: yathā viraha vidhurāpi satataṃ bhavataḥ śvāsānuhāriṇī patati ityādau /
GK16visah_cu:27982: prasiddhasyopamānasya upameyatvakalpanaṃ vā niṣphalatvakathanaṃ veti dvividhaṃ pratīpamityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:27994: "tadvaktraṃ yadi mudritā śaśikathā hā hema sā ceddyutiḥ; taccakṣuryadi hāritaṃ kuvalayaistaccetsmitaṃ kā sudhā ? /
GK16visah_cu:27995: dhikkandarpadhanurbhruvau yadi ca te kiṃ vā bahu brūmahe yatsatyaṃ punaruktavastuvimukhaḥ sargakramo vedhasaḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:28000: tad vaktrādisattve śaśikathādīnāṃ mudritatvādikaṃ vaiphalyaṃ paryavasitaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:28007: vedhasaḥ sargakramaḥ sṛṣṭikramaḥ punaruktavastuvimukhaḥ, punaruktaṃ yatsādṛśavastvantarakalpanaṃ tadvimukhaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28016: atyutkṛṣṭasya vastuno 'tyantamutkarṣamuktvāpi upamānatve 'pi kalpite nirdiṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28022: "ahameva guruḥ sudāruṇānāmiti hālāhala ! tāta ! mā sma dṛpyaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28023: nanu santi bhavādṛśāni bhuvane 'smin vacanāni durjanānām" //
GK16visah_cu:28027: he hālāhala, he tāta, ahameva sudāruṇānāṃ guruḥ pradhānam /
GK16visah_cu:28028: ityevaṃ dṛpyo mā sma, evaṃ darpaṃ mā kuru ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28030: nanu bho asmin bhuvane durjanānāṃ bhūyo bahūni vacanāni api bhavādṛśāni bhavattulyāni santītyarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:28040: (vi, ḍha) atra bhavadiva dṛśyante yānītyanena halāhalasyopamānatvenaiva nirdeśaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28047: brahmā yathā vedaṃ vadati tathā brāhmaṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28048: yadyapi vedasyātivaktā brahmaiveti brāhmaṇasyātyantotkarṣakathanepyupamaiva nāyamalaṅkārastathāpi pratīpaghaṭanārthaṃ samabhivyāharaviśeṣādupamānasya nindāparyyavasāyakatvaṃ nirdeśasya viśeṣaṇaṃ dattamityatastadvāraṇamiti prāgevoktaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visah_cu:28066: harervakṣaḥ sthale lakṣmīstanakastūrīcihnaṃ bhāratyā nālakṣi, yato nīlotpalabhiyā harereva bhāsā grastamācchāditamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28070: kopoparaktānyapi kāminīnāṃ mukhāni śaṅkāṃ vidadhurna yūnām" //
GK16visah_cu:28074: śoṇa upalo maṇiḥ khacito yatra tādṛśakuṇḍalasya mayūkhaiḥ sadaivāruṇīkṛtāni yasyāṃ puri kāminīnāṃ kopoparaktānyapi mukhāni yūnāṃ kopaśaṅkāṃ na vidadhurityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28093: mīlite utkṛṣṭaguṇena nikṛśṭaguṇasya tirodhānam, iha tūbhayostulyaguṇatayā bhedāgrahaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28103: balabhadravadanacchadmano vadanavyājasya padmasya paryantapātino mudhuliho bhramarān udaṃśūnām udratāṃśūnāṃ daśānānāṃ dantānāmaṃśubhiḥ śvaityaṃ nayan jagādetyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28106: mīlite prakṛtasya vastuno vastvantareṇācchādanam, iha tu vastvantaraguṇenākrāntatā pratīyata iti bhedaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28123: guṇagaura ! niṣaṇṇo 'pi kathaṃ nāma na rajyasi" //
GK16visah_cu:28127: ananuraktaṃ nāyakaṃ prati anuraktāyā nāyikāyā utkiriyam /
GK16visah_cu:28129: guṇena gaura iti, guṇo gauro yasyeti samāsena ca sambodhanam /
GK16visah_cu:28136: rājahaṃsa ! tava saiva śubhratā cīyate na ca na cāpacīyate" //
GK16visah_cu:28137: pūrvatrātiraktahṛdayasaṃparkāt prāptavadapi guṇagauraśabdavācyasya nāyakasya raktatvaṃ na niṣpinnam, uttaratrāprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi gaṅgāyamunāpekṣayā prakṛtasya haṃsasya gaṅgāyamunayoḥ
GK16visah_cu:28144: atiriktahṛdayaṃ rāgabhṛtatvenātiriktaguṇaṃ hṛdayaṃ prāptavat prāptaprāyaṃ raktatvaṃ na niṣpannam, nāyakasyotyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28145: itthamatra prakṛtena nāyakasya prakṛtasya hṛdayasya guṇāgrahaṇaṃ darśayitvā prakṛtato 'prakṛtaguṇagrahaṇarūpaphalābhāvamuttaraśloke
GK16visah_cu:28147: yadyapi rājahaṃsopyaprakṛtastathāpi sambodhyatvenā'pekṣikaṃ tasya prakṛtatvaṃ darśayannāha---aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmiti
GK16visah_cu:28148: sati hetau phalābhāvarūpāyā viśeṣokterasya bhedamāha--atra ceti /
GK16visah_cu:28149: viśeṣoktausāmānyata eva phalābhāvaḥ iha tu guṇagrahaṇarūpaphalābhāvarūpo bhaṅgiviśeṣa iti bheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28150: nanu kāryasya kāraṇavirodhiguṇavaśāt kāryasya kāraṇaguṇāgrahaṇaṃ viṣamālaṅkārepyasti ced yadyapi darśitodāharaṇadvaye kāryakāraṇabhāvasattvāt tādṛśasyātadruṇasya viṣamālaṅkāratvāviśeṣa
GK16visah_cu:28155: kayāpi sūcyate bhahgyā yatra sūkṣmaṃ taducyate // VisSd_10.91 //
GK16visah_cu:28165: puṃstvaṃ tanvyā vyañjantī vayasyā smitvā pāṇau khaḍgalekhāṃ lilekha" //
GK16visah_cu:28166: atra kayācitkuṅkumabhedena saṃlakṣitaṃ kasyāścitpuruṣāyitaṃ pāṇau puruṣacihnakhaḍgalekhālikhanena sūcitam /
GK16visah_cu:28170: kācid vayasyā sakhī kasyāścinnāyikāyāḥ kaṇṭhe vaktrasyandibhiḥ svedabindupravāhaiḥ bhinnaṃ dvidhākṛtaṃ kuṅkumaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāḥ nāyikāyāḥ pustvaṃ ratau puruṣāyitatvaṃ vyañjayantī smitvā hasitvā tasyāḥ pāṇau khaḍgalekhāṃ lilekhetyarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28178: atra viṭasya bhrūvikṣepādinā lakṣitaḥ saṅketakālābhiprāyo rajanīkālabhāvinā padmanimīlanena prakāśitaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28182: viṭaṃ dhūrtam upanāyakaṃ tadjijñāsārthaṃ saṃketakālamanasaṃ jñātvā vidagdhayā nāyikayā hasatā netrārpitākūtaṃ yathā syāttathā līlāpadmaṃ nimīlitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28194: āḥ śaityaṃ tuhinācalasya karayorityūcivān sasmitaṃ śailāntaḥ puramātṛmaṇḍalagaṇairdṛṣṭo 'vatādvaḥ śivaḥ" //
GK16visah_cu:28200: śailendreṇa pratipādyamānāyā utsṛjyamānāyā girijāyā hastasya upagūḍhane upagūhanena svarśeṇa ullasaddhiḥ romāñcādibhiḥ romāñcavepathusvedaiḥ visaṃṣṭhulasya vyastasya akhilavaivāhikavidheḥ vyāsaṅgasya vyāpārasya bhaṅgenākulaḥ san āḥ āścarthaṃ tuhinasambandhino 'calasya karayoḥ śaityam ityūcivān san śailāntaḥ pureṇa tadratastrībhiḥ gauryyādimātṛmaṇḍalena svīyagaṇaiśca sasmitaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28208: prakṛtāpahnavakārī yo viṣayo vastu sthāpyamānamaprakṛtaṃ vastu,
GK16visah_cu:28210: idamupalakṣaṇam, apahnavārthapadasya nañāderapyanabhidhānāditi boddhavyam, apahnava hetoḥ śvetasyābhidhānād romāñcādestvanāpahnutatvādeva
GK16visah_cu:28216: gopanīyārthasya mopanakṛtā prathamamabhihitatvācca vyājokteriti likhanena darśita ityarthaḥ
GK16visah_cu:28217: iha tu gopanīyārthasya romāñcādeḥ śivena prathamamanabhidhānāt /
GK16visah_cu:28236: "lāṅgūlenābhihatya kṣititalamasakṛddārayannagrapadbhyā- mātmanyevāvalīya drutamatha gaganaṃ protpatan vikrameṇa /
GK16visah_cu:28237: sphūrjaddhuṅkāradhoṣaḥ pratidiśamakhilān drāvayanneṣa jantūna kopāviṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prativanamaruṇocchūnacakṣūstarakṣuḥ"
GK16visah_cu:28241: aruṇe ucchūne sphārite cakṣuṣī yasyā tādṛśaḥ eṣa tarakṣuḥ vyāghraḥ pratibalaṃ pratipakṣasamūhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28242: kīdṛśaḥ kṣititalamasakṛd lāṅgūlenābhihatya agrapadbhyāṃ dāhayan vilikhan /
GK16visah_cu:28243: athānantaraṃ ātmanyevāvalīya kuñcitāṅgo bhūtvā drutaṃ gaganaṃ vikrameṇa ca protpatan tathā sphūrjatā visphuratā phūtkāreṇa ghoraḥ tathāsvilān jantūn pratidiśaṃ drāvayan tathā kopāviṣṭo
GK16visah_cu:28253: bhūtasya bhaviṣyato vā adbhutasya padārthasya yat pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyamānatvaṃ varṇitaṃ tadityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28261: ekacaluke pīyamānasamudrarūpe gaṇḍuṣe matsyakacchapāvīśvārāvatārau bhūtabhāvinau yogabalena dṛṣṭau /
GK16visah_cu:28271: bhūṣaṇena bhaviṣyantyāḥ śobhāyā tadvināpi darśanād bhāvibhūṣaṇeti /
GK16visah_cu:28273: na cāyaṃ prasādākhyo guṇaḥ, bhūtabhāvinoḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇatve tasyāhetutvāt
GK16visah_cu:28276: (vi, ga) nanu bhūtabhāvinoḥ pratyakṣāyogyayorapi pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ śīghrapratītiviṣayatvāt
GK16visah_cu:28277: tathācedṛśārthasya viṣayatvena śabdabodhitopi sortho viśada eva /
GK16visah_cu:28278: tathā cārthavaimalyaṃ prasādo yaḥ paroktaḥ prasādaguṇaḥ sa evāyaṃ tadbhinnavaicitryaviśeṣābhāvād bhāvikanāmālaṅkāro nāstītyāśaṅkate---na
GK16visah_cu:28284: na cādbhuto rasaḥ, vismayaṃ pratyasya hetutvāt /
GK16visah_cu:28287: (vi, gha) nanvahetukatvena hetvanusandhānaṃ vismaya eva, tathā cādbhutarasa evāyamityāśaṅkate---nacādbhuta iti /
GK16visah_cu:28290: tasya vismayaṃ prati hetutvādeva, natu vismayarūpatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28302: bhūte bhāvini rūpe bhūtabhāvitvena jñāpanāt bhrāntimattvamāśaṅkate--na ca bhrāntīti /
GK16visah_cu:28304: prakṛtasyānyatādātmyabhrama eva bhrāntimānna cātrābhūtabhāvipadārthāḥ prakṛtāstatra bhūtabhāvitāvibhramaḥ
GK16visah_cu:28308: na ca svabhāvoktiḥ, tasya laukikavastugatasūkṣmadharmasvabhāvasyaiva yathāvadvarṇanaṃ svarūpam; asya tu vastunaḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇasvarūpo vicchittiviśeṣo 'stīti /
GK16visah_cu:28309: yadi punarvastunaḥ kvacitsvabhāvoktāvapyasyā vicchitteḥ sambhavastadobhayoḥ saṅkaraḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28314: laukikaṃ vastu ḍimbhavyāghrādi tadgatasya sūkṣmadharmātmakasvabhāvasya kavibhinnajanāvedyatanmātravṛttidharmarūpasya tatra yathā varṇitaṃ tasya svarūpamityarthaḥ /
GK16visah_cu:28319: ityatra ḍimbhamātrakriyāderbhāvibhūtasya ko 'laṅkāraḥ syāditi manasikṛtya samādhatte--yadi punariti /
GK16visah_cu:28326: (vi, cha) yatra bhūtabhāvivastunorna pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ kintu tadvastuna eva pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ varṇita tatra nāyamalaṅkāra ityudāhṛtya darśayati---anātapatro 'pīti /
